courses.title: Master Retouching in Affinity Photo
courses.bio: Enhance any image with the power of Affinity Photo!
objectives: You will learn how to retouch images using Affinity Photo
You will learn how to use Frequency Separation
You will learn how to Dodge & Burn
You will learn how to sharpen portraits
You will learn how to color correct skin
You will learn how to remove acne
You will learn how to whiten teeth
You will learn how to use the Liquify Persona
requirements: A copy of Affinity Photo
No prior knowledge or experience of Affinity Photo is required
courses.description:
Retouching is one of the most important skills in photo editing. With the power of retouching, you can remove unwanted parts of an image, draw more attention to important areas of the photo, and improve the overall appearance of the image.
And in this course, you will master the incredible art of retouching from start to finish!
We will begin by learning how to remove unwanted parts of a photo. By mastering the Clone Brush and Frequency Separation, you will be able to remove acne, wrinkles, flyaway hairs, and distracting elements from the background of your photos.
After that, we will take a deep dive into Dodging & Burning. This will allow you to precisely control the lighting of your photos, so that you can draw the viewer's attention to the most important parts of the image.
Once you know the foundational skills of retouching, we will bring together everything we have learned by completing a series of example projects. During these projects, you will see how all of your new retouching skills work together. That way, you will be totally prepared to edit your own photos after you finish the course.
This course is jam-packed with powerful retouching techniques, so that you can edit your photos like a professional. I know you are going to learn so much, so please join me in the course! :)
target_audience: This course is for anyone that wants to use Affinity Photo to retouch their images.

courses.bio: Uso de flash em eventos
objectives: Ter um resultado fotográfico satisfatório ao utilizar flash Speedlight TTL.

Saber posicionar a cabeça móvel do flash de acordo com a posição do objeto a ser fotografado.

Flash Speedlight Canon para eventos: O flash Speedlight Canon. Iluminação externa para ensaios e difusor lateral.
Conexão do flash na câmera. Configuração do flash. Flash master e slave.
Configuração do flash em E-TTL, configurações de câmera.
Prática fotográfica em Estúdio I. Profundidade de campo e enquadramento.
Prática fotográfica em Estúdio II. Enquadramento vertical e objetivas.
Configuração de flash em E-TTL e câmera em função M(manual)

requirements: Ter câmera fotográfica Canon.
Ter Flash Speedlight TTL, ou comprar um modelo após assistir a aula uma primeira vez.
courses.description: O objetivo principal do curso é oferecer condições fundamentais a quem utiliza flash TTL Canon em eventos, casamentos, festas, aniversários, formaturas e ensaios fotográficos. O curso mostra toda configuração que deve ser feita na câmera e flash. Também mostra, na prática, o uso de rebatedores e acessórios para um desempenho de fotos com o mínimo de sombra, além de dar condições ao aluno fotógrafo experiente ou iniciante a produzir fotos com o mínimo de qualidade, sem sombras e com luz suave, ou compreender as várias técnicas utilizadas para posição de flash e acessórios. A profundidade de campo ainda é abordado nas práticas fotográficas demonstrado pelo professor. É possível, ao compreender o uso de diafragmas, definir o nível de profundidade de campo desejado e controle de luz, obter qualidade máxima nas imagens. Com as facilidades dos equipamentos atuais, na maioria das vezes o fotógrafo acha que é só colocar no automático que irá resolver todos os seus problemas, mas na realidade o conhecimento de quase todas, senão todas as funções da câmera e as configurações do flash são de fundamental importância para o bom resultado final do trabalho prestado pelo fotógrafo. Função automática resolve até certo ponto, mas para trabalhos que necessitam de um resultado perfeito, ou quase perfeito, a compreensão de funções, configurações, técnicas e uso de rebatedores e difusores é de fundamental para o desenvolvimento do fotógrafo e a qualidade de seu material final.
target_audience: Fotógrafos que não dominem o uso de flash Speedlight para eventos ou afins.

Sono entusiasta di annunciare l’apertura di una nuova sezione formativa all'interno della mia azienda, fxstudioproduction, dedicata alle discipline multimediali di Audio, Foto e Video. Con oltre un decennio di esperienza nei settori del videomaking, della fotografia e della produzione audio, sono lieto di mettermi a disposizione come insegnante per guidarvi nel mondo della creatività digitale.
I nostri corsi si svolgeranno sia in presenza che online, per offrire la massima flessibilità e permettere a tutti di partecipare indipendentemente dalla propria posizione geografica o impegni personali. Attraverso un approccio pratico e teorico, vi accompagneremo nell'apprendimento delle tecniche essenziali e delle competenze avanzate necessarie per eccellere in ciascun campo multimediale.
Inoltre, grazie al patrocinio dei comuni toscani, offriamo giornate gratuite dedicate alla teoria dei tre ambiti sopra citati. Queste lezioni introduttive vi daranno un'anteprima delle nostre metodologie di insegnamento e vi permetteranno di scoprire come l'audio, la fotografia e il video possono essere combinati per creare contenuti straordinari.
Unitevi a noi in questa straordinaria avventura e trasforma la tua passione per il multimediale in una professione gratificante!
Per ulteriori informazioni e per iscriversi, visitate il nostro sito web  fxstudioproduction nella sezione "corsi".

Non c'è modo di non imparare: lezioni dal vivo, spiegazioni scritte, lezioni online registrate e pratica in compagnia di altri appassionati. fxmultimediacenter è il posto giusto per te.

requirements: A digital camera will be very helpful. Several brands will be covered in detail.
courses.description:
In this full featured course students will start at the beginning, assuming no prior knowledge. This is not a typical lightweight tutorial. This is equivalent to an 8 week in person course. Camera Basics focuses on the features, terminology and function of the camera, lenses and associated accessories like tripods, cleaning kits and battery grips. We will learn to identify the brand, platform and sensor format of your camera. You'll even learn an easy way to calculate your "crop factor" to easily compare different formats. Don't worry, it's all explained! We’ll identify and learn how to use all the controls available to you to achieve proper exposure and color. Did you ever get really blue images? Learn why! You’ll understand how to change and customize your camera strap, tripod plate types, accessories and flashes. That might not seem relevant but it can really make or break your photography experience. And without a good strap, I really do mean it can "break" it.
We’ll cover the exposure triangle how to easily translate it to learn proper exposure using our aperture, ISO and shutter speed. You'll get plenty of visual examples to demonstrate what happens with each setting. We’ll cover autofocus modes, metering modes, depth of field, how and when to use a tripod, shutter modes and much more. Any brand of camera can be used to follow along with this course and if you don’t yet own a camera this will be a great way to know what you’re doing before acquiring one because I'll cover different brands. Or, you can take my Camera Buying Guide course to research the different brands.
Feel free to skip ahead if needed. There is a handy downloadable study quiz you can print out to take with each lesson.
Each unit averages 25 minutes in length, some will be longer. This is an in depth course and not a casual tutorial. If you really want to learn how to use your camera, this is the course for you.
target_audience: Beginner photography hobbyists
Photographers who want to get off automatic mode.

courses.description:
Experience a thought-provoking approach to learning photography! Rachel Lincoln has nearly two decades of experience teaching individuals and large group classes. Her Socratic teaching style helps you quickly understand and commit to memory the fundamental concepts of photographing and making a great photo. This class includes hands-on guided practice, the same effective exercises Rachel uses to teach her in-person students.


This class will take you from 0 to proficient in full manual mode on your camera, whether you're using a DSLR camera, a mirrorless camera, or a point-and-shoot with manual capabilities! Or, if you're a photography amateur and just need a refresher course on shutter speed and aperture, this is the class for you!


In just one hour you will learn how to expertly use your camera in full manual mode like a pro. This includes instructions for practicing and moving forward with your photography adventure!


After working in the photography industry for nearly 20 years, Rachel is an award-winning, international photographer whose work graces the covers of books and magazines, and fills the walls of travel photography aficionados. She has published an e-magazine ("Cherry Blossoms: from dawn til dusk) and a book on creative self-portraiture (available on Amazon Kindle).
target_audience: Beginner Photographers hoping to understand Aperture, Shutter Speed, ISO, exposure, Depth of Field, and more!

Resumen y despedida: Hasta aquí Dios no ha ayudado

requirements: Computador con Adobe Photoshop Lightroom Classic instalado. Con respecto a el material necesitarás un proyecto fotográfico sin editar (si está en RAW mucho mejor)
courses.description:
En este curso aprenderás a manejar Lightroom con un enfoque a la productividad. Conocerás un flujo de trabajo que te ayudará a organizar tus fotos y revelarlas (postproducción) en tiempo récord, disminuyendo así tus tiempos de producción para una entrega más rápida de tus encargos fotográficos
Ya conoces el dicho que una imagen vale más que mil palabras y Lightroom te ayudará a encontrar es imagen perfecta de tu sesión fotográfica y mejorar su aspecto visual a través del módulo revelar de Lightroom.


Proyecto final
Al final de curso estará en la capacidad de ordenar y revelar tus fotos según requerimientos solicitados. Como proyecto final realizarás todo el proceso de una sesión fotográfica para importar las fotos en Lightroom. Crearás tres colecciones para organizar tus fotos de esa sesión. Luego seleccionarás la mejor fotografía para realizarle un revelado digital avanzado. Por último, comparte la fotografia con tus compañeros de clase en nuestra comunidad privada.


¿Qué incluye este curso?
Capítulo 1: Introducción
Capítulo 2: Creación de catálogos y colecciones
Capítulo 3: Revelado básico
Capítulo 4: Revelado intermedio
Capítulo 5: Revelado avanzado
Capítulo 6: Genera ingresos online con la fotografía (BONO)
Capítulo 7: Resumen y conclusión






EL curso da inicio con la presentación del profesor, quien se dedica a la fotografia escolar, es profesor de fotografía digital y Adobe certificado experto.
Aprenderás como crear un catalogo desde cero y los mejores consejos de importación y guardado de tus proyectos fotográficos


A continuación, te adentramos al mundo de la organización, etiquetado y clasificación de tus fotos. Te enseñaremos las mejores técnicas para seleccionar y depurar tus fotos para prepararlas para el revelado digital.
Conocerás técnicas y procedimientos avanzados de revelado fotográfico. Aprenderás a crear tus propios presets y verás como aplicarlos a un lote de fotografía. Además, el curso incluye a modo de BONO 900 presets con diferentes temáticas fotográficas.
Para terminar, aprenderás a integrar Photoshop y Lightroom al mismo tiempo. Con la combinación de estos programas, podrás hacer fotografías increíbles, mejorando exponencialmente su aspecto visual.
¿A quién está dirigido?
A fotógrafos principiantes o profesionales. También a personas interesadas en mejorar el aspecto visual de sus fotografías y que usen Lightroom como el programa principal para ordenar y revelar sus fotos.
Requisitos:
Computador con Adobe Photoshop Lightroom Classic instalado. Con respecto a el material necesitarás un proyecto fotográfico sin editar (si está en RAW mucho mejor)
target_audience: A fotógrafos principiantes o profesionales. También a personas interesadas en mejorar el aspecto visual de sus fotografías y que usen Lightroom como el programa principal para ordenar y revelar sus fotos.

Lena, course student.
UPDATE 2023: a whole Bonus section that teaches you how to find success in Instagram!
Do you share your delicious creations on Instagram? Are you a food blogger, baker, pastry shop owner or an aspiring chef, frustrated that your photos never come out as good as your food in reality?
This course will help you change your Instagram photography for good, even if you are a newbie and still don't own a camera. It will teach you simple but effective tips on how to create mouthwatering food images.

courses.title: Bessere Fotos mit einfacher Bildgestaltung
courses.bio: So machst Du perfekte Fotos, die jeden überzeugen
objectives: Du weißt am Ende des Kurses, welche Faktoren für ein gutes Bild wichtig sind, und kannst sie quasi im Schlaf anwenden. So machst Du Bilder, die jeder toll findet.

1. Einführung: Was diesen Kurs auszeichnet und wie Du ihn optimal nutzen kannst
2. Bildgestaltung: Regeln sind wie Rezepte - die Drittel-Regel
Siehst Du den Wald vor lauter Bäumen?

requirements: Die Teilnehmer sollten ihre Kamera und ein einfaches Bildbearbeitungsprogramm bedienen können, um Bildausschnitte zu ändern oder Korrekturen vorzunehmen.
courses.description:
Du fotografierst gerne, doch die Beigeisterung wird von den Betrachtern Deiner Bilder nicht geteilt? Mit nur sieben Faktoren gelingt es Dir leicht bessere Bilder zu machen.

Bessere Fotos mit einfacher Bildgestaltung ist ein Kurs mit vielen Bildbeispielen und Tipps aus meiner fotografischen Praxis.

Du erfährst was ein Bild mit einem Tellergericht zu tun hat und warum der Bildausschnitt wichtig ist. Eigentlich sind alle Teile des Kurses sehr einfach. Die Anwendung macht den Unterschied. Du wirst Schritt für Schritt durch die Kapitel geführt. Zu jedem Erfolgsfaktor gibt es eine fotografische Übungsaufgabe und zu jedem Kapiel ein kleines Quizz. So kommst Du schnell voran und erreichst mühelos Dein Ziel.

Am Ende des Kurses weißt Du worauf es beim Fotografieren ankommt und Du machst mit den sieben Faktoren bessere Bilder.
target_audience: Jeder Anfänger, der gerne fotografiert und mit seinen Bildern sich und andere begeistern möchte. Wer die Grundlagen der Digitalfotografie erlernen möchte, dem hilft dieser Kurs nicht weiter.

courses.bio: Photography - Photography DSLR Skills - Take Pictures Like A Pro
objectives: Understand how manual mode works

Introduction - Welcome!: Bonus - Get Access To The Private Photography Support Group

requirements: You will need access to the internet
You will need access to a DSLR camera
courses.description:
Photography Course
Shoot your DSLR in manual mode like a professional photographer - improve your photography fast!
Who Is In Control Of Your Photography?
Did you know that your dslr camera is in charge of your photography?
That a little chip inside that camera is replacing your brain?
And it is preventing you becoming a better photographer?
The Best Photographers Shoot In Manual Mode
And this is also the skill that most casual photographers never learn.
What if you could control the camera, rather than leaving it in auto mode?
What if you could use your camera like a professional photographer does?
Becoming A Better Photographer
Relying on the camera to set exposure will mean you will never become a good photographer.
Mastering manual mode will open up a world of amazing image opportunities that will impress your friends and family.
What You Will Learn In This Photography Course
In this course we will teach you how to master your camera in a simple and easy to understand manner.
We will show you how to use your camera like the professionals and improve your photography.
100% Money Back Guarantee
Remember, if you are not happy with the course for any reason, you can get your money back in the first 30 days, no questions.
What the course will cover:
Finding your exposure using the built in light meter
How the histogram works
How to use the blinkies
The exposure triangle
Understanding stops of light
ISO, shutter speed and aperture
Lens recommendations
Who Is This Course For?
Have you purchased a DSLR lately and want to learn how to use it like a professional photographer?
Have you wondered what the manual mode does?
Do you want to deepen your understanding of photography?
Then this course is for you.
Please note, this is a beginners course and suitable for new photographers.
This is not suitable for experienced amateur photographers.
Join us…
So join us on the other side and learn how to take control of your DSLR camera and take images like the professionals!
target_audience: This course is for photographers who have a DSLR and want to learn how to use manual mode
This is a beginners course for beginner photographers
This is not a course for experienced photographers

requirements: Camera and Lens
courses.description:
Course Description:
In this course I talk about everything you need to know about getting started with astrophotography with your Sony camera.
From selecting the right gear to mastering camera settings, and finally refining your images with  post-processing techniques.
Whether you’re a beginner looking to take your first shot of the stars or an intermediate photographer seeking to enhance your skills, this course will provide you with practical knowledge, tips, and tricks tailored specifically for Sony users.
What you will learn:


Astrophotography Essentials: Understand the basics of astrophotography and how to prepare for a successful shoot.
Camera Gear Selection: Learn how to choose the right Sony cameras, lenses, and accessories for capturing the night sky.
Best Camera Settings: Get hands-on with the ideal settings for exposure, ISO, focus, and white balance to capture stars, the Milky Way, and deep-sky objects.
Planning Your Shoot: How to scout the perfect location, and use apps to plan the best nights for shooting based on weather, moon phases, and celestial events.
Post-Processing: Master editing techniques using popular software like Adobe Lightroom and Photoshop to bring your images to life. You'll learn how to correct colors, reduce noise, and enhance details in your astrophotographs.
Special Topics: Milky Way photography with star trackers.
target_audience: Beginner

courses.description:
CURSO DE FOTOGRAFÍA PROFESIONAL.
• El alumno sabrá hacer fotografías con su cámara como un profesional.
• El alumno dominará la técnica y su equipo fotográfico sacándole el máximo partido.
• El alumno dominará la composición y las poses.
• El alumno sabrá iluminar perfectamente los objetos y personas.
• El alumno sabrá realizar fotografías alucinantes de Paisajes, Modelos, Retrato, Bodas, etc.
• El alumno dominara la profundidad de campo y sabrá hacer que todos los elementos o personas de interés salgan enfocados.
• El alumno sabrá sacar fotos válidas dominando la apertura y la velocidad de obturación.
• El Alumno sabrá el porqué de las cosas conociendo las técnicas.
• El Alumno podrá dedicarse al mundo profesional de la fotografía. Mediante de realización de fotos correctas, vendiendo servicios aplicando las técnicas estudiadas.
Requisitos:
Puedes realizar el curso con cualquier cámara DSLR básica o cámara sin espejo.
El alumno necesitará un ordenador que sea capaz de ejecutar Adobe Lightroom o cualquier software de edición o revelado de fotografías.
Deberá estudiar el manual de funcionamiento de su cámara o tenerlo a mano.
No es imprescindible, pero en alguna ocasión usaremos un fotómetro. Nos vale una APP para el teléfono móvil gratuita.
No es imprescindible perro para alguna ocasión se citará la utilidad de un trípode.
Ganas de aprender y de mejorar en técnica, conocimientos y habilidades.


Descripción:
Con este curso aprenderás a realizar fotografías con tu cámara DSLR sin necesidad de tener experiencia inicial hasta conseguir fotos perfectas y vendibles.
El curso está perfectamente estructurado y su sistema de aprendizaje es tal, que resuelva las carencias típicas de los que se inician en el mundo de la fotografía que van aprendiendo todo lo relacionado con la fotografía a base de talleres, videos y seminarios sin relación ni estructura alguna.
Nos alejaremos de ideas de “gurús” y de sistemas fuera de toda lógica de resultado inciertos o personalistas.


5 horas de vídeo, más de 50 vídeos y prácticas.
Algunas de las cosas que aprenderás:
• Manejar perfectamente la cámara, decidiendo en cada momento que modo usar, tanto automático como manual.
• Conocer las limitaciones de tu equipo y solucionarlas con técnicas adecuadas.
• Conoce que máquinas, objetivos, flashes te interesan para tu equipo de fotografía para evaluar su compra.
• Que en las fotos de parejas y grupos, todos salgan perfectamente enfocados e iluminados.
• Aprenderás experimentalmente a partir de qué momento es preciso meter luz de flash para evitar la aparición de ruido. (simulando el caso de interior de iglesia).
• Trabajar con ficheros en formato RAW y saber revelarlos.
• Técnicas para fotografiar, componer e iluminar.
• Componer perfectamente un paisaje para que la foto tenga interés.
• A realizad fotos en HDR, alto rango dinámico. Tanto en paisajes como en interiores.
• Estudio de reglas de composición.
• Estudio de las leyes de precepción y uso a nuestro favor.
• Trabajar con modelos, parejas y grupos para obtener las mejores poses. Sabiendo potenciar los rasgos interesantes y ocultando los defectos mediante nuestro saber hacer.
• A preparar tus fotos tanto para su impresión como para su publicación en la Web y que se vean increíbles.


¿Para quién es este curso?


• Este curso es para cualquier persona que quiera hacer fotos perfectas, tanto de paisaje, de retrato de personas, deportivas…
• Este curso es para fotógrafos iniciados que quieres mejorar su técnica fotográfica o habilidades para mejorar en su trabajo y conseguir clientes.
• Este curso es para cualquier persona que quiera revelar y editar fotografías como un profesional.
• Este curso es para los que aún iniciados en la fotografía se frustran ante la incapacidad de hacer fotos buenas por falta de conocimiento.
• Este curso es para cualquiera que quiera disfrutar de la fotografía o trabajar de ella.

courses.title: Digitale Fotografie für Einsteiger als Video-Kurs
courses.bio: 12 Video-Kapitel von den Grundlagen der Digitalen Fotografie bis zu den Einstellungen an der Kamera
objectives: Technische Grundlager der Digitalen Fotografie - Kamera-Arten, Sensorgröße, Speicher, Brennweite ...
Wichtige Qualitätseinstellungen - Pixel, JPG, RAW, Komprimierung, ISO, Weißabgleich
Nutzung und Wirkung der einzelnen Programme - AUTO, P, A, S, AV, TV
Einstellungen für die Belichtungsmessung und Autofokus
Wirkung von Blende und Verschlusszeit für die Bildgestaltung
Einsatz für den eingebauten und Zusatzblitz - Aufhellung
requirements: Es sind keine Kenntnisse erforderlich
courses.description:
Dies ist ein spezieller Online-Video-Fotokurs mit 12 Kapiteln und entsprechenden Übungen zum Abschluss des Kurses. Der Fotokurs ist für Alle, die sich im Umgang mit ihrer Kamera nicht sicher fühlen und zu neuen Horizonten beim Fotografieren aufbrechen wollen.
Wir beginnen mit den technischen Grundlagen der Digitalen Fotografie, wie Kameraarten, Objektive, Brennweite, Sensorgröße, Cropfaktor, Pixel, Auflösung, Komprimierung und den richtigen Einstellungen für eine gute Qualität der Fotos. Denn ohne technische Grundkenntnisse kann kein künstlerisch gestaltetes Foto entstehen.
Aber auch die Bildgestaltung durch manuelle Korrekturen und Einstellungen kommen nicht zu kurz. Bei der Beschreibung der Einstellungen werden viele Beispiele aus der Praxis verwendet.


- wie stelle ich meine Belichtungsmessung richtig ein?
- wie kann ich durch die Korrektur der Belichtung ein Foto mit hellen und dunklen Bereichen richtig aufnehmen?
- wie erreiche ich ein Foto mit wenig Schärfentiefe (z.B. Hintergrund unscharf)?
- was bewirkt eine kurze oder lange Verschlusszeit (verwackelte, unscharfe Fotos oder verschwommene Objekte)
- wofür kann ich den Blitz verwenden, außer bei Aufnahmen in dunklen Räumen?
- wie stelle ich meinen Autofokus ein, damit alle Fotos scharf werden?


Grundlagen wie Sensorgröße, Cropfaktor, Pixel, Auflösung, JPG, RAW, Komprimierung, Weißabgleich, ISO-Empfindlichkeit, Messfeldereinstellungen u.v.m.
Bildgestaltung mit P, A, S, AV, TV und Manuell mit Belichtungsmessung und -Korrektur, Blende, Verschlusszeit, Blitz, Brennweite u.v.m.
target_audience: Einsteiger in die Digitale Fotografie
An alle, die ihre Kamera-Einstellungen besser kennenlernen möchten

courses.title: The Exposure Triangle. The Vital Key To Creative Photography
courses.bio: How Aperture, Shutter Speed and ISO work together to unleash your creative skills.
objectives: Exactly what the exposure triangle is
How the exposure triangle is a vital tool in your creative arsenal.
The relationship between shutter speed, aperture and ISO
The different creative possibilities of shutter speed, aperture and ISO

Introduction: Introduction | What you will learn in this course

requirements: The only requirements for this course is an interest in photography and a basic DLSR or Mirrorless camera
courses.description:
In this short video series, I am going to introduce you to  the most important element of great photography, understanding the exposure triangle.
Understanding the exposure triangle is key to pushing your photography beyond taking snaps, towards taking beautiful, professional looking images. It is the keystone of creativity in photography, the one vital element that unleashes all the power that your camera has to offer.
If you understand the three points of the triangle, aperture, shutter speed and ISO, and how they work together, you will have unlocked the secret to getting great looking images.
Newcomers to photography will often put their cameras on program mode and simply press the shutter. The results can be amazing, modern cameras flatter us. However, to truly understand the art of photography you have to understand the three points of the triangle.
In this series I will introduce you to the exposure triangle and then take you on a journey to each of it's three points, namely aperture, shutter speed and ISO. For each point on the triangle I will give you an in depth guide on what it does, how it works and most importantly, the creative possibilities it opens for you. Not only that, I will explain the relationship between the three points, how they come together to give us the correct exposure.
The course is aimed at beginners who want to get beyond the program mode of their cameras and to start exploring the huge creative possibilities that understanding the exposure triangle unleashes.
target_audience: This course is aimed at beginners just starting their journey into the amazing world of photography

courses.title: Curs complet de editare în lightroom de la A la Z

objectives: - Cum să editezi ca un profesionist, intr-un timp foarte scurt.

Ştiu care sunt tool-urile care sunt foarte rar folosite ( dar care au un potenţial fantastic ), care sunt greşelile cele mai frecvente şi unde există riscul să exagerezi şi să strici o fotografie sau cât de important este să gândeşti bine fotografia din aparat pentru a-ţi fi mai uşor în procesare.

- Diferenţa dintre profile si preseturi: cum să imporţi un profil şi cum poţi tranforma un preset intr-un profil
- Adjustment Brush – cum să selectezi dintr-un click zona pe care vrei să aplici un efect, cum să folosesti masca de luminanţă. Cum să îţi alegi un background potrivit atunci când fotografiezi pentru a folosi brus-ul mult mai rapid şi mai eficient

courses.description:
Learn Photography & Manual Mode
This course is designed for those of you who are just getting started with photography and want to learn the very basics as well as some more advanced tips and tricks. Learn how to expose your images as well as troubleshooting tough situations. We're covering everything you'll need to get started in your new photography adventure.

Lifetime Membership & Updates
Users will get access to all segments of this workshop as well as any updates we add in the future at no additional cost.


Take charge of your photography journey today by joining this workshop!


LEARN PHOTOGRAPHY FAST WITH THE PHOTOGRAPHY 101 WORKSHOP
So, you've just bought a camera and have no idea how to use it. It's time to learn photography fast. Other than those dreaded automatic modes. Luckily for you, you can learn photography fast with the Photography 101 Workshop. I've put together a video workshop containing the essentials of everything I've practiced and learned over the last five years or more.
I cover everything from the basics of your camera, getting the right exposure, choosing the right lens, and choosing the right lens. The best part? It's a go-and-grow course that will continue to grow as time goes on.
I've been a full-time photographer for quite awhile now and I feel that this course will propel you into being able take artistic photos that leave you inspired and motivated to learn more about your new camera!


THE PHOTOGRAPHY 101 WORKSHOP WILL HELP YOU TO LEARN PHOTOGRAPHY FAST.
Far faster than YouTube videos or wasting money on random books that you'll never finish reading. Here's a few of the images that you should be more than able to take after this course.

New Camera Owners
Learning Photography
Artists

objectives: Profesyonel DSLR kamera niteliğinde Mobil cihazla fotograf çekebilme.
Görme ve fotoğraflama sanatını öğrenme.
Işık ve fotoğrafta ışığın kullanımı.
Kilit bilgilerle kısa sürede etkili fotoğraf düzenleme.
Sosyal medya ve dijital platformlarda profesyonel içerik ve konsept olusturmak.

DERSLER: 3. PORTRE ÇEKİMLERDE YÜZ ŞEKİLLERİ VE KAMERA AÇISI

requirements: Tek gereksinim kameralı bir cep telefonu. En etkili uygulamalarla bilmeniz gereken herseyi ogreneceksiniz.
courses.description:
Bu online fotoğrafçılık kursu, akıllı telefon kullansanız da harika fotoğraflar çekmeyi  öğretecek.


Bu fotoğrafçılık kursu, fotoğrafçılıkla çok az deneyiminiz olsa veya hiç olmasanız bile size fotoğrafçılığın içini ve dışını öğretmek için tasarlanmıştır, kalabalığın arasından sıyrılmanıza ve satış yapmanıza yardımcı olacak karlı görüntüler oluşturmanıza yardımcı olur.


Olağanüstü Görüntüler Yaratmak için Usta Fotoğraf Teknikleri!


Belirli stiller veya teçhizatın nasıl kullanılacağına odaklanan çok sayıda dijital fotoğrafçılık kursu olsa da, başlangıç seviyesinden ileri seviyeye kadar olan fotoğrafçılar için bunun gibi kapsamlı bir kurs bulmak zor.


Bu kurs, becerilerini geliştirmek, harika fotoğraflar çekmek ve fotoğraflarından para kazanmak isteyen her seviyeden fotoğrafçı için tasarlanmıştır.


Ne öğreneceksin:


Kameraların nasıl çalıştığını ve hangi donanıma ihtiyacınız olduğunu anlayın


Manuel modda çekimde ustalaşın ve kameranızı anlayın


Bütçeniz ne olursa olsun hangi ekipmanı satın almanız gerektiğini bilin


Gerçek dünya senaryolarında nasıl çekim yaptığımızı görmek için pratik gösterimlerimizi takip edin


Daha iyi fotoğraflar çekmek için kompozisyon, ışıklandırma ve uygun ayarları kullanın


Fotoğrafları daha da iyi görünmeleri için profesyonelce düzenleyin


Bir fotoğrafçılık işi kurmayı öğrenin ve yeni becerilerinizden para kazanın
Kanunları Öğrenin ve Kodu Kırın


Bazı insanların neden diğerlerinden daha iyi fotoğrafçı olduğu bir gizem olmak zorunda değil. İyi fotoğrafçılar, neyin kötü veya harika bir görüntü olarak kabul edildiğini belirleyen kompozisyon yasalarını öğrendiler.


Bu ders, ışık yasaları ve görüntülerimizi oluştururken sahip oldukları etki gibi düzenli bir evrende bu yasaların neler olduğunu belirlemeyi amaçlar.


Kurs ayrıca, neyin iyi bir kompozisyon oluşturduğunu sezgisel olarak bilen ve neyin güzel göründüğünü bilen, içinizdeki dahili güzellik dedektörünü takdir etmeniz için size ilham vermeyi amaçlamaktadır. Bunu bilinçaltı bir farkındalıktan bilinçli bir farkındalığa taşıyarak, kendinizi harika görüntüleri tanımak ve yaratmak için eğitebilirsiniz.


Bir izleyicinin bir görseli nasıl tükettiğinin aşamalarını öğreneceksiniz:


Gözler


Akıl


Kalp


eller


Ayrıca bir görüntünün üç temel öğesini de öğreneceksiniz:


Işık


Ders


Arka fon


Dahil edilen dersler:


Düzenlenmiş Evren


Güzellik Dedektörü


Işık Olsun


Fotoğrafçının Oyun Alanı


faaliyetler


--------------------------------


Işığı Görmek - Yaratıcı Fotoğrafçılık Kompozisyon Masterclass Bölüm 3


Fotoğrafçılığın ışığı görebilmekle ilgili olduğunu biliyor muydunuz?


Sert ışığın ve yumuşak ışığın farklı özelliklerini anlıyor musunuz?


Görüntünüzde çok farklı efektler elde etmek için bu ışık kaynaklarını kullanabileceğinizi biliyor muydunuz?


Çeşitli ışıkların aslında farklı renk sıcaklıklarına sahip olduğunu ve doğru kullanıldığında görüntünüzün ruh halini etkileyebileceğini biliyor muydunuz?


Işığı Görmeyi ve Onu Kucaklamayı Öğrenin


Işığı görmek, bir fotoğrafçının öğrenebileceği en önemli beceridir, fotoğrafçılığın temelidir.


Tüm iyi fotoğrafçılar ışığın gözlemcisi olmayı öğrendiler, ışık avcısı olmayı öğrendiler. Işık doğru değilse, iyi bir fotoğrafçı kamerasını kaldırmaz bile.


Bu kursta hem Sert Işık hem de Yumuşak Işığın özelliklerini ve kullanımlarını keşfedeceğiz. Diyagramlar ve görüntü örnekleri aracılığıyla ışığın nesneye nasıl düştüğünü ve kameraya nasıl geri yansıdığını inceleyeceğiz.


Açık renk sıcaklığı da yardımcı bir şema ile açıklanacaktır.


Dahil edilen dersler:


Işığı görmek


Sert ışık


Yumuşak Işık


Renk Sıcaklığı


--------------------------------


Işığı Kontrol Etmek - Yaratıcı Fotoğrafçılık Kompozisyon Masterclass Bölüm 4


Bir fotoğrafçı olarak ışığı kontrol etme yeteneğiniz olduğunu biliyor muydunuz?


Ayaklarınızı hareket ettirmek, nesnenizi hareket ettirmek veya ışığınızı hareket ettirmek gibi bazı basit teknikleri uygulayarak, görüntülerinizi dramatik bir şekilde değiştirebileceğinizi mi?


Sahneyi çalıştırarak, dramatik ve güçlü ile samimi ve nazik arasında değişen, görüntülerinizde oluşturabileceğiniz bir dizi efekte sahip misiniz?


Usta Bir Fotoğrafçı Olmak İçin Sahnede Çalışmayı Öğrenin


Usta bir fotoğrafçı olmak için sahneyi kullanmayı öğrenmelisiniz.


Bu kursta ayaklarınızı nasıl hareket ettireceğinizi öğreneceksiniz.


Bir fotoğrafçı olarak, izleyicinin gözleri sizsiniz. Nereye giderseniz gidin, izleyicinizi de yanınızda götürüyorsunuz. Sizin bakış açınız onların bakış açısı olur.


Bu derste, açıklayıcı örneklerle aşağıdaki bakış açılarının esasını inceleyeceğiz:


Önünde


Arka


Yandan


Konunuzun Altında


Konunuzun Üstünde


Kuşbakışı


Karınca Görünümü


yakın çekim


Makro Görünümü


Uzak


İkinci kontrol yöntemi, nesnenizi hareket ettirmektir. Bu, tüm konuyu bir konumdan diğerine kelimenin tam anlamıyla taşımaktan, bir kişi söz konusu olduğunda konuyu ince bir şekilde hareket ettirmeye veya duygularını ifade etmeye kadar değişebilir.


Bu kursta, nesnelerimizi hareket ettirirken aşağıdakilerin sahip olabileceği etkileri inceleyeceğiz:


Konunuzu Taşıyın


Basit Arka Plan


Bağlam Sağlama


Eşitsizlik Yaratmak


Arka Planları Kırpma


İnce Hareketler


Duyguları Gösterme


Dramatik Hareketler


Son seçenek ışığı hareket ettirmektir. Işığın geldiği yöne göre elde edilen farklı etkileri öğreneceksiniz.


Bunu göstermek için sanal stüdyoda ışık yönünün yararlı örneklerini inceleyeceğiz.


Dahil edilen dersler:


Sahne Çalışması


Ayaklarınızı Hareket Ettirmek


Konunuzu Taşımak


Işığını Hareket Ettir
target_audience: Fotograf alanında profesyonel olmaya ilk adımı atmak , Etkili kaliteli sosyal medya yönetimi için hızlı ve pratik icerik uretmek ,
Cep telefonunuzla nasıl daha iyi fotoğraflar çekebileceğinizi ve fotoğrafçılığınızı nasıl geliştirebileceğinizi öğrenmek istiyor olabilirsiniz.

courses.title: Guia Completo do Adobe Lightroom Classic: Aprenda a Editar

objectives: Importação de fotos para o Lightroom
Organização e classificação de imagens
Edição de cores, exposição, contraste e nitidez
Retoques e ajustes avançados em imagens

Exportação de imagens para diferentes formatos e mídias

requirements: PC, Mac, e Mobile Device
Lightroom CC
courses.description:
Olá, aqui é o Carlos Rincon, Educador, Fotógrafo e especialista em Photoshop e Lightroom.
Se você deseja aprimorar suas habilidades em edição de fotos, o Curso de Adobe Lightroom é a escolha perfeita para você. Com este curso, você aprenderá como usar o software Lightroom para aprimorar suas imagens e criar trabalhos incríveis.
O Adobe Lightroom Classic é um software de edição de fotos poderoso e versátil usado por fotógrafos profissionais e amadores em todo o mundo. Com o Lightroom Classic, você pode importar, organizar, editar e exportar suas fotos em vários formatos para compartilhar com amigos, clientes ou público em geral.
Neste guia completo, vamos explorar todos os recursos do Adobe Lightroom Classic e mostrar como você pode usá-lo para editar suas fotos como um profissional. A partir de um tutorial básico sobre como importar suas fotos até técnicas avançadas de edição, você encontrará tudo o que precisa saber sobre o Lightroom Classic.
Introdução ao Adobe Lightroom Classic Nesta seção, vamos começar com uma introdução ao Adobe Lightroom Classic e descobrir como ele pode ajudá-lo a melhorar suas habilidades de edição de fotos.
O que é o Adobe Lightroom Classic?
Quais são os recursos do Lightroom Classic?
Como instalar o Lightroom Classic em seu computador?
Importação e organização de fotos Antes de começar a editar suas fotos, é importante importá-las corretamente e organizá-las para facilitar o acesso posterior. Nesta seção, mostraremos como importar e organizar suas fotos usando o Lightroom Classic.
Como importar fotos no Lightroom Classic?
Como organizar suas fotos em coleções e pastas?
Como adicionar palavras-chave e metadados para facilitar a pesquisa?
Técnicas de edição básicas Agora que suas fotos estão organizadas, é hora de começar a editá-las. Nesta seção, você aprenderá técnicas básicas de edição, como ajustar a exposição, temperatura de cor e contraste.
Como ajustar a exposição em suas fotos?
Como equilibrar a temperatura de cor em suas fotos?
Como ajustar o contraste e a nitidez em suas fotos?
Técnicas de edição avançadas Depois de aprender as técnicas básicas de edição, é hora de explorar algumas técnicas avançadas de edição. Nesta seção, mostraremos como criar efeitos de cor, ajustar a nitidez e adicionar efeitos de desfoque.
Como criar efeitos de cor em suas fotos?
Como ajustar a nitidez em suas fotos?
Como adicionar efeitos de desfoque às suas fotos?
Exportação de fotos Depois de concluir a edição de suas fotos, é hora de exportá-las para uso posterior. Nesta seção, mostraremos como exportar suas fotos em vários formatos para compartilhar com amigos, clientes ou público em geral.
Como exportar fotos em formato JPEG ou RAW?
Como ajustar as configurações de exportação para diferentes usos?
Como compartilhar suas fotos nas redes sociais ou em sites de compartilhamento de fotos?
Conclusão O Adobe Lightroom Classic é uma ferramenta poderosa e versátil para edição de fotos, e com as técnicas e dicas fornecidas neste guia completo, você pode melhorar suas habilidades de edição de fotos

courses.description:
>> Please Read This <<
I'm editing the english version of this course.
If you want to be informed when it will be online, please send me a private message
Sostituire gli Sfondi alle tue foto di Still Life non è mai stato così Semplice!
Non importa che tu abbia tantissimo spazio a disposizione o se scatti nel salotto di casa.
In questo corso ti mostrerò tutto quello che c’è da sapere per ambientare i tuoi scatti in post produzione.
Ti è mai capitato di sostituire lo sfondo di una tua foto e di ottenere una sorta di effetto “immagine incollata“?
Ecco, in questo corso scoprirai come evitarlo e quanto facile sia, una volta capito il meccanismo, poter ambientare i tuoi scatti dove e come preferisci.
Realizzerò assieme a te 3 Fotografie di barattoli, diversi tra loro ma con una caratteristica comune:
essendo oggetti tondi, sono  difficili da illuminare bene e riflettono tutto quello che c’è attorno,  compresa la luce parassita che se ne va in giro per il set!
Ti mostrerò quindi cosa fare per illuminarli correttamente e ti spiegherò:
le tecniche da utilizzare in fase di scatto per evitare l’effetto “immagine incollata”
come controllare la luce per evitare che se ne vada per conto proprio
i trucchi per creare effetti di luce spot sullo sfondo e come creare ombre assolutamente realistiche
Organizzerai la tua postazione di scatto remoto, per ottimizzare al meglio i tuoi shooting e verificare sin da subito come disporre al meglio la luce.
Per ogni scatto entreremo nel vivo sia dello Sviluppo dei file Raw che poi dell’editing degli scatti in Photoshop per la sostituzione dello sfondo.
Un video corso completo, che ti accompagna dalla preparazione del set all’editing delle immagini:
senza saltare nessun aspetto fondamentale


senza dilungarsi in inutili chiacchiere
senza proclami autocelebrativi
target_audience: appassionati di fotografia intenzionati ad imparare le tecniche dello Still Life
fotografi professionisti di altri settori (ritratti, cerimonie, reportage) che vogliono offrire ai propri clienti nuovi servizi
personale di webagency o aziende con forte presenza sul web
il corso NON E' ADATTO ad un principiante

courses.title: Capture One: Zero to Sixty
courses.bio: Master Capture One for complete control over your photographic organization and editing.
objectives: Creating and managing catalogs and sessions.
Organizing their photographic collection.
Editing images with professional tools to create their vision.
Exporting variants suited for a specific purpose.
requirements: No prior skills using Capture One are necessary, though you do need the Capture One software to follow along with the examples.
courses.description: In this complete class, we will examine the Capture One software from beginning to end. Even if you haven't used Capture One before, we will get you up to speed. And if you've used the software for some time, we will help you maximize your effectiveness and efficiency. We begin with image organization, because this is where most people have significant issues. We will build a catalog and understand how they operate. Then we will use Capture One to manage the actual data on your machine. Of course, once we use Capture One to manage your image, we will need to organize  images within Capture One.  This is the album and group structure, which we will tackle next. The middle portion of the class is all about image editing. We will explore exposure, contrast, color control, white balance, noise reduction, detail sharpening and more in our editing section. This culminates with a full course on masking and layering. Capture One is also the most powerful tethering tool in the world, so we will examine how this feature works. Lastly, we will need to export variants to your specifications on demand and easily. I hope you join us for a fun time exploring one of the most powerful editors and organizers in the photographic world.
target_audience: Beginner and intermediate level Capture One users or photographers who want to expand their post-processing workflow.

LIVE DEMO: La Lunga Esposizione pt. 2

requirements: Nessun requisito
courses.description:
Entra nell'enorme e creativo mondo della fotografia digitale, apprendendo dalle basi fino alla più avanzata tecnica fotografica.
Ogni lezione è mirata a farti conoscere tutti i dettagli e le possibilità fotografiche, per tirar fuori il meglio dai tuoi scatti, partendo dalla tecnica, passando per la composizione, e terminando con la post-produzione.


Un corso completo per imparare con la pratica ad avere foto mozzafiato!


Non buttare via il tuo tempo con i classici corsi mirati al singolo ambito, che molto spesso disperdono le conoscenze in vari giri di parole inutili e noiosi!
Questo corso è progettato per permetterti di apprendere la fotografia in tutto e per tutto, grazie a lezioni leggere ma intense ed una scaletta studiata appositamente per conoscere la fotografia per step.
Tutto ciò ti aiuterà non solo a comprendere gli enormi tecnicismi che potrebbero scoraggiarti studiando la fotografia senza questo corso, ma anche ad assimilare tutti i concetti fotografici grazie semplici metafore o lezioni pratiche sul campo.


Cosa apprenderai:
Come funziona un apparecchio fotografico e di quale strumento hai bisogno
Come funziona il sensore fotografico
Quali sono le potenzialità del file RAW
Come padroneggiare l'esposizione con la modalità manuale
Come leggere un istogramma fotografico
Come inquadrare i tuoi soggetti per ottenere foto piene di significato emotivo
Quali accessori acquistare per effettuare degli scatti tecnicamente migliori
Quando e come utilizzare il flash per realizzare splendidi book fotografici
Come applicare i ragionamenti al mondo reale grazie alle lezioni pratiche sul campo
Come correggere e ritoccare i tuoi scatti per tirar fuori il meglio dal tuo file RAW
Come lavorare da fotografo iniziando a guadagnare con i tuoi scatti


Quali stili fotografici apprenderai:
Fotografia di Paesaggio
Fotografia Street
Fotografia di Ritratto
Lunghe esposizioni
Lightpainting
Fotografia notturna
Astrofotografia
Fotografia sportiva
Fotografia con il drone
Fotografia con lo smartphone
Fotografia analogica
Fotografia Macro


Insomma che tu sia già un fotoamatore o che tu abbia semplicemente appena acquistato la tua fotocamera reflex, questo corso è mirato a farti diventare un fotografo professionista ed a permetterti di padroneggiare completamente la tua attrezzatura!


Che tu voglia fotografare paesaggi, ritratti, natura in generale, o che tu voglia apprendere i segreti per avere foto più belle e d'impatto, o se vorrai semplicemente avviare la tua attività fotografica o vendere i tuoi scatti tramite il web, questo corso ti darà delle dritte per farlo!


Contenuto del corso
Questo corso è mirato a far apprendere i segreti della fotografia in maniera semplice ma concreta, utilizzando metafore e concetti semplici per spiegare contenuti di estrema tecnicità.
Partirai con l'apprendere il funzionamento interno della tua fotocamera, in modo da poter capire cosa avviene all'interno dello strumento e poter quindi comprendere come evitare gli errori più comuni effettuati dai principianti.
Passeremo quindi a padroneggiare i parametri che gestiscono l'esposizione delle tue fotografie, applicando con logica i settaggi che ti permetteranno di ottenere lo scatto a cui puntavi.
Ci concentreremo quindi sul significato e la dinamicità della composizione, in modo da veicolare un messaggio attraverso le nostre foto creando così il nostro stile fotografico personale, in base ai propri gusti.
Analizzeremo gli strumenti che ci permetteranno di fare tutto ciò, effettuando bellissime foto aeree o con qualsiasi dispositivo fotografico.
Infine imparerai a correggere o semplicemente sviluppare i tuoi scatti digitali con i più conosci software di ritocco fotografico.


Grazie alla nuova funzione "compiti", potrò seguirti e valutare i tuoi progressi in tempo reale, proprio come un tutor!
Basterà inviare la tua foto nell'assegnazione, per ricevere una mia valutazione e dei consigli mirati per migliorare la tua tecnica fotografica.



Chi sarà il tuo istruttore?
Mi chiamo Stefano Venneri. Lavoro ormai da oltre 10 anni come sviluppatore software e fotografo presso la mia azienda.
Come sviluppatore, chi meglio di me potrebbe insegnare un ragionamento logico o semplicemente il funzionamento tecnico di una fotocamera o di un programma?!
Come fotografo invece, potrò quindi guidarti, grazie alla mia esperienza nel mondo della fotografia, a soddisfare i tuoi clienti ma anche lasciare a bocca aperta tutti coloro i quali guarderanno i tuoi scatti.
Da anni ormai sono addentrato nel modo dell'insegnamento di programmazione informatica e fotografia digitale, grazie a corsi online sui più blasonati e-learning o direttamente tramite workshop fotografici in-loco presso la mia, o altre, associazioni fotografiche situate in Italia.


Cosa aspetti! Non vedo l'ora di vedere i tuoi scatti e di condividere con te, tutti i segreti per scattare foto migliori!
E per qualsiasi domanda, sarò pronto a risponderti nell'apposita sezione dedicata.
target_audience: Tutti gli appassionati di fotografia, o coloro che vogliono mettersi in gioco per creare la propria attività fotografica

courses.description:
Trick Photography & Special Effects (2nd Edition) - Your complete instructional guide on taking breathtaking special effects shots and cool images your friends won't believe... It comes with over 270 pages of instruction and contains over 300 creative photographs created by some of the most talented photographic artists worldwide.


Inside the course, you will learn things like...
How to create stunning special effects images that other people simply won't even understand - they'll think you've spent hours with Photoshop, but in reality they're just regular photos...
How to create images of objects that appear to levitate in mid-air

The secret behind stitching and stacking multiple light paintings together

Why your flatbed scanner is the key to some of the coolest, wackiest pictures you've ever seen
Bonus: Advice on flashes and how how to use them to beautifully light up your subject
Bonus: Advice and recommendations for filters and Photoshop plug-ins
Bonus: How to market stock photographs and art photographs in order to sell them for profit
Bonus: General advice on adjusting camera settings so you can take a great photo using any camera in any situation
and much more...
This amazing guide will show you exactly how to break through the ranks of "ordinary" photographers and become the person who takes shots that amaze everybody.


This course is broken down into three modules:
Module 1: Light Painting and Long Exposure Effects

Module 3: Photoshop Projects (Requires Adobe Photoshop)

requirements: A basic interest in photography and a desire to learn
No prior photography experience required
Not mandatory but recommended: a digital camera (DSLR, mirrorless, or compact). You can purchase it after doing a few basic lessons
courses.description:
This online, practical, and hands-on photography course is specifically designed for individuals who are new to photography and wish to build a solid foundation in the craft. Throughout the course, you will gain a comprehensive understanding of how a camera operates, including the mechanics behind different types of cameras and lenses. You will explore the various settings available on your camera, such as aperture, shutter speed, and ISO, learning how each setting affects your images. Additionally, we will look at essential equipment that can enhance your photography, such as tripods and lens filters, helping you make informed decisions on what to invest in.


This is a practical course where I take you outdoors, allowing you to experience shooting portraits, street scenes, and nature. It includes assignments, and I will always provide you with feedback.


The course will also cover key principles of image composition—such as the rule of thirds, leading lines, and framing techniques—empowering you to create visually compelling photographs. Furthermore, you will learn how to interpret the information displayed on your camera screen, including histograms and exposure indicators, which will assist you in capturing perfectly exposed images.


By the end of the course, you will understand the technical aspects of photography and how to apply these skills creatively, significantly enhancing your photographic abilities.


Join me for this practical and enjoyable course and take your photography to a whole new level!
target_audience: Beginner Photographers with little to no prior experience in photography
Hobbyists looking to improve their photography skills
Aspiring photographers who want to learn the fundamentals and pursue a career in photography.
Individuals interested in understanding camera mechanics and settings
Those wanting to learn about essential photography equipment
People interested in mastering image composition techniques
Anyone seeking constructive feedback on their photography work

objectives: Aprenderás a tomar bellas fotografías nocturnas, ¡como los profesionales!
¡Serás más feliz que nunca con las fotos que tomes!

requirements: Si bien este curso fue creado para fotógrafos principiantes, sería beneficioso para ti comprender conceptos básicos de fotografía como apertura, velocidad de obturación e ISO. Hemos incluido una lección de actualización que te pondrá al día si lo necesitas.
Este es un gran complemento de nuestra Masterclass de Fotografía, que to pondrá al día para sumergirte en este curso.
Puedes usar cualquier cámara para tomar excelentes fotos nocturnas. Utilizaremos cámaras Canon, Nikon, Leica y Fujifilm DSLR y Mirrorless + smartphones como el iPhone
courses.description:
¡TU PUEDES TOMAR HERMOSAS FOTOS DE NOCHE!
Por eso estás aquí, ¿verdad?
Nos encanta mostrarte cómo tomar tus propias e increíbles fotos de noche y con poca luz.
Con este curso completo de fotografía nocturna, aprenderás los entresijos del equipo que recomendamos, la configuración que usamos, los consejos de composición que tenemos y el proceso de edición de fotos que usamos para terminar con fotos nocturnas galardonadas.
¡Síguenos mientras nos dirigimos al Parque Nacional Joshua Tree para grabar este curso de fotografía nocturna!
En este curso combinamos entretenimiento + aprendizaje en este completo detrás de escena. No solo estaremos simplemente sentados detrás del escritorio de nuestra computadora, mostrándote diapositivas. Estaremos en el campo, mostrándote exactamente lo que hacemos para tomar nuestras propias fotos nocturnas.


Temas clave que aprenderás en este curso de fotografía nocturna:
Qué equipo necesitas para hacer fotografía nocturna
Cómo prepararte para su aventura fotográfica
Ajustes de cámara básicos, como velocidad de obturación, apertura e ISO
Cómo componer hermosas fotos nocturnas
Usar un disparador remoto para tomar exposiciones prolongadas
Cómo tomar fotos de trazos de luz
Componer creativas fotos nocturnas de las estrellas
Cómo tomar fotografías de la luna
Cómo editar fotos nocturnas para que se vean aún mejor


Bonificaciones del curso
Hojas de trucos descargables
Lecciones "detrás de escena"
Edición completa de casos de estudio
Tareas prácticas
Cuestionarios para poner a prueba tus conocimientos


¿Por qué aprender con nosotros?
Somos tres instructores que amamos la fotografía y amamos enseñar. Somos los instructores de la Masterclass de fotografía más vendida. Siempre tomamos los comentarios de nuestros estudiantes y los usamos para mejorar nuestros cursos. Es por eso que creamos este curso en primer lugar, porque los estudiantes de otros cursos de fotografía lo pidieron.


Lo que dicen los estudiantes sobre nuestros cursos:
- Absolutamente he amado, amado, amado este curso. - Ashonti
- Realmente me gusta este curso. Es el mejor curso que he tomado sobre fotografía. Me han gustado mucho Phil y Sam, y creo que si sigues el curso, también te gustarán :D - TJ
- ¡Me encantó este curso! Los conceptos básicos de la fotografía están completamente cubiertos, muchos ejemplos prácticos, los tutores fueron muy claros en sus explicaciones y respondieron muy rápidamente a todas las preguntas. - Ornella
- Curso perfecto para fotógrafos principiantes e intermedios. La duración de las lecciones es excelente, puedes moverte a tu propio ritmo sin necesidad de sentarte durante horas en una sola clase. - Omar


Si quieres tomar buenas fotos nocturnas, este es el curso para ti.
Recuerda, tenemos una garantía de devolución del 100% del dinero en 30 días. No hay razón para dudar. ¡Inscríbete ahora, fíjate si disfrutas del curso y comienza a tomar mejores fotos hoy!


Saludos,
Phil, Will y Sam
target_audience: Fotógrafos principiantes que deseas llevar sus habilidades al siguiente nivel
Fotógrafos intermedios que desean desarrollar habilidades en un oficio en particular
Cualquiera que quiera tomar mejores fotos de noche o en situaciones de poca luz

courses.title: Enhancing Photos with Photoshop
courses.bio: Use Photoshop to fix colors, straighten horizons, combine multiple exposures, contrast and brightness.

Fixing Color Problems: Black and White and Sepia Filter Effects
Fixing Photographer Errors: Clone over blemishes or unwanted people
Crop an image to artistic proportions

requirements: You should be able to manage files and folders with cut, copy and paste operations.
courses.description:
Do you know what makes a compelling photograph? At the end of this course you will be able to use Photoshop to correct color cast problems, improve composition, straighten the horizon on crooked images, combine multiple images into one correct exposure, use multiple layers in an image and sharpen fuzzy pictures.
This class is designed for the first-time user of Photoshop.  I'll show you the important menus and options without skipping important steps.
Each lesson resource includes the photos used in the videos plus several more similar images that need corrections which you can use to reinforce what you have just learned.
target_audience: Anyone who likes to enhance their photography with Photoshop

courses.title: Fine Art Compositing with Photoshop CC
courses.bio: Express your conceptual vision and master Photoshop skills
objectives: Understand and apply the most powerful Photoshop tool - The Curves
Create precise selections and modify them
Work efficiently with Masks
Combine various elements to create a Collage effect
Perform Color and Luminosity Adjustments
Express your own unique artistic vision with the use of presented techniques

Enter the Magic World of Photo Compositi: Isolating Model from the Background - Pen Tool
Refining the Mask - the Brush Tool

requirements: Ideally Photoshop CC, trial free version is more than enough.
No prior knowledge of Photoshop is necessary, I will explain all the techniques in a simple way
We will work with high quality images provided as supplementary materials to help you move on even faster!
courses.description:
Welcome to my course “Fine Art Compositing with Photoshop CC”!

This course focuses on creating from scratch a composite artwork inspired by the beauty of Art Nouveau portraits painted at the end of the 19th century. To achieve harmonious result and maintain at the same time the fine art sensibility I have blended a contemporary digital portrait with stylised vintage botanic elements.
We will be working with Photoshop’s most powerful tools such as curves, blend modes and masks. The practice includes creating precise selections, luminosity and color adjustments and gradient light effects. You are totally free to repeat more difficult steps to polish your skills and revisit particular videos to refresh your knowledge when needed.
My aim is to ignite your inspiration by showing that starting with a simple photo you can create a spectacular composite image. Don't limit yourself - use your imagination!
When you join me in the course you will get instant access to a high quality portrait and the vector vintage botanic illustration which we will use as a base during the hands-on part of the course. You will get the original files and final versions with all editable Photoshop layers included.

Working with the supporting materials is an extremely effective way to master Photoshop techniques. They allow you to start the course immediately with no time wasted on research and preparations.
Even if you don’t have experience with Photoshop you will be able to follow me along and starting with simple techniques you will gradually build up your skills.
Join me and let’s together unlock hidden potential in your photographs. See you inside the course!
Kasia
target_audience: Take this course if you want to learn in detail powerful and flexible Photoshop techniques to improve your photos
Take this course if you are an artist and would like to introduce digital techniques in your creative process
Take this course if you want to learn how to create digital artwork that sells well on image stocks like Sutterstock, iStock, Alamy and others
Take this course if you want to develop artistic skills in fields of creative photo processing
Take this course if you love art & photography!

courses.title: Lo Still Life con 1 solo Flash - SUB ENG
courses.bio: Crea il tuo Stile Personale per Pubblicità | Cataloghi | e-Commerce
objectives: Imparerai a gestire e modellare la Luce
Vedrai piccoli accessori fare grandi differenze
Apprenderai le migliori tecniche utilizzate dai professionisti

Inizia qui: Preparazione del set e degli accessori per la luce
Crea la tua Postazione di Scatto Remoto: Collegare la macchina fotografica al computer
Esempio pratico con uno shooting preparato ad-hoc
Ma è davvero così importante preparare una Postazione di Scatto Remoto?
Il Secondo Scatto: La Lametta: La Lametta: i giochi di luce
La Lametta: un semplice effetto speciale
La Post Produzione: Il Profumo: Lo sviluppo del Raw
Il Profumo: La fusione in Photoshop

requirements: Conoscenza di come funziona una reflex digitale
Un software per lo sviluppo del raw ed uno per la fusione dei file (es.: Photoshop)
Disporre di un flash, meglio se con lampada pilota
courses.description:
ADDED ENGLISH SUBTITLES!


E' incredibile quello che puoi realizzare utilizzando 1 SOLO FLASH!
Il controllo della luce è alla base della fotografia di Still Life.
E se la controlli ti basterà un'attrezzatura base per ottenere la luce che vuoi tu!

Assisterai alla realizzazione delle 3 fotografie che vedi nel video di presentazione e in sole 2 ore imparerai:
come e dove reperire i materiali per gli sfondi

quali accessori sono indispensabili per lo still life e perchè

come reperirli a basso costo o auto-costruirli
Vedrai nel dettaglio la tecnica del multi-scatto, che consente di illuminare i prodotti step by step ed ottenere immagini più tridimensionali.

Organizzerai la tua postazione di scatto remoto, per ottimizzare i tuoi shooting e verificare sin da subito come disporre il tuo flash.

Dopo ogni scatto si passa direttamente allo sviluppo dei file raw e poi alla fusione degli scatti in Photoshop, dando sguardo a come si usano le maschere e gli strumenti per la rimozione delle imperfezioni.
Un video corso completo, che ti accompagna dalla preparazione del set all'editing delle immagini:
senza saltare alcun aspetto

senza dilungarsi in inutili chiacchiere

senza proclami autocelebrativi
Lasciamo che siano le immagini a parlare per noi!
target_audience: appassionati di fotografia intenzionati ad imparare le tecniche dello Still Life
fotografi professionisti di altri settori (ritratti, cerimonie, reportage) che vogliono offrire ai propri clienti nuovi servizi
addetti all'ecommerce assunti in azienda che vogliono migliorare le foto ai propri prodotti
il corso NON E' ADATTO ad un principiante

courses.title: Edición digital con GIMP
courses.bio: Herramientas y técnicas de edición y composición de imágenes digitales
objectives: Manipular los elementos básicos de una imágen: tamaño, aspecto y formato.
Utilizar selecciones y máscaras para combinar imágenes y limitar correcciones.
Aplicar con éxito la mayoría de herramientas de edición.
Manipular imágenes con técnicas de nivel intermedio: dodge & burn, clonado y saneado etc.

Básicos en GIMP: Los modelos de color HSV y HSL
Selecciones y máscaras: Las selecciones de rectángulo y elipse
Selección difusa y selección por color
Selección de tijeras y selección de primer plano
Técnicas de edición: La temperatura de color y la saturación

requirements: No se necesita experiencia previa. El curso está pensado para principiantes.
courses.description:
Si quieres aprender a editar y componer tus imágenes con un programa gratuito y sin conocimientos previos, no busques más.


Este curso está pensado para principiantes: cada una de las clases se compone de dos secciones: primero,  una breve introducción, donde se exponen los conceptos en los que se basan las herramientas o técnicas que se tratarán a lo largo de la clase. Y a continuación una parte práctica, con uno o más ejercicios guiados, paso a paso, y en los que se utilizan imágenes disponibles en los recursos de la lección.


Las lecciones están agrupadas en 3 bloques temáticos:


El bloque uno está enfocado en lo siguiente:
-Interfaz del programa, configuración y preferencias.
-Analisis de imágenes y exposición de conceptos básicos en la edición digital.
-Procedimientos y herramientas de edición básica.


El segundo bloque está dedicado casi en su totalidad a los procedimientos de selección y aplicación de máscaras de capa y trata:
-Todas las herramientas de selección disponibles en el programa.
-Procedimientos de composición básicos.
-Creación y registro de máscaras.
-Introducción a los modos de mezcla de capas.


En el tercer y último bloque, se exponen y muestran algunas técnicas de edición y composición aplicando los conocimientos de las 20 primeras lecciones, y se amplia el repertorio de herramientas de manipulación del color,  entre ellas:
-Rango dinámico, contraste y manipulación aislada de los parámetros de color.
-Color match para harmonizar el color en composiciones o aplicar determinados tonos a imágenes o zonas de éstas.
-Técnicas básicas de retoque y varios ejemplos de aplicación en distintos tipos de fotografía.
-Técnicas de manipulación basadas en la aplicación de filtros.


El curso, en general, no sólo está pensado para que aprendas a utilizar el programa de GIMP, sino que también, gracias a los conceptos expuestos en la teoría, seas capaz de tener una idea general de los procedimientos de edición y poder cambiar fácilmente a programas algo más sofisticados utilizados en el campo profesional.


Con los contenidos deberías ser capaz de adquirir absoluta autonomía en trabajos de composición y edición de complejidad intermedia.


Antes de inscribirte consulta por favor las vistas previas de las clases, te darán una buena idea de la dinámica del curso.
target_audience: A todos aquellos/aquellas con interés en la edición de imágenes digitales, en especial, sin conocimientos previos.

If you have a Mac computer and you love taking photos with your iPhone or digital camera, this course will answer all your questions.
Whether you want to learn how to Edit your photos to look professional or whether you just want to tidy up thousands of photos and videos in your library, this course will cover all the aspects of this powerful yet easy to use application.
Photos come free with all Mac computers and the new version, offers powerful tools to Edit, Organise and Share your lovely memories and make them stand out!
You don't need any technical knowledge about photography, as I will cover all that you need to know about managing your photos.


What will you learn?

How to edit with basic adjustment tools and professional tools as well
What are the best practices to edit your photos
All the different ways you can save and share your images

And much more


What editing tools will you learn?
Lighting
Colour
Black and White
White Balance
Retouch and Clone
Red-eye
Levels
Curves
Definition

Noise Reduction

What skills will you gain out of this course?
Be completely comfortable using the Photos app

You'll be able to edit your photos with ease making them look professional and stand out

Why should you take this course?

I have have been using mac apps for almost 2 decades and saw all changes and nuances of the mac software and I am passionate about helping people master their skills and become confident with their products and software. I am here for the students.

Have a meaningful day!
Frank

Photographers
Anyone with Mac OS High Sierra 10.13 and Catalina 10.15 would benefits from all features discussed in this course

courses.title: Practical Composition in Photography
courses.bio: Practical Composition in Photography for beginners and advanced prhotographers
objectives: Better understanding of composition in photography
Practical skills that will enrich your photography
Control of frame and narrative in photography
Excellent visual skills for making better photographs

Introduction: Working with a viewfinder or screen.
Viewer behavior when viewing photographs, how to predict the viewer's reaction.
Rule of thirds and Golden Ratio.
The importance of background and horizon in photography.
Leading lines and dynamics in the frame.
Central composition and the magic of the square.
Rhythm, lines, geometric objects, and their use in your work.
The significance of color in composition.
Learning to see. Black and white vs color images.

requirements: Basic understanding of digital or analog photo camera
courses.description:
This course offers video lectures to teach practical techniques for composing photographic shots. It's designed for anyone looking to improve their photography skills, making their photos more interesting, meaningful, and appealing to viewers.
"Practical Composition in Photography" is a video lecture-based photography course that provides practical knowledge in the use of composition techniques for photographic frames. The course is designed for anyone who wants to improve their photography skills, making their photos more interesting, meaningful, and appealing to viewers.
The course is based on the materials from the in-person courses "Creative Photography" and "Composition," insights, discussions with students and colleagues, as well as reflections on works by industry-recognized authors.
You can start the course at any time, and it is available indefinitely!
After completing these courses, you will:
Have gained knowledge about the peculiarities of human visual perception,
Know how to make photographs more attractive to the viewer,
Be familiar with popular and lesser-known "rules" of composition,
Be able to create your own composition rules and methods,
Be able to identify composition techniques in the works of other authors,
Avoid falling for common composition myths,
Enjoy the photography process much more,
Have happier clients and friends with your work,
Receive a diploma to display at your workplace.
Course content:
What is composition in photography?
Working with a viewfinder or screen.
Viewer behavior when viewing photographs, how to predict the viewer's reaction.
Cropping in post-processing.
Flatness and spatiality in photography.
Balance and harmony.
Rule of thirds and Golden Ratio.
The importance of background and horizon in photography.
Perspective in photography, spatiality.
Leading lines and dynamics in the frame.
Central composition and the magic of the square.
Rhythm, lines, geometric objects, and their use in your work.
The significance of color in composition.
Learning to see. Black and white vs color images.
Portrait photography composition techniques.
Landscape photography composition techniques.
Photography analysis checkpoints and methods.
Composition myths and facts.
You can start the training at any time!
target_audience: Beginner and advanced photographers who are looking to enhance their visual storytelling skills

courses.description:
دورة واحدة تشمل
استخدام الكاميرا من الصفر, تكوين صور احترافية , تعليم تصوير البورترية والويدنج, تعليم تعديل الصور فوتوشوب ,سوق العمل
اهلا بكم يا شباب في الدورة الشاملة للتصوير الفوتوغرافي وتعديل الصور (4في 1)
انا محسن رضا مصور فوتوغرافي خبير في تصوير الويدنج والبورتريه خبره من 2016 وفي الكورس دا ان شاء الله انا جاي هنقل لكم الخبره الخاصه بيها بحيث يكون عندك معرفه عن مجال التصوير والتعديل الخاص بالتصوير لو انت ما عندكش اي خبره سابقه فالكورس دة ليك.


في الكورس وهي دة احنا هنمر برحله من بدايه اننا نبدا جزء نتعرف على الأداه بتاعتنا الكاميرا والتعامل معاها وتركيب خاصه علي الكاميرا بتاعتك الاخير هنبدأ ندرس مع بعض أساسيات التصوير وتكوين صوره نجاحه ويعني ايه خلفية التعريض وده هو أساس التصوير والاعدادات الكاملة للكاميرا وبعد وبعد ذلك ينتقل لاننا نتكلم عن تخصصات معينه زي البورتريه او زي الويدنج وهنبدا نتعلم مع بعض الأساسيات الخاصة بتعديل الصور الفوتوغرافية فيلز ريتاتش او تعديل الوان الصوره وتتولى نقدر بعد اما نخلص صوره نعدلها بشكل كامل وبعد كده هنبدا لجزئ مهم جدا في قسم التسويق وقسم ده بيتكلم عن ازاي تقدر تسوق بنفسك وازاي تقدر تجيب عميل وازاي ويأثر فلوس اذا كنت من مجال التصوير ورضه نصائح عن ازاي و العملاء مع العملاء ونصائح طول محنا شغالين من اولار وأخيرا النهاية .


مستنيكم داخل الكورس ، كان معاكم محسن رضا ومع الف سلامه.


الرئيس التنفيذي - أحمد حمدي

courses.title: Kurs Luminar NEO – przyśpiesz edycję zdjęć
courses.bio: Odkryj potencjał swoich zdjęć z Luminar NEO i szybką edycją zdjęć przy pomocy AI.
objectives: Jak edytować zdjęcia za pomocą narzędzi AI?
Jak zarządzać folderami i albumami?
Jak korzystać z funkcji superostrości?
Jak przyśpieszyć obróbkę za pomocą presetów

Jakie skróty warto znać?
Jak radzić sobie z typowymi problemami edycji?
Jak wyedytować zdjęcie portretowe?

Jak kontrolować światło na zdjęciu?
Jak poprawić ekspozycję?
Jak automatycznie usunąć niedoskonałości zdjęcia?
Jak zautomatyzować edycję za pomocą sztucznej inteligencji?

Interfejs: Dodatki AI, działania z folderami i albumem

requirements: Dla tych, którzy chcą wydobyć ze swoich zdjęć jak najwięcej i chcą to zrobić w jak najkrótszym czasie.
courses.description:
Czego się nauczysz?
Luminar Neo to innowacyjny edytor zdjęć oparty na technologii AI, który upraszcza złożone procedury edycyjne i umożliwia niezwykle szybką obróbkę zdjęć.
Kurs Luminar to podstawowe szkolenie z edycji zdjęć przy użyciu tego popularnego programu. Na początku kursu zobaczysz jak zainstalować program i poznasz interfejs. Następnie pokażę Ci jego podstawowe funkcje oraz metody korzystania z presetów. Kolejne lekcje skupiają się na pracy z dodatkami AI oraz z działaniami na folderach i albumach.




Wykorzystaj potencjał AI
Z łatwością opanujesz wszystkie narzędzia, które Luminar AI oddaje do Twojej dyspozycji. Zaoszczędzisz mnóstwo czasu, automatyzując powtarzalne zadania.
Nauczę Cię, jak korzystać ze sztucznej inteligencji jaką znajdziesz w Luminar AI, co pozwoli Ci w dotąd nieznanym tempie edytować zdjęcia. Zobaczysz metody pracy, które pozwolą Ci w pełni wykorzystać zarówno sztuczną inteligencję Luminar AI, jak i ręczną korektę zdjęć.




Zobacz metody edycji zdjęć
Sekcja edytuj to obszerna część kursu, w której poznasz różne metody edycji zdjęć. Poznasz wszystkie zakładki sekcji edycja w tym, edycja kreatywna, portretowa oraz profesjonalna. Następnie nauczysz się technik pracy z warstwami, mieszania ich oraz korzystania z maskowania.




Skróty klawiaturowe
W trakcie kursu omówię ważne skróty klawiaturowe, które znacznie przyspieszą pracę w programie. Kurs zawiera również omówienie klasycznych błędów popełnianych podczas pracy z programem oraz nauką tworzenia własnych presetów.




Workfollow obróbka portretu
Ostatnia część kursu skupia się na edycji portretów oraz ustawieniach eksportu, co pozwoli Ci skutecznie wykorzystanie programu do tworzenia i udostępniania swoich prac.
target_audience: Dla fotografów, którzy chcą w łatwy i szybki sposób dokonywać imponujących edycji swoich zdjęć.

courses.title: Capture One : The Modern Organizing System for Your Catalog
courses.bio: Rethink the core of your photo management like a Pro!
objectives: How to create a referenced catalog from scratch in Capture One
How to use the power of metadata and keywords to create your personal Google Photo Search!
Image organization by mastering different powerful tools to dynamically group and catalog your images
Discover the "P.E.P. framework" to manage your photos like a Pro!

Catalog Creation: How to Create and Where to Save Your Catalog
Import Process: Importing Images from a Generic Folder
Importing Images from SD Memory Card
Link Images with Add to Catalog
Manage Files and Folders: Moving Files and Folders, and Troubleshooting
Deleting Photos, and Trash Folder Usage
The P.E.P. System: Keywords: Create Your Google Photo Search
Organize Your Photos with Groups, Projects, and Albums
Catalog Backup: Don’t Lose Your Work!

requirements: Capture One installed. No other basic requirements.
courses.description:
I know you love to take photos. I know you like to be outdoors, have adventures, and explore new places. In the beginning, no one cares about the workflow, where to safely save your photos, the backups, and all that boring stuff. One of the most common questions I get asked is: What’s the best software and best workflow to organize my photo archive?


Organizing photos can sometimes be messy, and this is usually where many photographers get lost. Where do you store your images, how do you import them and go through them to make a proper and quick selection of your best shots, and how do you get complete control over your workflow and photo library.
In my workshops and classes, I work a lot with my students, so I know exactly what you're going through.


This course is for anyone who wants to stop messing around with pictures scattered everywhere and learn my effective method for creating and keeping a super organized photo archive.


In this course, you'll discover how to make Capture One your best asset for getting full control over your photos. We’ll cover the following:


What's a catalog, and how does a catalog work in Capture One?
How to create a catalog from scratch, defining what’s the best place to save it, and all the aspects you need to know to make it future-proof, keep it healthy, and protect it with backups
How to import your images from different sources and how to set the perfect foundational structure of your image folders
How to set up your personal search engine for your images using keywords, labels, and rating stars, to find the photos you want in a breeze
The proven and automated hierarchical method for organizing folders and photos efficiently


What'll you be able to do at the end of the course?
Picture this: Zero generic and unidentified image folders on your hard drive. All your images are stored in one single place. Perfectly grouped, named, and fully organized so you can find and use them in a split second when you need them. That's cool, isn't it?
I’m right here to give you the solution that you’ve been looking for and put you in control of your work.


See you there! Andrea Livieri - Photographer & Educator
target_audience: From Beginner to Advanced photographer who want to set up a reliable and consistent system to organize the photo catalog like a Pro!

requirements: iPhone with iOS 9 or greater
