courses.title: Curso Completo de Fotografia Mobile
courses.bio: apps e dicas para tirar as melhores fotos com seu celular
objectives: Retratar paisagens comuns ou muito conhecidas de forma inusitada
Colocar em prática treinos de composição que utilizam a perspectiva, a iluminação natural e a edição final de forma criativa
Aprender como é possível utilizar o seu celular como uma câmera fotográfica
Aprender a tirar o melhor proveito de cada foto pelo domínio de aplicativos, truques e técnicas facilmente aplicáveis nos cliques do dia a dia
Entender como a captação e o processamento de imagens pelo celular pode tornar a fotografia mobile extremamente vantajosa em termos de mobilidade, experimentação, e desenvolvimento do olhar
Conhecer aplicativos e ferramentas capazes de fazer de seu celular um equipamento fotográfico tão relevante quanto às câmeras profissionais

Iniciar aqui: 2. Dicas e técnicas essenciais para começar
3. Como se diferenciar e alguns alertas
3. Explorando o formato do seu celular

requirements: Ter interesse em aprender
Gostar de tirar fotos com celular
courses.description:
O celular pode ser uma ferramenta muito interessante em fotografia se bem utilizado. Além de conferir alta mobilidade, com o olhar certo, os apps corretos e boas técnicas você pode transformar seu celular em uma câmera profissional e tirar fotos inusitadas e com altíssima qualidade. Ticiana Porto, Paulo del Valle e Gal Oppido vão te ajudar nessa empreitada viajando pelas ruas do Rio de Janeiro e São Paulo ensinando-o como fazer muito mais com o que carrega no bolso!

Acompanhe a fotógrafa Ticiana Porto durante uma visita a famosas locações cariocas, como a Pedra do Arpoador e a Praia do Leme, e confira maneiras de produzir imagens únicas e originais de paisagens previsíveis, ao colocar em prática treinos de composição que utilizam a perspectiva, a iluminação natural e a edição final de forma criativa.

Através de um passeio pela cidade do Rio de Janeiro, o fotógrafo e instagrammer profissional Paulo del Valle compartilha sua experiência para ensinar como é possível utilizar o seu celular como uma câmera fotográfica. Descubra porque o registro do inusitado pode se tornar o seu diferencial, e aprenda a tirar o melhor proveito de cada foto pelo domínio de aplicativos, truques e técnicas facilmente aplicáveis nos cliques do dia a dia.
Acompanhe Gal Oppido pelas ruas de São Paulo para entender como a captação e o processamento de imagens pelo celular pode tornar a fotografia mobile extremamente vantajosa em termos de mobilidade, experimentação, e desenvolvimento do olhar. Conheça aplicativos e ferramentas capazes de fazer de seu celular um equipamento fotográfico tão relevante quanto às câmeras profissionais.


Trailer - Créditos:
Something Elated by Broke For Free
Creative Commons — Attribution 3.0 United States— CC BY 3.0 US
target_audience: Instagramers
Pessoas que querem tirar fotos mais inusitadas com seu celular
Pessoas que querem aprender sobre apps e ferramentas fotográficas para celular
Pessoas que gostam de tirar fotos com seu celular e querem aprimorar seus resultados

courses.title: Photography 101: from zero to hobby!
courses.bio: The basics, the techniques and the tools to get started or improve your photography
requirements: None. To practice the contents of the course, a DSLR is recommended (any brand or price range)
courses.description:
The aim of this course is to explain what photography is, how it works and how you can use your creativity to capture unique moments. These are the topics that will be covered:


Why learn photography
Photography is a skill that, once learned, can be used in various contexts, whether professional or personal. Given it's an art form, it is something that stimulates our creative side. And it's a great excuse to get out and travel!


Light and exposure
How to use aperture, shutter speed, and sensitivity (ISO) to get the right exposure. In addition, you will learn the effect that each of these variables have on your final photo.


Framing
The rule of thirds is an easy to learn trick to increase the impact of your photos. But don't overdo it, otherwise your photos will all look the same.


Photographic genres
Now that you know the theory, it's time to put it into practice. Here are some suggestions of photographic genres that you can explore.


Gear
What kind of cameras and lenses exist and what are the advantages of each.


Post-editing (Photoshop)
What are the advantages of post-editing, what techniques can be used, when it should be used, and... when photography fades to painting.


Websites and References
target_audience: Anyone who wants to learn the basics of photography and improve their photos.

courses.title: A arte de fotografar
courses.bio: Curso de fotografia
objectives: Tirar fotos profissionais
Compor belas fotografias
Tirar ótimas fotos
Trabalhar com a câmera no modo manual
Composição fotográfica
Equipamentos, tipos de câmeras, lentes e acessórios.
Tipos de fotografia
Fotometragem
Fazer fotos no modo manual
Edição básica no Lightroom e Photoshop

Introdução: A repetição é a mãe da habilidade

requirements: Ter uma câmera que permita fotografar no modo manual.
courses.description:
Se você é apaixonado(a) por fotografia e quer aprender mais sobre esse mundo, inscreva-se já nesse curso e aprenda mais sobre a arte de fotografar. O curso é todo voltado para você aprender a fotografar no modo manual da sua câmera, especialmente pra quem está iniciando na fotografia. Você vai aprender diversas coisas legais no decorrer do curso como: tipos de câmeras, tipos de lentes, fotometragem, composição de fotos, iluminação, diversos tipos de fotografia, como configurar sua câmera pra fazer certos tipos de fotos, edição no Lightroom e photoshop, site de fotografia onde participam grandes fotógrafos do mundo, efeitos em aplicativos, fazer um time-lapse, entre outros.
O curso está dividido em seções:
Seção 1 ''Introdução'' - Onde você vai conhecer um pouco do curso e a sequência de aulas, vai aprender sobre a importância do equipamento e conhecimento, dicas de qual câmera comprar.


Seção 2 "Tipos de câmeras" - Aqui vamos falar sobre diversos tipos de câmeras, câmeras de celular, compactas, câmeras com zoom, dslr, gopro (onde você vai aprender a fazer um time-lase), drones (onde vai aprender pra que serve, o que podemos fazer com ele, tipos variados de drone e cuidados que se deve tomar com os mesmos).


Seção 3  "Objetivas - lentes" - Aqui você vai aprender o que é uma objetiva, diversos tipos de lentes que você pode usar, normais, com zoom, tele-objetivas, grande angular, olho de peixe, macro.


Seção 4  "Fotometragem" - Essa é parte técnica onde você vai aprender a fotometrar, vai aprender sobre diafragma, velocidade, exposição, iso, histograma, macete de fotometragem, tudo pra você aprender a fazer fotos do seu jeito.


Seção 5  "Composição" - Aqui é a parte de aprender a compor uma imagem, você vai aprender sobre focalização, profundidade de campo, regra dos terços, linhas, texturas, fundos entre outros.


Seção 6 "Iluminação" - Nessa parte você vai aprender sobre iluminação, luz difusa, luz direta, contra luz, vamos comentar sobre flash e led entre outros.


Seção 7 "Tipos de fotografias" - Aqui vamos aprender sobre diversos tipos de fotografias, retrato e pessoas, viagem, natureza, paisagem, esporte, longa exposição, véu de noiva, surrealismo, site de fotos, entre outros.


Seção 8 "Edição de fotos" - Aqui vamos falar sobre tipos de arquivos: RAW, JPG, vamos mostrar um pouco sobre a edição de fotos no Lightroom e Photoshop, mostrar como fazer um efeito legal na foto em um aplicativo.


Seção 9 "Conclusão" - Encerramento do curso.
OBS. O curso é focado nos conceitos de usar a câmera no modo manual e não na explicação de todos os itens que compõem a câmera, o modo manual pode ser utilizado em qualquer câmera desde que a mesma permita o uso desse modo!






































Temas relacionados: fotografia criativa, edicao de fotos, fotografia profissional, fotografia com celular, presets lightroom, fotografia mobile, fotografia digital, retrato criativo, antes e depois edicao, fotografia para instagram, fotografia autoral, lightroom mobile, fotografia estetica, truques de edicao, edicao no celular, dicas de fotografia, fotografia minimalista, fotografia de paisagem, composicao fotografica, color grading.
target_audience: Amantes da fotografia
Fotógrafos e fotógrafas

Pessoas que querem aprender a fotografar profissionalmente

courses.description:
Neste treinamento vou compartilhar toda minha experiência como Especialista Certificado pela Adobe (Adobe Certified Expert) para te ensinar como utilizar seu celular/smartphone (Android ou iOS) para editar e transformar suas fotos normais em fotos incríveis em poucos minutos com os melhores aplicativos gratuitos existentes no mercado (Lightroom mobile), Snapseed, Photoshop Express e muito mais) sem precisar de nenhum conhecimento prévio em fotografia ou edição de fotografias. As primeiras aulas estão abertas, assista para avaliar a qualidade do curso ;)
Esse é um curso super completo onde você vai muito além de conhecer e dominar as ferramentas de tratamento de imagens, você aprenderá expandir a sua percepção com fundamentos da edição de imagens de forma descomplicada e direto ao ponto para que você possa aplicar esses conhecimentos em qualquer aplicativo no seu computador ou celular depois.
Você também poderá utilizar minhas imagens para treinar, terá acesso a um checklist de fluxo de trabalho, meus melhores presets para Lightroom e assistir diversos vídeos com meu processo de edição completo por celular para que você possa entender minha forma de pensar e executar para atingir o melhor resultado possível na edição e impactar muito mais com suas imagens.
Neste treinamento você aprenderá:
Como editar fotos no celular usando aplicativos gratuitos e pagos
Como editar fotos de viagens, natureza, paisagens, retratos e muito mais.
Como criar fotos com movimento a partir de fotos estáticas
Como fazer o tratamento de pele em retratos usando aplicativos de smartphone
Como conseguir resultado incríveis usando as próprias ferramentas do Instagram
Quais são os fundamentos da edição de imagens
Aprender potencializar suas vendas transformando fotos de produtos com a edição de alto nível.
Aplicar efeitos especiais profissionais para tornar fotos normais e sem vida em fotos incríveis.
Aprender o fluxo de trabalho para editar uma imagem do começo ao fim.
Dicas de captura de fotos por celular e muito mais

courses.title: Corel PaintShop Pro für Einsteiger
courses.bio: Fotos bearbeiten, optimieren und manipulieren
objectives: Fotos bearbeiten und optimieren
Effekte in Fotos einsetzen

requirements: Du benötigst die Software "PaintShop Pro" von Corel in einer (einigermaßen) aktuellen Version.
Ältere und neuere Versionen dieser Software sind jedoch sehr ähnlich aufgebaut, so dass Du diesen Kurs auch mit einer älteren (oder neueren) Version der Software nutzen kannst.
courses.description:
Vielleicht suchst Du (oder hast die Suche bereits beendet) eine Alternative zum Abonnement-Modell der Software "PhotoShop" von Adobe. Dann hast Du sie mit Corel PaintShop Pro gefunden! Diese Software ist ebenso leistungsfähig wie kostengünstig und verfügt in der Ultimate-Variante sogar noch über sehr interessante Zusatzprodukte.
In diesem Kurs möchte ich Dich schrittweise mit der Software vertraut machen. Neben der Optimierung von Fotos (d.h. der Einstellung von Farbtemperatur, Helligkeit und Kontrast) werden wir auch störende Elemente entfernen (z.B. Hautunreinheiten bei Portraitfotos, unerwünschte Elemente in Landschaftsfotos) und eine kleinere Bildkomposition erstellen.
Solltest Du über diesen Kurs hinaus Themenwünsche haben, so lass sie mich wissen. Viel Freude mit PaintShop Pro wünsche ich Dir schon jetzt!
Have a nice day!
Jürgen
Credits:
alle Soundfiles by Eric Matyas, www-soundimage-org
alle Fotos und Videos von www-pixabay-com (CC0)
target_audience: Du bist Einsteiger in die Bildbearbeitung oder in die Arbeit mit PaintShop Pro. Dann herzlich willkommen.
Dir gefällt das Abo-Modell von Adobe nicht und suchst nach einer leistungsfähigen Alternative. Hier hast Du sie gefunden.
Du möchtest Deine Fotos verbessern und/oder nachbearbeiten. Hier bist Du richtig.

courses.description:
iPhone Photography Course: In this course you will learn how to take great photos using your iPhone. This course will help anyone who wants to get into the exciting and growing sector of iPhone photography. Exclusively filmed on location in London, UK! See the sights while learning how to take great photos.


No risk: This course comes with a no hassle 30 day money back guarantee. So why not buy and try, you have nothing to lose.


*** Updated with iOS 18 - June 2024 ***


*** Updated with iOS 17 - June 2023 ***


*** Updated with iOS 16 - June 2022 ***


*** Updated with iOS 15 - August 2021 ***


*** Updated - March 2021 ***
Night Mode and the Ultra Wide Camera lens added


*** Updated with iOS 14 - July 2020 ***


This course is designed for:
Beginners that have little to no experience and want to become a skilled photographer without spending thousands of dollars on expensive camera equipment
Anyone that wants to build their portfolio for social media or selling
Anyone that wants to turn iPhone photography into an exciting career


This is achieved by:
Finding out how to take fantastic photos using the latest software
Recognising some practical aspects of iPhone photography – things like how to stand and how to hold your iPhone
Learning the basics principles of photography – a must for beginners, a refresher for seasoned professionals
Maximising the quality of your photographs by learning the inbuilt tools to edit and perfect


This course will improve your skills at (it's like 5 courses in 1):
iPhone Photography
Portrait Photography
Mobile Photography
Landscape Photography
Macro Photography



Vastly improve your skills at iPhone Photography
Over the last 100 years photography has continued to evolve and change, the latest chapter now being smartphone and iPhone photography. These changes require photographers to continually change, adapt and update their skill base.
This course therefore uses the latest iPhone and the latest software to make sure you are at the absolute forefront of this new exciting avenue of photography and keeps you ahead of the competition.


Content and Overview
This course actively encourages you to get involved, after many lectures there are small tasks set which help you to put into practice what you have just learnt. Although you could just sit and go through all of the lectures, the course is designed to be as practical and fun as possible as well as academic.
The course is split into 4 easy to understand sections – (1) Understanding the software and what you can do with it (2) Some basic principles of photography which will help you to take great photos (3) Learn how to use other equipment when using your iPhone, and (4) Make those great photos even better by showing the power of photo editing.
During the course you will also visit many locations around London and examine many photographs taken by the lecturer – this makes the course a lot more interesting and fun, rather than it being delivered in a boring “classroom” format.
As well as video lectures so you can see how to do everything, there are also quizzes for you to check your knowledge, and interaction with the lecturer and other students in the online groups – this allows you to share your new skills with others also taking the course and provides support and encouragement for you to keep carrying on and improving even after completing the course.
So by the end of this course you will no longer be bemused when you look at those “Shot on an iPhone”posters and wonder how they got those photos looking so good – why? – because you will be taking those great photos yourself!!!
Whether you need these new skills for your professional work, or you simply want to show off to your friends and family then this course is really for you, in fact, it is the only one you need to look at.


Take Professional Photographs using only your iPhone, which you will be proud to share with the world
target_audience: This course is for anyone who wants to learn how to take better photography using just their iPhone
Everyone who has an interest in photography and has access to an iPhone
This course will also appeal to those who already have a knowledge of photography but who want to get into the specific field of iPhone photography
Those new to an iPhone that want to get the most of of their new iPhone
Anyone wanting to learn iPhone Photography, Mobile Photography, Digital Photography, Portrait Photography
Improve Social Media posts
Looking for a job or expanding their skills in photography

Tu apprendras à utiliser ton boitier en mode manuel afin de pouvoir filmer de façon professionnel et avoir la meilleure image possible qui soit. Tu pourras aussi paramétrer ton boitier pour une utilisation plus rapide et ne plus jamais rater une mise au point. Du contrôle à distance via l'application mobile à la configuration d'un enregistreur externe, le Canon R6 n'aura plus aucun secret pour toi. Avec cette Masterclass, chaque outil sera passé en revue avec son explication et la démonstration pour une compréhension complète. Si tu désires maitriser ton boitier, cette Masterclass est presque une obligation. J'utilise mon Canon R6 en vidéo au quotidien et c'est donc tout mon savoir que je te donne à travers plusieurs heures de vidéo. Tu vas pouvoir évoluer sur chaque module avec la configuration simultanée de ton boitier et le régler de la meilleure façon possible. Moi c'est David, plus connu sur Youtube sous le nom de Monsieur Camera et tu peux compter sur moi pour tout t'expliquer sur ton boitier de façon simple et rapide. Bonne découverte

courses.description:
In this follow-up to our Beginner Digital Photography class (which covers exposure, aperture and shutter speed), this class covers:
- how you can use ISO to take better pictures in low light environments
- how to use your flash so that your images look naturally lit instead of that awful “flash” look with overexposed subjects and bright backgrounds
- how you can use white balance to help you take better portraits
You WILL need a flash for this class. If your camera came with a built-in flash, that is sufficient. You are also welcome to use an external flash if you have one
target_audience: Students who have already completed our Beginner Course (for Canon, Nikon, or General cameras)

courses.title: Basic Photography Course : From Basic to Perfect
courses.bio: Awaken your creative mind and take your photography to the next level.
objectives: Basic Photography Course
The guidance of what are the elements that constitute a good picture.
Training and develop of seeing eye and aesthetic sense in photography in a step by step basis.
The understanding in how to use DSLR, mirrorless, or any camera. With on-location-demonstration.
Understand the Exposure Triangle – Aperture, Shutter Speed & ISO. What’s focusing, metering, exposure compensation & all the basic needs of using a camera.
Which mode to use? When? How? In what kind of situations?
How to get ideal & creative exposure. Understand Metering and use it to our advantages.
Understand Lenses ~ Why & when do we need different type of lenses, and how it affect the images hugely.
Understand what camera sees differ from what our eyes see ~ The exposure value or dynamic range.
Understand composition through visual balance within a chosen frame to achieve eye pleasing images.
Exclusive on-loction-demonstration tutorials in how to shoot portrait and tricky low light photography.
How to incorporate narrative component to an image to evoke the viewer's heart?
Training and developing a creative mindset in photography art.
Post-processing, editing tutorial with Lightroom.

Art of Seeing, Exposure Triangle & how t: The art of seeing, the training and developing of seeing eye.
Understand the Basic technical aspect of camera, Aperture, Shutter speed & ISO.
Learn A-mode and how to shoot in low light by avoiding handshake blur.
Effective tips in composition, understan: The study of 3 effective composition techniques via compositional balance.
Understand what metering is and how to utilise it creatively.
Understand lens perspective and the huge different it brings to an image.
Focusing technique, how to shoot good po: To utilise various types of focus systems, from AF to M-mode.
From fundamental to creative ~ how to do good Portrait photography?
Understand what kind of scenarios is M-mode most effective of.
S-mode study, and how to utilise it to acquire certain types of effects.
In-depth study of Depth of field. How to: Understand the factors that affect the depth of field in greater details.
How to incorporate narrative component to the image to evoke viewer’s heart?
Open the door to editing with Lightroom: Open the door to editing with Lightroom ~ Introduction
Tutorial on Basic operation of Lightroom. Understand the Light Tool.
Understand Color Mixer tool, Curves Tool and handling Color temperature.
Learn how to edit Portrait photography and tricky lighting situation.
Dealing with incorrect white balance, & understand Raw file in greater details.

requirements: A Camera. DSLR, Mirrorless, or any format of digital cameras.
courses.description:
“Capturing what your eyes see and what your heart desires ”.
This is what I wish to impart to you at the end of the day.
My teaching is a combination of Art and Technical aspects from what I’ve learned over 2 decades, compressed and compiled into quick comprehension of theory, develop a technique that is easy to understand and master. My teaching is about simplify the complex, practical and designed to make learning fun and engaging.
Every topic is shared in a step-by-step basis, with a lot of demonstration and illustration to ensure you will not lose track along the way. In every lesson I designed a practical assignment for you to put what you have learned into practice to train and develop the creative side of your mind.
The first thing I’ll be guiding you is the core understanding of what makes a good picture.
What are the elements that constitute a good picture?
I find that most of the people often have no clue in making an image, that’s the most essential reason we don’t get good pictures. I will guide you on what are the elements that constitute a good picture & train you to develop the awareness of knowing how to acquire good images. As I believe a good foundation and a clear mindset is very essential in learning.
Secondly, the step-by-step basis in training process.
I’m a believer in step-by-step-basis of training, disregards technical or artistry aspects. Human character is such that it takes time to absorb and practice, and eventually able to perform it with ease.
I will then delve into greater details in guiding you in other areas. Such as the training of seeing the nuance and subtlety, to understand how to deal with the lighting, how to make good and creative composition in various ways, and how to incorporate storytelling to the images you make with imaginative & creative ideas.
As for the technical aspects, I’ll guide you from the very basis to in-depth study. Such as how to deal with hand-shake, how to handle situation when the images get too bright or too dark, and understand what is depth of field, shutter speed, lens perspective… and so on. The most essential part is I will guide you in why we need them and how to utilise them in an in-depth explanation.
These are the content of what you will learn :
1. Basic understanding & how to use DSLR cameras, mirrorless or any camera.
Understand the Exposure Triangle – Aperture, Shutter Speed & ISO.
How to use a camera: What’s focusing, metering, white balance, exposure compensation & all the basic needs of using a camera.
Which mode to use? When? How?
Understand what is metering and the reasons behind why we do not get the correct exposure such as images get too bright or too dark.
Understand exposure compensation – How to utilise it to obtain ideal & creative exposure.
The Lenses ~ Why & when do we need different type of lenses.
Understand what camera sees differ from what our eyes see ~ The exposure value.

2. Few effective ways of making good and creative composition.
3. How to shoot in tricky low light situation.
4. What are the common mistakes photographers make and how to avoid them?
4. How to develop & cultivate the seeing eyes.
5. How to incorporate narrative component in an image to evoke the viewer's heart?
6. In addition, I designed a 5 bonus lessons of editing tutorials for the course for you to enhance & improve the aesthetic quality of the images.

My tutorials are designed to make learning a breeze and a pleasure. At the end of the course, you will find what you learn here is not only how to handle a camera, but a combination of art & technical studies in photography.
You will acquire a creative mindset in seeing the aesthetic & telling story with your images.
You will become more observant, more imaginative and able to make good and imaginative images than you could ever imagine.
target_audience: Hobbyish in photography, photography enthusiasts, ambitious in photography, disregard of age.
Ambitious photographers in any genre of photography

objectives: В этом курсе мы разберёмся с органами управления (кнопочками, колёсиками и рычажками) в Вашей камере.

Наконец-то Вы научитесь делать фото, которые будут вызывать нужные Вам эмоции у зрителей!
В этом курса мы разберёмся с тем, как сделать технически правильные фото людей и как сделать модель послушной.

courses.title: Master Adjustment Layers in Affinity Photo
courses.bio: Learn the strengths and weaknesses of all 23 Adjustment Layers in Affinity Photo
objectives: You will learn how to use all 23 of Affinity Photo's Adjustment Layers
You will learn the strengths & weaknesses of each adjustment
You will learn when & why you should use one adjustment over another
You will learn practical applications for using Adjustment Layers
requirements: No prior experience is needed
courses.description:
Adjustment Layers are the bread & butter of Affinity Photo. They allow you to edit the color & lighting of your images.
But with so many adjustments to choose from, it can be overwhelming to learn how they all work. So in this course, we will take a deep dive into all of Affinity Photo’s Adjustment Layers (all 23 of them!)
By the time you finish this course, you will know exactly how every adjustment works. But even more important than that, you will learn the pros & cons of each adjustment. That way, you will know exactly when & why you should use one adjustment over another.
For example, when should you use the Curves adjustment vs. the Levels adjustment? Or when should you use Color Balance vs. Selective Color? Vibrance vs. Saturation? Recolor vs. HSL? Or even Threshold vs. Posterize? These are the types of questions we will answer in the course, as we carefully review each of Affinity Photo's Adjustment Layers.
This course is easy enough for beginners to follow along, but in-depth enough that even the most experienced users will learn something new. So if you want to level up your Affinity skills, then please join me in the course! :)
target_audience: This course is for anyone that wants to master Adjustment Layers in Affinity Photo.

courses.description:
È arrivato il corso su LuminarAI, l'ultima versione di Luminar lo trovi tra i miei corsi! Questo è il corso sulla versione precedente del programma, ancora supportata.
Diventa un vero professionista della post-produzione fotografica imparando a dominare l'ultimissima versione di Luminar, il potente software di Skylum basato su intelligenza artificiale, ad oggi unica vera alternativa all'accoppiata Lightroom/Photoshop.
Il corso ti guiderà passo passo nel mondo dell'editing fotografico con un approccio assolutamente pratico e concreto. Imparerai a organizzare le tue foto ma soprattutto a trarre il massimo da ogni scatto.
Ti insegnerò a usare l'intelligenza artificiale di Luminar 4 per ottenere immagini perfette anche quando vai di fretta ma ti metterò anche in condizione di modificare completamente una foto per perseguire la visione che hai immaginato per il tuo scatto.
I principianti troveranno una guida completa alla post-produzione delle foto mentre chi si trova già a un buon livello potrà apprendere tecniche che gli permetteranno di superare i limiti che spesso si incontrano nell'uso di Luminar 4, potendo sempre contare su un utile riferimento per tutti i comandi e i numerosissimi filtri che questo potente software di editing ci mette a disposizione.
Ti fornirò tutti i materiali necessari per seguire il corso, potrai lavorare esattamente sugli stessi file che utilizzo nelle lezioni in modo da poter replicare gli stessi passi o anche sperimentare proponendo la tua post-produzione.
target_audience: a chi vuole trarre il massimo dalle proprie foto e vuole farlo nel minor tempo possibile
a chi è appassionato di fotografia e vuole prendere il controllo della propria espressività

courses.description:
Are you captivated by surreal and conceptual art and want to learn how to create your own stunning photo manipulations in Photoshop? If yes, then this course, "Amazing Surreal Concept Art Photo Manipulation in Photoshop," is perfect for you! Unlock the secrets to crafting breathtaking surreal photo composites and elevate your Photoshop skills to new heights with this comprehensive, step-by-step guide. Whether you’re an intermediate Photoshop user eager to dive into creative photo editing or a beginner ready to explore the world of digital art, this course is designed to help you succeed.
In this course, you’ll master the art of creating surreal and concept art photo manipulations using Adobe Photoshop. From blending multiple images into a seamless composite to adding dreamlike effects that captivate viewers, you’ll learn techniques that can be applied to any photo editing project. The creative process you’ll discover here is versatile, empowering you to produce everything from fantastical landscapes to imaginative character designs. With a focus on practical, hands-on learning, this course ensures you’ll walk away with skills you can immediately put to use.
What sets this course apart? It’s packed with features to support your learning journey. You’ll get free access to exercise files and stock images used throughout the lessons, allowing you to follow along and practice as you go. These resources are yours to keep, so you can experiment and refine your skills even after the course ends. Plus, with expert support included, you’re never alone—if you get stuck, I’ll be there to guide you through the Q&A or comments section, ensuring you overcome any hurdles with ease.
The course is structured to cater to a wide range of learners. If you’re new to Photoshop, start with the dedicated "Basics of Photoshop" section, where you’ll gain a solid foundation in the tools and interface. From there, dive into the core lessons: selecting and preparing images, mastering layering and masking, applying advanced color grading, and adding surreal effects that bring your vision to life. Each section builds on the last, creating a smooth learning curve that takes you from beginner to confident creator.
You’ll also work on exciting hands-on projects to solidify your skills. Imagine crafting a surreal landscape where mountains float in the sky, designing a fantasy character with ethereal details, or weaving a visual story through abstract photo manipulation. These projects are designed to spark your creativity and give you portfolio-worthy pieces you can proudly share. By the end, you’ll have a deep understanding of how to transform ordinary photos into extraordinary works of art.
Who am I to teach you? I’m a seasoned digital artist with over a decade of experience in photo manipulation and concept art, having worked on projects ranging from personal creations to professional commissions. My passion is helping others unlock their creative potential, and I’ve poured that expertise into this course to make it as engaging and practical as possible. You’re not just learning techniques—you’re gaining insights from years of real-world experience.
Here’s what you’ll learn in detail:
Image Selection and Prep: How to choose the right photos and prepare them for seamless blending.
Layering and Masking: Techniques to combine multiple elements into a cohesive surreal scene.
Color Correction and Grading: Tips to create mood and atmosphere with precise adjustments.
Surreal Effects: Adding dreamlike touches like floating objects, glowing lights, and otherworldly textures.
Storytelling Through Art: Crafting compositions that tell a compelling visual narrative.
This course is perfect for aspiring digital artists, photo editors, and hobbyists who want to stand out with unique, eye-catching creations. Whether you’re looking to enhance your career, build a portfolio, or simply explore a creative hobby, these skills will open doors to endless possibilities. And with lifetime access, you can revisit the lessons anytime to refine your craft.
Still have questions? Here are some quick answers:
Do I need prior Photoshop experience? Not necessarily—beginners can start with the basics section, while intermediates can jump right in.
What version of Photoshop do I need? Any recent version will work, though the course uses the latest tools for optimal results.
How long will it take? At your own pace, you can complete it in a few weeks, but you’ll have lifetime access to go as slow or fast as you’d like.
What if I get stuck? Expert support is just a question away—I’m here to help via the Q&A section.
So, what are you waiting for? Enroll in "Amazing Surreal Concept Art Photo Manipulation in Photoshop" today and start transforming your ideas into stunning digital art. With step-by-step guidance, free resources, and personalized support, you’re set up for success. Take the leap, unleash your creativity, and join a community of learners bringing their surreal visions to life. Best of luck on your artistic journey—let’s create something amazing together!
target_audience: This course is intended for the intermediate students of the Photoshop
But even if you are a beginner you can still learn as I have included Basics of Photoshop in this course.

In this engaging and hands-on course, you'll dive into Adobe Lightroom Mobile, the industry-standard photo editing app, and learn to harness its powerful tools and features to create stunning, professional-quality images right from your iPhone or iPad.

Editing Fundamentals

Troubleshooting and FAQs

Access expert advice and solutions to your questions.
By the end of this course, you'll be a Lightroom Mobile expert, capable of transforming your iOS device into a portable photography studio. Join us today and unleash your creative potential in the world of mobile photography and editing!
Enroll now and embark on your journey to becoming a Lightroom Mobile maestro. Elevate your photography skills and create stunning images on the go!

¡En este curso te voy a enseñar a sacarle el máximo provecho a tu teléfono móvil, tanto para tomar como para editar fotos como un profesional!
Vamos a empezar con los conceptos básicos de composición, iluminación, exposición, aprenderemos cómo tomar fotografías en modo automático, como así también en modo totalmente manual.

「RAWデータって、何？」「現像ってどうやるの？」
「今までなんとなく現像してきたけど、、実際よくわかっていない」
------------このコースは上記のようなRAWについて知識がない方、RAWに興味がある方へ向けたコースです！
解説にはAdobe Lightroomを使用していますが、RAWの扱い方の基本は同じです。
お手持ちのソフトがどんなものでも、実践できるようになるカリキュラム構成になっています。
---------------------------------------------------------------

<このコースで学べること>
・RAWデータとは何か？RAW撮影の仕組みを図解します！
・ソフトに捉われない、現像の基本が学べます。
ex_ 露出補正、色かぶり補正、シャドウやハイライトなどの補正方法など

---------------------------------------------------------------

<このような方を対象にしています>
①RAW撮影、RAW現像に挑戦してみたい方

③RAW撮影時、どのようなことに気をつけたら良いか知りたい方
④自分の作品の幅を拡げたい方。
<参加条件>
RAW撮影、RAWデータやRAW現像に興味がある方ならどなたでも！

※解説にはAdobe Lightroomを使用していますが、どんなソフトでも置き換えて進められるよう、現像の基本をお伝えしています。
※ソフトそのものの使い方や、部分補正など、各現像ソフト独自の機能については触れていませんのでご了承ください。
---------------------------------------------------------------


まずは動画でRAWの仕組みや現像の基本を学んだら、ぜひご自分の写真で実践してみましょう。わからないこと、知りたいことなど、ご意見ご感想をお寄せください。
本コースを通してRAWの基礎やRAW現像の基礎を知ることで、写真撮影がもっと楽しくなるようなコースになればと思っています。


それでは、コースでお会いしましょう！
kostume :-)

courses.bio: Workshops zur Arbeit mit Affinity Photo
objectives: Exemplarische Bildbearbeitung und Anwendung von Effekten

- Anwendung von LUTs
- Makros aufnehmen und anwenden

- Anwendung von Filtern

Deine Ideen und Wünsche sind gefragt!

requirements: Du benötigst Affinity Photo in einer (recht) aktuellen Version.
courses.description:
Was erwartet Dich in diesem Kurs?
In diesem Kurs weiche ich von dem "allgemeinen" Kursmodell ab. Hier baut nicht ein Video auf dem vorherigen auf, sondern jedes Video stellt einen in sich abgeschlossenen "Workshop" dar. Wir nehmen uns ein Thema vor, z.B. eine radiale Unschärfe in ein Bild einzubringen, um es dynamischer zu gestalten, und dann lösen wir gemeinsam diese Aufgabe.
Worauf baut dieser Kurs auf?
Ihr solltet über Kenntnisse der grundlegenden Arbeit mit Affinity Photo verfügen, wie sie beispielsweise mein Kurs "Affinity Photo für Einsteiger" vermittelt. Wer sich darüber hinaus für die Portrait-Fotografie und deren Bearbeitung interessiert, hat vielleicht auch schon meinen Kurs "Affinity Photo (II) für Aufsteiger 7- Beauty Retusche" besucht.
Wie geht es dann weiter?
Wenn Du Ideen oder Wünsche für einen Workshops hast, dessen Thema von allgemeinem Interesse ist, dann lass es mich wissen. Gerne liefere ich dann diesen Workshop nach. So wird hier nach und nach eine Sammlung von Lösungen für die unterschiedlichsten Aufgabenstellungen entstehen ... und Du bist Teil davon!
Viel Spaß und Erfolg!
Dann bleibt mir nur noch, Euch sehr viel Spaß mit diesem Kurs und viel Erfolg bei Eurem weiteren Studium zu wünschen. Schnappen wir uns Papier und Bleistift und legen los ...


Credits (soweit vorhanden):
Bilder: www . pixabay . de
Sounds und Musik: Eric Matyas, www . soundimage . org
target_audience: Geeignet für alle Anwender von Affinity Photo, die ein paar neue Ideen zur Bildbearbeitung suchen.

requirements: There's no need for previous experience or advanced skills! This course starts with fundamental concepts and gradually builds up to more intermediate and advanced techniques. Whether you're just picking up a camera for the first time or looking to refine and enhance your existing photography skills, this course provides a comprehensive and supportive learning environment.
courses.description:
Hello Fellow Creatives!
Looking to grow your skills and knowledge in photography, but are unsure where to start? Well, I am pleased to say that you are in the right place! For years I have personally worked with and trained numerous individuals in the art and skill of photography. Helping people develop and hone their talent and skill for photography is something that I have loved and cherished. Seeing these individuals apply their learned skills and become successful photographers inspired me to create this course. This course is designed to equip you with the confidence and support you need to become a skilled photographer. I believe that having a supportive community is crucial when pursuing your passion, which is why I aim to create a strong and encouraging environment with valuable educational resources for aspiring photographers. Unlike other online courses filled with endless slideshows, jammed packed with information, this self-paced, personable classroom offers a comprehensive learning experience all from the comfort of your own home.
Upon setting out on my own photography journey over a decade ago, I had noticed there was a need for an online photography course that is not only relatable and easy to understand but also accessible to anyone, regardless of their skill level or location. This course is designed for anyone, regardless of their experience, who wants to beautifully capture the joys of life or embark on starting their own photography business. I am eager to share my tips, tricks, and techniques that I have gathered over the years to help you set a strong foundation of knowledge in this skill.


What To Expect:
This course includes 7 comprehensive sections covering fundamental and essential knowledge that you will need to be a confident and successful professional photographer. We will explore understanding your equipment from camera bodies to the different types of lenses, key image exposure settings crucial for all photography styles. You’ll learn Important and common lighting techniques that can be used in portrait, street, landscape photography, and more. How to use perspective and composition elements to elevate your photography, and as an added additional section; introducing you to the world of photo editing using Adobe Lightroom Classic. Whether you are looking to photograph people, animals, landscapes, or the everyday moments, this course will provide you with essential knowledge to begin your photography journey.


Course Curriculum:
Understanding Cameras and How to Work Them: Get to know your camera inside out, from basic functions to advanced features.
Lenses and Their Characteristics: Learn about different lenses and how to choose the right one for your photography needs.
Essential Exposure Settings: Master ISO, shutter speed, and aperture to achieve the perfect exposure in any lighting situation.
Mastering Lighting: Discover how to use natural and artificial light to enhance your photos with real world demonstrations.
Perspective: Understanding perspective and how to use different types when composing a photograph.
Composition: Use composition techniques to create visually appealing and professional looking photos.
Extra: An Introduction to Photo Editing Using Adobe Lightroom Classic: Start your journey into photo editing with tips and tricks in Adobe Lightroom Classic.
Reading to learn about a new skill is the first step to growing your knowledge, but to truly grasp this new information, it is essential to practice what you have learned and to apply it! So, to reinforce your learning, the course also includes:
Quizzes to Test Your Knowledge: Periodic quizzes to ensure you’re grasping the key concepts.
Assignments to Practice Applying Your Knowledge: Practical assignments that allow you to apply what you've learned and build your skills.
Resources: Useful resources to help fill the gaps on important topics and concepts that are discussed.
Equipment that is Needed:
With this being a digital photography course, I will be sharing recommendations for equipment in order for you to fully participate and get the most out of each lecture. Although it is not entirely essential for you to have all of these items, you will find that it will be easier to understand and follow along while using similar equipment.
Camera: A DSLR or mirrorless camera. In this course, we will dive into how to use certain exposure settings that are adjusted in semi-manual and manual modes. These modes are usually restricted to DSLR and mirrorless cameras. Smartphones and point and shoot cameras can be used, however you may not have the ability to change some of the camera settings that are taught in this course.
Camera lens: No one specific lens is required for this course. Only one that is compatible with your current camera.
Computer: This course has an additional section where we will be discussing photo editing. The editing software that I will be using to teach with is only compatible for desktop use.
There is a mobile version of this editing software, but bear in mind that the format and layout will look different from the one that I share.
Adobe Lightroom Classic: An editing software that I will be using in the last section of this course. To follow along with me, you will want to sign up for this software. If you don’t already have a subscription with Adobe, you can visit the resource section to sign up for a free 7-day trial period.
How to Know if This Course is For You:
To be a successful photographer, it is essential to establish a strong foundation of your knowledge. This course is designed to provide you with that foundation and give you the confidence to be the photographer that you have always dreamed of being. Through detailed lessons and practical assignments, you'll gain hands-on experience and the ability to apply what you've learned in real world scenarios. By the end of this course, you'll have a comprehensive understanding of photography principles, the technical skills to capture stunning images, and the creative insights to develop your unique style. Join me and start your journey toward becoming a skilled and confident digital photographer today!


Disclaimer:
I understand that everyone’s learning style is different and how important it is to find an instructor that you can connect with. That is why I am happy to have a 30-day 100% money back guarantee, so if you don’t feel like it is a good fit, I will refund your purchase - no questions asked.
I can’t wait to see you in this course!
target_audience: This course is intended for beginners who are eager to embark on their own photography journey, as well as for those who already have some experience but wish to refine their skills and fill any gaps in their knowledge. Whether you're starting from scratch or looking to deepen your understanding of photography fundamentals, this course is tailored to meet your needs.

requirements: Basic knowledge in Adobe Lightroom and Photoshop
Basis knowledge in Photography

Adobe Lightroom, Adobe Photoshop
courses.description:
In this course, you will learn all the Photoshop techniques you need to know to achieve amazing results on your landscape images. I will show you in seven different chapters how I edit one of my favorite pictures from start to finish. I think it's beneficial to see which techniques are used to process a file from the beginning to the end. All the steps can be used to improve your own landscape photography.
Video No. 1:
Here I will show you how I prepare my RAW files in Adobe Lightroom for further Adjustments in Adobe Photoshop.
Video No. 2:
In this chapter, you will learn how I use Adobe Photoshop to create one big panoramic image out of six RAW files and how I further enhance the perspective using the warp tool.
Video No. 3:
Did you ever wonder why some images have this unique look, which makes them "glow"? In this chapter, you will learn three ways how to create a dreamy and moody look on your photos using the Orton Effect.
Video No. 4:
Here I will show you how to enhance details in your image and how to use the Nik Collection to improve contrast and colors.
Video No. 5:
In this chapter, you will learn my advanced steps to improve contrast using luminosity masks. I will show you how to create those masks and how to work locally on your images.
Video No. 6:
Color is one of the most critical parts of an image, and that's the reason why I dedicated to spending a whole chapter in this tutorial. You will learn everything about color contrast and how you make local color adjustments.
Video No. 7:
In this final video, you will learn my unique web sharpening technique, so your images look the best in any web browser for your audience worldwide.
Almost three hours of bonus content!
Watch how I process three of my favorite images from start to finish.
Bonus Video No. 1 - Editing from start to finish
Bonus Video No. 2 - Editing from start to finish
Bonus Video No. 3 - Editing from start to finish

requirements: No prior experience or special skills are needed—just a camera or smartphone, basic lighting, and a willingness to learn
courses.description:
Product Photographer: Master eCommerce Product Photography
Learn how to take stunning product photos that sell — even on a shoestring budget. Launch your own photography business or boost your online store with high-converting, professional images.
Are you struggling to stand out in a crowded online marketplace? Tired of your products getting ignored because your photos just don’t capture their true value?
I know that feeling—and I know the way out.
When the recession hit, I had to pivot. Fast. Like many others, I was looking for a new way to create income—something flexible, low-cost, and skill-based. That’s when I discovered the true power of product photography. I didn’t have a fancy studio, expensive camera gear, or a team behind me. But I did have determination, creativity, and the drive to learn.
I started offering product photo services on Fiverr with the most basic setup possible. To my surprise, clients kept coming back. Why? Because even with minimal equipment, I knew how to light, compose, and edit photos in a way that made their products pop.
That small side hustle quickly turned into a steady stream of income. And more than that—it opened doors.
I soon realized I could use those same skills to improve my own eBay and Etsy listings. Once I upgraded my product images, something amazing happened:
My items started selling faster—and at better prices.
Because the truth is, people do judge a book by its cover—and they definitely judge a product by its photo.
Now, I want to teach you exactly how I did it—step by step.
What You'll Learn in This Course
This course is your complete roadmap to mastering product photography, even if you’re working with a limited budget or a smartphone camera. Inside, you’ll discover:
How to use affordable gear to capture clean, professional-grade photos
The secrets to lighting, background selection, and product styling that draw buyers in
How to edit your photos like a pro, even if you’re brand new to post-processing
Ways to turn your skills into a profitable side hustle or full-time business on Fiverr or other freelance platforms
How to apply these skills to boost your own product sales on eBay, Etsy, Poshmark, and beyond
Whether you're a small business owner, online seller, content creator, or aspiring photographer, these techniques will empower you to create high-impact visuals that drive sales and build trust with buyers.
Why This Course Matters — Now More Than Ever
In today’s digital economy, product photography is more than just a skill—it’s a business advantage. The quality of your images can mean the difference between a sale and a scroll. Learning how to do this yourself can save you hundreds (if not thousands) of dollars, or help you earn that from others.
What started as a recession-born side hustle for me has turned into a lifelong skill I continue to use every day. It’s helped me stay independent, flexible, and creative—even in uncertain times. And it can do the same for you.
About Your Instructor
I’m Sergey, a full-time entrepreneur and eCommerce seller since 2001. Over the years, I’ve coached thousands of students both online and in person, and I’ve taught over 200,000 students across my courses.
My mission is simple: to help people like you build practical, income-generating skills that make a real difference. This course comes from lived experience, not theory. You’ll be learning everything I wish I knew when I started—and I’ll be with you every step of the way.
What You Get With This Course
Full lifetime access to all course materials, including updates and future lessons
Fast instructor responses to your questions—typically within 24 hours
A certificate of completion you can use for your resume or client portfolio
Try It Risk-Free
Enroll today and get full access with Udemy’s 30-day money-back guarantee. If you don’t find value in the course, you get every penny back—no questions asked.
But I’m confident you’ll walk away with powerful new skills, fresh inspiration, and the tools to earn income doing something creative and in demand.
So if you’re ready to start turning photos into profit—whether for your own brand or as a business—let’s get started.
target_audience: This course is for beginners or small business owners looking to improve their product photography for platforms like Etsy, eBay, or their own online store

courses.description:
En este curso aprenderás a utilizar tu teléfono celular para tomar fotos atractivas de tus productos y mejorar su desempeño.
Aprenderás la importancia de buscar inspiración, referentes y beneficiarte de herramientas gratuitas, que te mantendrán al día de las tendencias visuales y creativas: tanto para redes sociales, como para páginas web e impresiones.
De manera detallada y elemental, profundizaremos en algunos de los conceptos más necesarios para iniciarnos en el mundo de la fotografía. Comprenderás a cabalidad, los criterios básicos que debes tener en cuenta, antes de tomar cualquier fotografía, para que su composición, encuadre y ángulo, sean los adecuados.
Aprednerás que, no hay que tener los equipos más profesionales para lograr grandes resultados. Aprenderás a optimizar  dispositivos móviles para que puedas sacarles todo el provecho a sus cámaras.
Por otra parte, aprenderás sobre dirección de arte. El curso contiene una serie de técnicas visuales y estéticas que nos ayudarán en el proceso creativo, único y diferenciado de nuestras marcas y proyectos. De igual forma, también aprenderás las técnicas adecuadas de iluminación y los diferentes estilos que existen.
Una vez que hayas realizado tus fotografías, pasarás a editarlas. En el curso aprenderás cuáles son y cómo utilizar las herramientas que se suelen utilizar para retocar tus imágenes con los dispositivos móviles y llevarlas a otro nivel.

courses.description:
Se entrega un certificado de finalización a todos los estudiantes que completan este curso.
Duración del curso: Más de 9 hs. - 58 clases.
En este curso de restauración de fotografías, aprenderás el arte de restaurar fotos con Adobe Photoshop. Se trata de un curso en vídeo diseñado para quienes ya tienen un manejo básico de Photoshop, y desean aprender específicamente a restaurar fotos con el programa.
Es muy común encontrarse con fotografías antiguas ajadas, con grietas y cortaduras, con arañazos y manchas, descoloridas por el paso del tiempo, con sectores faltantes. Y al momento de pasarlas por el escáner para intentar mejorarlas digitalmente, estos problemas se multiplican ya que agregan otros propios del proceso de escaneo: Polvo, pelusas, textura del papel muy visible, reflejos indeseados.
Mediante este curso aprenderás a solucionar este tipo de problemas con Photoshop, tanto en fotografías en blanco y negro o sepia, como en fotografías a color.
--
Algunos comentarios de los estudiantes:
"Es un curso extraordinario!!!"
Gerardo Antonio Rizzo
"Excelente curso, didáctico, preciso y fácil. Máxima calificación!!!"

"Los conocimientos adquiridos del curso son de mucha satisfacción, ya que enseña el usos de algunas herramientas que no utilizaba, o no sabía en que momento utilizarlas. La experiencia del instructor me parece excelente, con muy buena explicación, ya que da opciones de como realizar las modificaciones en diferentes versiones del Photoshop. Muchas felicidades por este curso."
Carlos Santiago Hernandez Mayo
"Buen curso para iniciación en la restauración de fotos antiguas. Excelente."
Daniel Alberto Santacruz Cano
"Muy buen curso. El instructor es muy claro y didáctico. Lo recomiendo!"

"He aprendido mucho con el curso, explica las cosas con detalle, y lo he encontrado bastante completo."

Roberto Cabrera

Ignacio Pérez
--
Te explicaré como unir una fotografía rota en varios pedazos, como enderezar fotos torcidas, como corregir deformaciones provocadas por la lente de la cámara.
Aprenderás a reducir el ruido, el moiré, el polvo y la textura del papel de las fotografías antiguas escaneadas.
Verás como eliminar colores indeseados, darle vida a imágenes descoloridas y mejorar imágenes muy claras o muy oscuras.
Descubrirás como corregir grietas, pliegues y faltantes, y también como eliminar marcas amarillentas de cintas adhesivas, y todo tipo de manchas.
También aprenderás a darle color a  tus fotografías blanco y negro.
Verás como realizar el escaneo de tus fotos dentro de Photoshop, o dentro de Windows 10, sin necesidad de disponer del software del fabricante del escáner, hablaremos de la resolución y los formatos ideales e incluso aprenderás a manejar imágenes más grandes que el escáner.
Este es un curso de Photoshop online y podrás acceder a él desde cualquier dispositivo (pc, Mac, tablet, celular, TV, etc.) con conexión a Internet... Donde y cuando te resulte más cómodo.
No estarás solo, yo estaré para ayudarte, para responder tus dudas, como un tutor online.
Al finalizar el curso, te sentirás cómodo con las herramientas utilizadas en Photoshop para la restauración de imágenes, y serás capaz de corregir y arreglar las tuyas propias. Las imágenes utilizadas en las clases están incluidas, lo cual te permitirá seguir los vídeos paso a paso, utilizando los mismos archivos que ves en el curso.
Nunca utilizaste Photoshop? Entonces mira mi curso "Photoshop para principiantes: ¡De cero a experto!" que puedes encontrar en mi perfil.
target_audience: El curso está dirigido a quienes tienen un nivel básico de Photoshop, y desean aprender a restaurar imágenes con el programa.

courses.title: Mastering Photoshop Channel Masking
courses.bio: Harness the power of professional masking techniques
objectives: Following this course, you will be able to understand and apply techniques that allow the quick creation of complex masks.
Improve or replace the sky in a landscape image.
Create complex and delicate masks to hide elements of a photograph..
Replace the background in a photograph.
Select and mask areas of very fine detail such as hair.
Apply selective adjustments based on how light or dark an area is in a photograph.
You will learn tools and techniques to address common problems you might encounter.
Learn to create seamless adjustments that are almost impossible to detect.

Saving and Loading Your Masks: Introduction Saving and Loading Your Masks
How to Load a Saved Mask

requirements: To take this course you will need Photoshop installed on your PC or Mac. This course is not compatible with Adobe Elements.
Before taking this course, you should be familiar with Photoshop and feel confident using the interface.
Familiarity in applying adjustments such as Levels and Curves will be a benefit.
Although the course shows Photoshop CC, any version of Photoshop released in the past 15 years will work.
courses.description:
Photoshop is an exceptionally powerful and the tool of choice for professional photography retouching. But with this power and flexibility comes complexity. Complexity that can make it difficult to learn and use, with new tools being added regularly
One of the most common tasks you will need to perform is selective adjustment. Perhaps you want to create a black and white photo an isolated area of colour? Maybe you want to replace a clear blue sky with fluffy white clouds? Or, do you want to combine multiple images into a single scene? And I’m certain you want the finished image to be of excellent quality.
Despite all the new tools and advances, professional image editors will repeatedly turn to the techniques outlined in this course. These allow you to create complex and detailed masks with speed and precision. In many instances, more easily and with greater accuracy than the latest tools. Like many things in life, once you learn the best techniques, achieving great results becomes easy.
This course will help you learn and master the essential skills of channel masking. All the skills you need to create and refine complex masks are explained in full. Working with the images you see in the videos you can follow each lessons step by step; all the image files are provided. The course also includes two full length examples, again with sample images for you to follow.
Watch the course trailer now to see these powerful techniques in use.
target_audience: This course will appeal to people who want to edit or enhance photographs to a professional standard.
Digital artists interested in compositing art work from multiple sources will find the techniques valuable.
Anyone who wants to advance their Photoshop skills.

courses.description:
Are you eager to capture mouth-watering food photos that stand out? Whether you're just starting out or looking to refine your skills, Food Photography 101 is the perfect course to take your photography to the next level.
In this course, you'll discover the creative and technical secrets that will elevate your food photography, making your images truly irresistible.
I'm Barbara, a seasoned professional food photographer with years of experience. Since 2010, my work has been featured on various platforms, and I've had the honor of being recognized multiple times by the prestigious World Food Photography Awards, a global celebration of excellence in food photography. Now, I'm thrilled to share my expertise with you.
Whether you're aiming to be an Instagram influencer, a food blogger, or a professional food photographer for restaurants and magazines, this course is designed with your goals in mind. You'll gain the insights and techniques needed to create stunning, professional-grade food photos.

By the end of this course, you'll be fully equipped to make confident decisions about camera settings, master the art of styling and composition, and execute flawless food photoshoots.
What Other Students Say:

courses.description:
WILLKOMMEN ZUM ULTIMATIVEN ADOBE LIGHTROOM CLASSIC CC KURS AUF UDEMY
(Stand: 11.2017, Lightroom Classic CC 2018)

Adobe Photoshop Lightroom Classic CC Experte Justus Zeemann zeigt dir in diesem Kurs Schritt für Schritt, wie du deine Bilder wie ein Profi bearbeiten und verwalten kannst. Justus ist seit 5 Jahren erfolgreicher Fotograf und Videograf. Durch die Betreuung vieler Unternehmen hat er sich ein umfangreiches Wissen angeeignet. In diesem Kurs zeigt er dir alles, was du brauchst, um mit Adobe Lightroom Classic CC erfolgreich zu sein und deine Bilder in der Zukunft professioneller und schneller zu bearbeiten.
"Vielen Dank für diesen Kurs Justus! Es ist unfassbar wie viel Arbeit du in diesen Kurs gesteckt hast. Ich bin eine Person, die nicht besonders gerne Produkte im Internet kauft, dein Kurs war aber jeden Cent Wert! A++!"
- (Marlene K., Innsbruck, Österreich)
In diesem Kurs lernst du Lightroom richtig kennen. Angefangen beim DateiImport und der Verwaltung über die Bearbeitung und den Export (natürlich auch für´s Web) bis zur Druckvorbereitung für Papierbilder oder Bücher. Jede Funktion wird durchgesprochen und erklärt. Zusätzlich erfährst du Tipps & Tricks, Hotkeys, erhälst die Kursbilder zum Mitarbeiten und vieles mehr.

courses.description:
Featured Review:
"I didn't think flower photography could be so interesting, but the examples here with off camera flash and gels are exciting to see. A nice correlation between 'portrait' photography principles to still life. Sandy is concise and enthusiastic!" - Brian Schumacher
Hi and Welcome to our course "The Ultimate Masterclass For Creative Flower Photography" - A new tutorial in our photography series.
Crafting FANTASTIC images instead of BORING ones - this is especially important when photographing flowers and botanical locations. Many things can go wrong. For example, petals are very delicate. When the sun hits them from the wrong angle - their color bleaches out quickly. Instead of beautiful vibrancy, we see white patches.
Also - our eyes deceive us. We look at this fantastic location and think: "Oh, wow! It's so beautiful!" But when we try to capture this radiant field through our camera - the images appear flat and lackluster. Or with too much contrast. Or the wind made the capture blurry! Or - worst of all - the flowers look plain boring. You created an "okay" photograph. But NOT fine art. You wouldn't print this image or design wall art for your home.
But this is what we want to achieve, right? We want to create something special! How can you accomplish this? By learning our S.P.E.C.I.A.L recipe and our easy yet fun tricks!


In this course you will learn:
How to elevate your PHOTOGRAPHY to FINE ART PHOTOGRAPHY
How to master the power of Storytelling, Exposure, Composition, Illumination, Ambiance Feel and Lightroom (or Post-Production)
How to "SET THE SCENE" for your flower - from BORING to EXCITING
How to expose in natural light: From HDR bracketing to romantic looking images. Or: From vintage to funky designs. You decide!
How to create unique "light effects" with flashguns, gels, and simple accessories! If natural light photography is not "your thing" - then these tricks will spark your interest and inspiration for sure!
How to create compelling compositions, concepts, projects and so much more


At the end of this course, you'll be able to create the most beautiful "fine art" flower images. Instead of buying such photographs, you will be able to design them yourself! The only requirement: A DSLR, some accessories, a basic understanding of your camera's manual functions and: Being interested in becoming a more creative photographer!
Flower Photography has a great variety of techniques! Become a better photographer while having fun! Welcome, and see you in class!

You may be thinking that you need expensive photography gear to capture brilliant slow-shutter waterfall photos. Not true! Here is a list of the minimal gear that you will need to create stunning waterfall images:
CAMERA: Any DSLR or mirrorless camera will work, using whatever lenses you already own.
iPHONE: If you don't own a larger camera, there is a bonus module devoted entirely to iPhone waterfall photography.
TRIPOD: Even the cheapest, plastic tripod will work just fine for you. No need to break the bank!
FILTERS (Optional): To extend your waterfall photos beyond 30 seconds, Mark explains which filters will work well for you, and why.
Please watch the promo video for this course to get a visual understanding of what you will be able to create with your own camera after finishing the course.
There is no risk in you investing in this course! If its not working out for you, simply request a refund within 30 days and there will be no hard feelings :)
My name is Mark Hemmings, and I would encourage you to do a Google search for "Mark Hemmings Photography" to confirm that I am legit, and well-positioned to guide you in any course instructing scenario. I love teaching photography, and I hope to see YOU within the course!

courses.description:
DESCRIÇÃO
Olá! Eu sou o Willian, professor e fundador do projeto Anime Arte, boas-vindas a todos que buscam aprender, conhecer e até se aprimorar no Lightroom, neste curso iremos ensinar todos os truques, técnicas, e formas de dominar o programa mais usado em todo mundo quando se trata de edição de imagens, da maneira mais fácil e prática!


Contando com diversos exercícios e trabalhos que vão estimular além da criatividade e a imaginação.


Um sistema de didática simples e de fácil entendimento, voltada para todos os públicos.


E com suporte completo ao aluno, através das correções e um tira-dúvidas diretamente com o professor.


Além de um certificado exclusivo da própria Anime Arte.




A todos aqueles que buscam conhecer e até se aprimorar nesses programas, seja ingressando no mercado de trabalho ou até por hobby, é com enorme satisfação que já contamos com milhares de alunos, a nossa grande motivação e o nosso muito obrigado a todos vocês.
Um grande abraço!
Até lá!


Pra quem é este curso:


Para todos aqueles que buscam aprender, conhecer e até se aprimorar no programa de edição de imagens mais utilizados por fotográfos e amantes das edições de imagens.
E para aqueles que pretendem ingressar na área ou até mesmo por hobby.


Requesitos
Apenas um computador (Mac ou Windows), ou um celular (Smartphone), para visualizar as aulas.
Uma conexão com a internet.
O aluno possuir o programa Adobe Lightroom Classic (em Português).
target_audience: Todos que querem se aprofundar no adobe lightroom e edição de imagens profissionais
Este curso é indicado até mesmo para quem já tem conhecimento no programa pois abordamos técnicas e dicas avançadas e profissionais
O curso são para todos os apaixonados por cinema , games, informática, tecnologia , animes , quadrinhos e artes em geral
Este é o programa essencial na carreia de qualquer editor de imagens e fotográfos.

courses.description:
Have you got photos on your computer just sitting there gathering dust?
Have you tried following tutorials only to find they assume you know which panel is which, and what all the names and icons mean?
Do you just want to print a photo, but no one will give you a straight answer on how to do it?
I hear you!


Photo Editing for Absolute Beginners answers the most common questions that new Photoshop Elements users ask me. Straight to the point, using the simplest method that will get you in and out of Photoshop Elements in a couple of minutes.
You'll learn how to:
Find your way around the Photoshop Elements workspace - so you can find the tools and commands you need
Open a photo in Photoshop Elements - and save it so that you can't ruin your original
Edit a photo in quick mode - and improve the look of your photos
Crop a photo for printing - so you get the whole subject in the frame
Add text to a photo - tell your story or make a postcard
Save a photo for printing online - so the prints look the best they can
Print at home - on photo paper of ANY size

You’ll gain the confidence to work on your own - even if you are brand new to Photoshop Elements

courses.description:
Got photos? Got stories to tell? Spend an hour with me and I'll show you how to create gorgeous digital scrapbook pages! Join me for Digital Scrapbooking for Absolute Beginners to learn the simple steps you can take to create your very own digital scrapbook pages. You don't need to be an expert with Photoshop to create digital scrapbook pages. You just need the right help.
Have you experienced the joy of seeing a captive audience leafing through the pages of a beautiful scrapbook you’ve designed and printed just for them?
Join me for Digital Scrapbooking for Absolute Beginners to learn the simple steps you can take to create your very own digital scrapbook pages.
You don't need to be an expert with Photoshop to create digital scrapbook pages. You just need the right help.


Have you tried following tutorials only to find they assume you know which panel is which what, and what all the names and icons mean?
Have you tried to get a photo or text onto your page only to get frustrated and give up when you can’t get it right?
I know how you feel! I spent hours trying to teach myself the basics, and I haven't forgotten how confusing it all seems at first.
Digital Scrapbooking for Absolute Beginners will take you from the very beginning and walk you through step by step through the process of building a layout. You’ll follow along using the same supplies as I do and in the end, you’ll be thrilled with your pages.
I'll take you by the hand and lead you around the Photoshop Elements workspace - so you can find the tools and commands you need. Inside this class I get straight to the point, teaching the most straightforward methods to get results fast. My videos are short and sweet, using the menus and tools to make my videos easy to follow. I use professionally edited screencasts so that you can see everything clearly!
Inside Digital Scrapbooking for Absolute Beginners you'll find:
Videos and step by step written handouts – so however you learn best, you’re covered
A gorgeous designer kit from Studio Flergs - so you can follow along exactly and play with the gorgeous product!
A 'quick page' a pre-designed page so that you add photos and your own words to get started quickly
quick page preview
A template, sort of like training wheels for scrapbooking, so that you can get creative without having to learn the more challenging features in Photoshop Elements
template preview
How to save your page for printing online - so the pages look the best they can
I'll be there to guide you through every video and you’ll gain the confidence to work on your own - even if you are brand new to Photoshop Elements
Usually I teach this class in my digital scrapbooking studio here in Perth, Australia. But, thanks to the wonders of technology, I'm able to share the excitement of creating digital scrapbooking pages with you, no matter where you live.
target_audience: Absolute Beginners who would like to try a new way to document their expereiences with digital scrapbooking.

courses.description:
Model Photography: Build a Profitable Photo Business
Are you ready to turn your passion for photography into a real business? In this Model Photography Course, I’ll show you how to get started, work with models, capture stunning images, and actually make money doing it.
This course is designed for both beginners and experienced photographers who want to break into the world of model photography. Over the past two years, I’ve invested hundreds of hours and dollars into perfecting this training — including paying real professional models to appear in this course. The result? A photography product that already generated solid profits, and now I’m showing you how I did it.
You’ll learn everything from:
What gear and equipment you need to get started
How to find models and build your portfolio
How to direct and shoot high-quality model photos
Editing basics, including turning color images into striking black-and-white shots
How to submit your work to stock sites and sell your photos online
Plus, you’ll get to see behind-the-scenes footage of real photoshoots, watch as I work with models on set, and follow along as we edit the images together.
You’ll also hear directly from experienced models in exclusive interviews — giving you unique insights into how to collaborate, communicate, and get the best shots possible.
By the end of this course, you’ll be ready to launch your own model photography business, create eye-catching listings, and start making money from your art.
What’s Included:
Practical lessons from real-world experience
Video interviews with professional models
Behind-the-scenes photo shoots and editing walkthroughs
Proven tips to market and sell your images
Tools and resources to build your photography brand


About Your Instructor:
I'm Sergey Kasimov, an entrepreneur and ecommerce seller since 2001. I’ve taught over 200,000+ students online, and photography has been one of my lifelong passions. I’ve been shooting digital photos since 2005 and have worked in various areas — from event photography to online image sales.
Whether you're brand new or looking to sharpen your skills, my mission is to help you build confidence, master your craft, and grow your business.
Bonuses & Office Hours:
With your paid enrollment, you also get:
A free 15-minute Google Hangout coaching session
Fast answers to any course-related questions within 24 hours
Access to live office hours — 30 to 60-minute Q&A sessions where I answer your questions directly
Certificate of Completion:
Finish 100% of the course and receive a certificate you can print, share, or add to your resume as proof of your skills.
Money-Back Guarantee:
You get lifetime access to all course materials and future updates, plus Udemy’s 30-day money-back guarantee. No risk — just real training and results.

A Journey to Capturing Life's Moments with Confidence and No Prior Photography Experience Required
courses.description:
Empower Your Vision: A Journey of Discovery and Mastery in Photography Awaits You!
Welcome to this inclusive photography course that is designed to accommodate photographers at every level.
Whether you're a beginner eager to learn the basics of camera modes and techniques or an advanced photographer seeking to refine your skills and elevate your craft, this class has something for you.
Get ready to embark on a thrilling journey of growth and inspiration as you bring your photography goals to life!


The course covers:


Lecture 1: Introduction
Lecture 2: The shooting modes of the camera
Lecture 3: How to quickly switch between automatic and manual
Lecture 4: Do you have to shoot in manual?
Lecture 5: Five composition methods for improving your camera technique
Lecture 6: The three main lighting types in photography
Lecture 7: Harsh light
Lecture 8: Soft light
Lecture 9: Reflected light
Lecture 10: Tips, tricks, and advice to jump-start your photography
Lecture 11: Thank you! Other resources to continue your photography journey
You will learn:
Unlock the Potential of Your Camera: Navigate Shooting Modes with Ease
Discover the Art of Manual Mode: Unleash Your Creativity in a Snap
Composition Mastery: Elevate Your Technique and Captivate Your Audience
The Power of Light: A Guide to the Three Main Lighting Types in Photography
Expert Insights: Jump-Start Your Photography Goals with Tips and Tricks from a Professional Photographer
As your teacher, my goal is to ignite your passion for photography and empower you to capture life's best moments.
My love for photography began at age 10 when my grandmother gifted me a camera, and since then I have dedicated my life to sharing the gift of photography with others.
Thank you for choosing me as your guide, and I am thrilled to join you on this journey of discovery and growth.
Let's bring your photography goals to life together!
Charlie Naebeck
target_audience: Beginner photographers: A Journey of Learning, Exploration, and Self-Discovery as a Beginner Photographer
Advanced photographers: A Guide to Revitalizing Your Photography with Advanced Shooting Modes, Lighting Techniques, and Engaging Exercises
