courses.description:
Hi my name is Matthias Hombauer and I am a pro music photographer.
You’re passionate about music and photography and your dream is to get started with concert photography?
However, there can be a lot of challenges and frustrations
- it´s hard to get started without any professional photography training
- it´s hard to know which camera gear you should buy in the beginning (there are so many options, and it’s difficult to decide!)
- It´s hard to figure out all the camera settings to get the best shots in front of the stage (the automatic camera mode won´t do the trick)
- It´s hard to build your first portfolio
All these new challenges can be quite overwhelming and if you don´t find someone to guide you, it can take you years until you get started.
Since I know that you don´t have the time to waste years of your life to figuring all of this out I’m offering a step-by-step video guide that will help you get started and kickstart your music photography career (it doest matter if it´s only your hobby or if you want to become a pro).
"Matthias is a great Mentor and I learned so much from his concert photography course. My favourites were the camera & lens lessons. He gave a simple, but in depth overview about a topic that I was always scared of. There are a some many options and I didn´t even know which camera and lens I should buy for concert photography. After this course I have the confidence to start as music photographer and I can´t wait to get out and try the things I have learned. Thank you so much!" - Lin *****

courses.description:
This course will take you through all of the steps to create unique paintings from your photographs. Step by step, I break down all the things you need to know and understand in Photoshop to move your images out of a photographic appearance into a more painterly one.
Although, I do break everything into simple steps a basic understanding of the program is suggested. This course is perfect for intermediate to advanced users.
After completing this course you should be able to turn any photograph into a digital painting that you can be proud of.
Not an artist? Never painted before? That's OK.
You CAN learn to paint digitally and with a lot less expense and mess!
Whether you are a professional photographer looking to rise above your competition by offering paintings as a unique product to your clients, or you are simply a hobbyist who enjoys editing images creatively, you will find everything you need here to get started and create amazing art that you will be proud to show your family and friends.
Digital art can be created from just about any image, even low resolution ones from phone cameras. As a matter of fact, there is no requirement at all to even own a camera in order to benefit from this course. In one lecture I even show you how to find royalty free stock sites where you can download stunning photographs to paint from.
Included in the course are 60+ lectures, and almost 6 hours of in-depth video training. There are 3 practice sessions, where you can watch me paint as I go over everything I'm doing, step by step.
In the supplemental material sections, I have included the images I use throughout the course for you to download and practice along side me, but you will learn the skills needed to create a painting out of ANY image.
Enroll today, I'd love to help you learn this fun way to create art!
target_audience: Photographers who wish to do more with their images
Artists who wish to learn how to paint using digital medium
Anyone who wants to learn how to create a digital painting from a photograph

courses.title: Fotografie Grundlagen - Komplettkurs für Anfänger
courses.bio: Lerne die Grundlagen der digitalen Fotografie!
objectives: Grundlegende Funktion einer Kamera, Einstellen von ISO, Belichtungszeit und Blende
Erlernen des Konzepts des Belichtungsdreiecks
Unterschiede der verschiedenen Kameratypen und Sensoren

Auswahl und korrekter Einsatz von Fotozubehör

requirements: Der Kurs eignet sich für absolute Anfänger.
Ein Computer (Windows oder Mac) zur Bildbearbeitung wird benötigt.
Eine Kamera oder die Bereitschaft, sich später im Kurs eine Kamera zu kaufen, ist erforderlich.
courses.description:
Du hast eine Digitalkamera und möchtest nun wissen, wie man damit richtig gute Fotos macht? Im Onlinekurs Fotografie Grundlagen lernst du genau das!


Im ersten Teil des Kurses werfen wir einen Blick auf die Geschichte der Fotografie und klären die Frage, was eigentlich genau ein Foto ist. Du erfährst, wie eine Kamera genau funktioniert und wie verschiedene Kamera- und Sensortypen deine Bilder beeinflussen.
Außerdem stellen wir dir verschiedenes Fotozubehör vor, das dir dabei hilft, noch bessere Aufnahmen zu machen.
Weiter geht es mit der Vorstellung des Belichtungsdreiecks. Du wirst lernen, Blende, Belichtungszeit und ISO zu verstehen, manuell einzustellen und für deine Bildergebnisse zu nutzen.


Nachdem du die Fotografie Grundlagen gelernt hast, geht es im praktischen Teil des Kurses ans Fotografieren! Wir gehen gemeinsam raus und setzen das Gelernte direkt um. Dabei werfen wir noch einmal einen genauen Blick auf die verschiedenen Einstellungen wie Blende, Belichtungszeit, ISO sowie den Weißabgleich und gehen mit Beispielen detailliert auf verschiedene Blendenwerte wie f/2.8 und f/8 ein. Wir zeigen dir auch, wie du mithilfe der Belichtungszeit künstlerische Effekte erzielst. Außerdem erfährst du, welche ISO-Einstellung in welcher Situation die richtige ist.
Beim Fotowalk kommst du mit uns hinter die Kulissen. Wir fotografieren und erklären, was wir dabei wie einstellen. So erhältst du wertvolle Tipps aus der Foto-Praxis!


Nach dem Fotografieren kehren wir ins Studio zurück und widmen uns der Bildbearbeitung. Du lernst die grundlegenden Techniken der Fotobearbeitung mit der kostenpflichtigen Software Lightroom und wie du aus einer RAW-Datei ein gutes JPG machst. Aber keine Sorge! Neben Lightroom stellen wir auch einige kostenlose Bearbeitungsprogramme vor.
Abschließend sprechen wir über die Veröffentlichung deiner Bilder sowie über die Sicherung deiner Daten mit verschiedenen Speichersystemen wie Cloud-Speicher oder RAID-Speicher.


Neben den Videoinhalten stehen dir hilfreiche PDF-Downloads zur Verfügung, darunter das Belichtungsdreieck, das du ausdrucken und für weiterführende Lerneffekte immer griffbereit in deine Fototasche packen kannst.


Falls du noch unschlüssig bist, ob dieser Kurs das Richtige für dich ist, empfehlen wir dir, dich vorab in unseren kostenlosen Online-Kurs "Digitalfotografie Crashkurs" einzuschreiben. Dort erhältst du einen kurzen Einblick in das Thema und kannst grundlegende Konzepte erlernen.


Deine Dozenten Denis und Anna Sandmann verfügen über mehr als 10 Jahre Erfahrung im Bereich Foto- und Videoproduktion. Mit ihrer eigenen Social Media Agentur beliefern sie jeden Monat zahlreiche Kundenseiten mit frischem Foto- und Video-Content. Nach der Einschreibung in den Kurs Fotografie Grundlagen kannst du jederzeit Fragen stellen und erhältst Antworten direkt vom Foto-Profi!


Bist du bereit für richtig gute Fotos? Dann bis gleich im Kurs!
target_audience: Anfänger der Fotografie, die neu beginnen möchten.
Hobbyfotografen, die die Technik hinter der Fotografie verstehen wollen.
Fotografen, die grundlegende fotografische Konzepte verstehen möchten.
Personen, die bereits erste Erfahrungen mit der Fotografie gesammelt haben, aber ihre Kenntnisse vertiefen möchten.

---------------------------------------------------
CORSO IN ITALIANO SU AURORA HDR 2018
Aurora HDR 2018 è il risultato di un progetto congiunto tra Skylum e Trey Ratcliff per produrre il software di foto-ritocco HDR più potente, semplice e veloce al mondo per Mac e PC: Aurora HDR.
Skylum è uno dei principali sviluppatori al mondo di software per la fotografia di consumo e professionale, che produce software per Mac, Windows e ha clienti aziendali in tutto il mondo.
Trey Ratcliff è probabilmente il fotografo di HDR più famoso al mondo, con oltre 16 milioni di follower online e oltre 145 miliardi di visualizzazioni delle sue immagini sul suo sito web, Google +, Facebook ed altri social .
Quando Skylum ha cercato di creare il miglior software HDR di sempre, si sono rivolti a Trey per assisterti in tutte le fasi.
Utilizzando la vasta esperienza di Trey con gli attuali strumenti sul mercato e la tecnologia avanzata di Skylum, è stato creato un software all'avanguardia per aiutare i fotografi di tutti i livelli di abilità a realizzare incredibili foto ad alta gamma dinamica.
IN QUESTO CORSO IN ITALIANO
Io ti faccio conoscere Aurora HDR 2018 e ti insegno - attraverso delle videolezioni e un manuale operativo in Italiano - come usarlo e sfruttarlo al meglio per realizzare splendide immagini HDR.
BONUS DEL CORSO!
Download delle foto che utilizzo nelle lezioni online.
CHI SONO E QUALI SONO LE MIE COMPETENZE
Fotografo, videomaker, blogger o podcaster? Non esiste una etichetta per definire "chi sono" e "cosa faccio". Forse l'unica che si avvicina è "Content Creator", un creatore di contenuti.
Tutto quello che faccio sono solo il risultato di una mia grande passione per l'argomento trattato! Se l'argomento mi piace lo approfondisco e alla fine condivido la mia esperienza e quanto appreso.
COSA TI PROMETTO
Sarò a disposizione per ogni tuo dubbio. Potrai contattarmi direttamente tramite la piattaforma Udemy per inoltrarmi un messaggio o chiarimento dove cercherò, nel più breve tempo possibile, di darti una risposta o aiutarti a risolvere la tua problematica.
Puoi anche contattarmi per suggerirmi delle modifiche da fare al corso, aggiungendo degli argomenti che vorresti veder trattati o che vorresti voler approfonditi ulteriormente.
COSA IMPARERAI CON QUESTO CORSO
Seguendo il corso potrai imparare velocemente tutte le funzionalità del software Affinity Photo e come sfruttarlo nel migliore dei modi per pos-produrre le tue immagini con un software praticamente identico a Photoshop senza essere vincolato ad un abbonamento mensile.
Il punto di forza consiste nel fatto che non dovrai perdere ore a cercare informazioni su internet, guardando video su YouTube interrotti ogni 30 secondi da pubblicità o cercando di imparare il software da autodidatta, ma potrai ottimizzare il tuo tempo apprendendo velocemente il workflow (flusso di lavoro) corretto da utilizzare.
La piattaforma Udemy ti mette a disposizione una gradevole interfaccia d’uso, un’app per smartphone (Android oppure iOS) perfettamente funzionante, in modo da seguire le lezioni quando vuoi, dove vuoi e come vuoi 24 al giorno per 365 giorni all’anno!
ATTENZIONE
Tutti i corsi su Udemy sono coperti da garanzia 30 giorni e ricevi un attestato di frequentazione fine corso che puoi inserire nel tuo curriculum Linkedin.
COSA CAMBIA TRA QUESTO CORSO E LA VERSIONE SUL MIO SITO?
I corsi su Udemy hanno un prezzo più accessibile ma:
hanno una risoluzione massima HD (1080x720);
non è garantita l'aggiunta di nuove lezioni nel tempo;
non è possibile scaricare le videolezioni sul tuo computer.

courses.description:
Willkommen in der Welt der KI-Videoproduktion – deinem Einstieg in eine völlig neue Art, Content zu erstellen. In diesem praxisnahen Kurs lernst du, wie du beeindruckende, virale Videos ganz einfach und ohne technische Vorkenntnisse erstellst – mithilfe leistungsstarker KI-Tools wie Google Veo, OpenAI Sora, Kling AI und HeyGen.


Wir starten ganz von vorne: Du bekommst eine verständliche Einführung in das Thema Künstliche Intelligenz und erfährst, warum genau jetzt der richtige Zeitpunkt ist, in KI-Videos einzusteigen. Du lernst die wichtigsten Tools kennen, verstehst die Grundlagen des Promptings und erfährst, wie du schon mit wenigen Klicks dein erstes eigenes Video produzieren kannst.


Du wirst Schritt für Schritt durch alle Tools geführt:
Erstelle dein erstes Video mit Google Veo, verwandle Texte mit OpenAI Sora in dynamische Clips, lass deine Bilder mit Kling AI sprechen und kreiere realistische Avatare mit HeyGen – sogar mit deiner eigenen Stimme.


Doch Technik allein reicht nicht: Du lernst, wie du deine Videos gezielt vermarktest, mit SEO, Keywords und Plattformstrategie Millionen Menschen erreichst und auf Wunsch sogar mit UGC-KI-Videos Geld verdienen kannst – z. B. über Werbung oder Kundenprojekte. Selbst wenn du noch keine Referenzen hast, zeigen wir dir, wie du potenzielle Kunden überzeugst, Potenziale erkennst und deine ersten Aufträge gewinnst.


Dieser Kurs ist perfekt für dich, wenn du …
… Content ohne Kamera, Studio oder Schnittsoftware erstellen willst
… mit wenig Aufwand virale Reels, Ads und Kurzvideos produzieren möchtest
… Tools wie Veo, Sora oder HeyGen endlich praktisch verstehen und nutzen willst
… deine Reichweite steigern oder dir ein KI-basiertes Einkommen aufbauen möchtest


Alles, was du brauchst, ist Neugier. Du musst kein Technik-Profi sein – du lernst alles Schritt für Schritt.


Am Ende dieses Kurses wirst du in der Lage sein, selbstbewusst mit den modernsten KI-Videotools zu arbeiten, Content für dich oder Kunden zu erstellen und die Welt mit deinen kreativen Ideen zu erreichen.
target_audience: Für Einsteiger:innen, die mit KI-Videos durchstarten möchten – ganz ohne Vorkenntnisse

courses.description:
Andy Hornby's Landscape Photography Academy is not your traditional online course. It’s also a Mentorship, providing personal feedback crafted specifically for you and no one else.
With each assignment that you complete, you will receive a personalised feedback video to help you push your Photography even further. By the time you go through the entire course you will have received hours of personal feedback. Content that is crafted specifically for you and your progress.


Discover My Newest Project-Based Landscape Photography Academy
Does the following sound familiar to you?
You’ll study guidebooks and read internet blogs…
…but like most photographers, you want to be out doing what got you into photography in the first place
You want to be out shooting pictures! Of course, you want to learn new skills…but, you don’t fancy having your nose buried in some lengthy training manual…


In addition, you desire to develop your own style as a photographer…
And there is really only ONE WAY to accomplish all of that.


What is that one way?
The secret is learning ‘different’ skillsets, while you’re actually out creating pictures and getting valuable feedback on your progress. And today you’ll get your chance to do just that...


Introducing...
THE ONLINE LANDSCAPE PHOTOGRAPHY ACADEMY:
With loads of photography assignments to expand your shooting skills!
This Mentorship program gets you actually doing photography, providing you with suggested considerations, and giving you SPECIFIC photo assignments.

They’ll kick you out of bed, to go have a personal discovery experience all on your own. You can learn new skills, unearth your particular shooting style, and accomplish all of this through completing actionable assignments similar to a full-fledged UNIVERSITY course. After each Lecture, you’ll be out shooting instead of reading about it. Once you submit your assignments, you'll be given personalised feedback so you can improve.
Think about this - isn’t that what University is all about, to help you find your path in life? Right now you have the opportunity to choose your path… rather than be led down one.


How does it work?
After signing up for the Academy you will immediately receive access to all Academy lectures taking you through from Beginner courses to Advanced Techniques.
At the end of each lecture you will be provided an assignment to progress your Photography.
After submitting your assignment you will receive a hand crafted feedback video on your progress, giving you actionable steps to take your work to the next level (if required).
At each stage of the course you will learn and practice new principles and the fundamentals of Photography.
By the end of this course you will confidently flow through each step.

What is Included?
This course is designed to take slowly and learn at your own pace. Topics range from very beginner (general photography), through intermediate landscape photography and on to more advanced artistic Techniques. And then on to editing and finishing your project.
Focused assignments that will result in better photography.
One price for life - Pay once and that's it!
Receive personalised feedback and recommendations.
Learn Lightroom and Photoshop and when to use what!
Lifetime access to all lectures and mentorship sessions.
The Secret to the Online Landscape Photography Academy
Assignments & Retention...
It’s been proven that studying a concept, and then being given a specific actionable assignment will help you retain more information.


Here are the facts
Retention, through reading, is low.
Retention through active learning is very high!
These photographic concepts, which you may have had struggled with for years, will suddenly become crystal clear! You get to watch the lectures over and over again. Retaining all of the information and then doing the assignments. This will make you a better photographer.


I bet you're a bit like me...
…You’re a doer. You learn photography best by doing. You learn by action and activity…
You’re not one to sit down with a textbook and study until your eyes bleed.
You like to get your hands dirty.
You love learning new photographic skills and techniques, and then you practice, and practice, and do even more practice… until you can get it right.
You, (just like me), desire some guidance on where to start in your learning process. Plus, you too, want to ‘uncover’ your own photographic style. You want to be recognised and have your images ‘standout’ as your own.
P.S You Really only have 2 options...
OPTION 1 - You keep doing what you're doing now. Keep getting the same results you've been getting and continue praying that eventually you'll figure this whole photography thing out
...Or...
OPTION 2 - Take control of your photography now. Grab this deal and give yourself a fresh, project-based, learning experience & Mentorship program. This course will give you the knowledge and confidence you need to shoot Landscapes like a pro, every time, in ANY situation.

requirements: Eine eigene Digitalkamera mit (mind.) HD-Auflösung
Kenntnisse um Umgang mit der eigenen Kamera
Dies ist kein Fotografie-Kurs!
courses.description:
Dieser Kurs führt in die HDR-Fotografie und die HDR-Bildbearbeitung ein. Es ist nicht das Ziel, Aufnahmen künstlerisch zu gestalten (Over-HDR-ing), sondern die vorhandenen Lichtinformationen in Bildinformationen umzuwandeln. Dies bedeutet, lichtschwache Bildstellen so zu verändern, dass sie der natürlichen Wahrnehmung entsprechen; gleichzeitig werden überstrahlte Bildstellen abgeschwächt und ebenfalls an das menschliche Sehvermögen angepasst.
All dies ist kein Hexenwerk, wenn Ihr einige wenige Grundsätze beherzigt. Welche das sind, zeige ich Euch in diesem Kurs. Es ist nicht wesentlich, welche Software Ihr dazu nutzt oder nutzen möchtet; da ich selbst HDR nur als Mittel zum Zweck betrachte, verwende ich ein günstiges, aber in meinen Augen trotzdem gutes (vor allem mehr als ausreichendes) Programm hier im Kurs, das HDR projects (fast immer in der nicht mehr ganz aktuellen Version für 20,- Euro zu haben). Gerne könnt Ihr aber andere Programme verwenden, die Vorgehensweise ist immer sehr ähnlich.
Ich möchte anmerken, dass dies kein Kurs zur Fotografie ist. Ich gehe davon aus, dass Ihr wisst, wie Ihr mit Eurer Kamera umgehen müsst. Selbst falls Eure Kamera keine automatische Funktion für das "Bracketing" besitzt (was ein Segen sein kann), können HDR-Bilder damit erzeugt und später verarbeitet werden.
Lasst Euch auf das Abenteuer HDR ein! Es lohnt sich!
target_audience: Hobby-Fotografen (Einsteiger), die mehr Details aus ihren Fotos herausholen möchten

requirements: Computador com Affinity Photo instalado.
courses.description:
Quer aprender a ter ou deixar suas fotografias lindas e profissionais? Vou te ensinar um passo a passo certeiro dentro do editor de imagens profissional Affinity Photo, que é como um irmão do Adobe Photoshop, pois são quase idênticos.


O Affinity Photo pode ser pensado como a soma do Adobe Photoshop e do Adobe Lightroom. Além disso, leve, moderno e rápido!


Você não precisa ter conhecimento nenhum de edição, pois ensinarei do absoluto zero o processo desenvolvido ao longo dos anos e que funciona em retrato, new born, gestante, casal, sensual e outros estilos.


O curso é completo e recomendado para amadores e profissionais. Aborda conhecimentos básicos e avançados. E mesmo você tendo algum conhecimento básico, o ideal é assistir na ordem e integralmente o curso, pois tudo está explicado de forma lógica em mais de 60 vídeos.


Suas fotos comuns ou amadoras serão coisas do passado. Prepare-se para receber em poucas horas os aprendizados que levaria anos para aprender sozinho. Assim, não perderá tempo, reduzirá os erros e poderá editar de forma profissional e do jeito que gosta.


Ao fim do curso você será capaz de trabalhar os tons e cores de uma forma incrível, corrigir problemas de cenário, eliminar elementos, tratar a pele, aplicar nitidez, aperfeiçoar cada detalhe com o Dodge and Burn, trocar fundos, fazer uma edição completa em poucos minutos e tantas outras coisas. E o melhor, tudo com naturalidade.


O curso é indicado para todos que queiram dar um salto de qualidade na fotografia, pois as etapas formam um fluxo completo, desenvolvido ao longo de anos nas minhas fotografias de retrato e viagens pelo mundo.
Comece hoje mesmo. Você não vai se arrepender.
target_audience: Fotógrafos amadores e profissionais que queiram aprender a transformar rapidamente e com naturalidade inúmeros estilos de fotografia.

Do you own a Canon DSLR camera?
Are you thinking of buying a new lens?
Are you unsure about what lens to get next?
Do you just want some straight answers, not more jargon?


This course on lenses for Canon DSLR cameras is designed for you !
Imagine how great it feels to take great pictures with your camera because you did your research and bought the right lens for the job. No compromising with angles or apertures, or having to get closer or stepping back. Just having the perfect lens for the pictures you want to take....
Created for beginners, hobbyists and enthusiasts, this course on Canon DSLR lenses is the ideal course for anyone who wants to know more about the lenses available for Canon DSLR cameras, or is looking to buy a new lens, but is unsure where to get clear, balanced information.
It doesn't matter whether you own a full frame Canon camera or a crop frame Canon camera. This course covers options for both!
Beginning with a lecture about what lenses actually do, and working through Focal Length and Aperture to MTF charts, lens distortions and lens code abbreviations, this course explains everything you need to know in a straight-forward way, so that you can research your new lenses with confidence.
In this course you will see great examples of the kinds of pictures each lens type can take, look at specific lenses in detail, understand depth of field and hyperfocal distance, find out about filters and extenders and much, much more.
The author, Jeremy Bayston, has been a picture editor for national newspapers in the UK for over 25 years and brings a wealth of experience to the course. He has produced over 4 hours of specially made lectures, which go into greater detail on Prime and Zoom lenses, Specialist lenses, Third party lenses, Best lenses for each photographic style, What to watch out for when you buy a lens, and much more.
With the right lens you can take exactly to kind of pictures you want to take. That feeling of deep satisfaction of having your photos admired by your friends is almost impossible to beat...


This lecture course:
• Has 15 exclusive videos (18 in total - over 4 hours) with written resources.

• Shows you what Wide angle, Standard and Telephoto lenses can do - their strengths and weaknesses.
• This course teaches you about the lenses available for your Canon DSLR camera in an accessible way, with minimum jargon.


Each full lecture has resource notes with suggestions and, of course, if you have any questions, you can contact Jeremy through the Udemy dashboard.

courses.description:
Bu kurs ile fotoğrafçılığı ister hobi, ister sanat, isterseniz profesyonel olarak yapmak veya işinizde kullanmak için öğrenebilirsiniz. İhtiyaç duyduğunuz bütün düzeylere ulaşmanıza yardımcı olacak bir eğitim programıdır. Fotoğrafçılık hakkında hiç bilgi birikimi olmayan ve ya bilgi birikimini geliştirmek isteyen bütün bireyler için uygun şekilde tasarlanmıştır. Makine ve bilgisayar üzerinde doğrudan uygulama şekilde anlatımlar ile konular işlenmiştir. Bütün konular kolaydan zora doğru ilerler. 10 yılı aşkın bir süredir uygulanan ve başarı oranı %100 olan bir ders örgüsüne sahiptir. Dersleri sırası ile takip eder ve uygulamaları yaparsanız bundan sonraki yaşantınızda özel olarak ilgi duyduğunuz alanda kimseye ihtiyaç duymadan ilerleyebilecek hale geleceğiniz bir eğitimdir.

courses.title: Etkileyici Fotoğraf Düzenleme Teknikleri
courses.bio: Dünyaca ünlü fotoğrafçı İlhan Eroğlu ile fotoğraflarınızı düzenleyerek nasıl en üst seviyeye çıkartacağınızı öğrenin!
objectives: Profesyonel anlamda fotoğraf düzenlemeyi öğreneceksiniz
Fotoğraflarınızı renk, ışık, gölge olarak çok daha etkili hale getirmeyi öğreneceksiniz
Çektiğiniz fotoğrafın raw (ham) halinde neler yapabileceğinizi öğreneceksiniz
Photoshop üzerinde renkler ile oynamayı, nasıl etkileyici renkler oluşturacağınızı öğreneceksiniz
Photoshop ile aydınlık ve gölgeleri nasıl etkili hale getirebileceğinizi kavrayacaksınız
Fotoğrafta sıcak ve soğuk kavramlarını öğrenip düzenlemesini öğreneceksiniz

Ben Kimim? Ne Yapacağız?: Öncesi ve Sonrası (Eğitim Sonunda Ne Yapabileceğinizi Görün)

requirements: Öğrencilerin başlangıç seviyesinde bilgisayar kullanmaları ve temel Photoshop bilgilerinin olması gerekmektedir.
Öğrenme hevesi ve öğrendiklerini yılmadan kendi fotoğraflarında uygulamak en önemli gereksinimdir.
courses.description:
Ben Kimim?
İsmim İlhan Eroğlu. Güzel sanatlar mezunu bir fotoğrafçıyım. Fotoğraf çekmek için 30'dan fazla ülke gezdim ve çektiğim bazı fotoğraflar dünyaca ünlü dergilerde kapak fotoğrafı olarak kullanıldı.
Neden Bu Eğitimi Yaptım?
Çektiğim fotoğrafları Instagram hesabımda paylaşmaya başladığımdan beri, hem internet üzerinden hem de tanıştığım kişiler fotoğraflarımın arkasındaki sırrı sormaya başladılar. Ben bilginin paylaştıkça artacağına inanıyorum. O nedenle soran herkesle sırlarımı paylaştım, ücretsiz dersler verdim. Fakat bu soruya şimdi nihai cevabı Udemy ile vermek istiyorum. Sizlerle birlikte çekmiş olduğum bir fotoğrafımı baştan sona düzenleyeceğiz, ve kullandığım bütün teknikleri, yöntemleri sizlerle paylaşacağım.
Bu Eğitim Sonunda Ne Olacak?
Bu eğitim sonunda bu işin püf noktalarını, tekniğini ve yöntemlerini öğreneceksiniz. Sonra bol bol pratik yapmalı, üşenmeden ve yılmadan kendi fotoğraflarınız üzerinde öğrendiklerinizi uygulamalısınız. Unutmayın bu işin sihirli bir değneği yok, hiçbir bilgisayar programı veya hiçbir fotoğraf makinası siz olmadan bu işi başaramaz. Fakat siz azim ve çalışma ile başarabilirsiniz.
Çektiğiniz fotoğrafın raw (ham) halinde neler yapabileceğinizi öğreneceksiniz
Fotoğrafın raw halinde renkleri, koyuluk - açıklık gibi özellikleri değiştirebileceksiniz
Photoshop üzerinde renkler ile oynamayı, nasıl etkileyici renkler oluşturacağınızı öğreneceksiniz
Photoshop ile aydınlık ve gölgeleri nasıl etkili hale getirebileceğinizi kavrayacaksınız
Fotoğrafta nasıl odak noktası oluşturulacağını göreceksiniz
Fotoğrafta sıcak ve soğuk kavramlarını öğrenip düzenlemesini öğreneceksiniz
Genel olarak fotoğraflarını ilk hallerinden çok daha etkili hale getireceksiniz
target_audience: Bu kursu profesyonel ya da amatör çektiği fotoğrafları daha etkileyici hale getirmek isteyen, renk, ışık açısından fotoğrafını en üst seviyeye çıkartmak isteyen kişiler almalı.

courses.title: 摄影后期处理全面提高篇--为摄影爱好者学习后期处理量身打造
courses.bio: 通过拍摄及后期操作前的准备、后期流程和后期应用等三大部分对数码摄影后期进行了透彻的阐述
objectives: 学习者能在拍摄时脑补后期画面，形成后期思路，培养艺术通感，完善独立风格，为最终成为思维不受羁绊、表现随心自由的个性摄影师开源铺路。
通过拍摄及后期操作前的准备、后期流程和后期应用等三大部分对数码摄影后期进行了透彻的阐述。让学生可以从较高的高度对数码摄影后期有了全局的认识和思考。
本课程将后期流程分为全局调整、曲线调整、局部调整、锐化、降噪和输出等六大步骤，使学生在后期操作时有法可依。
本课程在后期应用中着重介绍了照片的通透、影调、电影色调、Cinemagraph、Lab调色、接片、堆栈和创造光线等实用且流行的后期技术。

第01课·概述: 课时1 · 艺术，让人脱颖而出
课时2 · 摄影太难，难就难在太简单
课时4 · 心游于艺，道不远人
课时6 · 如何打造一件好的作品
课时7 · 发现 联系 重组
课时8 · 涉猎要广艺术通感
第02课·拍摄及后期操作前的准备: 课时4 · 照片风格软件设置
课时5 · 照片风格实拍比较
第03课·图片管理: 课时1 · Bridge简介及照片过滤
课时2 · Bridge照片的浏览及对比
课时3 · Bridge文件夹的命名方式
第04课·后期流程——全局调整: 课时3 · 校准黑白平衡
课时4 · 直方图与曝光
课时5 · 正确的黑白场
课时6 · 适当的反差与饱和度
课时7 · 基本调整案例1—raw的宽容度
课时8 · 基本调整案例2—矫正透视变形
课时9 · 基本调整案例3—二次构图（1）
课时10 · 基本调整案例4—二次构图（2）
课时11 · 基本调整案例5—二次构图（3）
课时12 · 基本调整案例6—去除薄雾
第05课·后期流程——曲线调整: 课时2 · 曲线的基本状态
课时3 · 曲线的形态和功能
课时4 · 曲线和通道的关系（1）
课时5 · 曲线和通道的关系（2）
课时6 · 几种典型的曲线调整案例
课时7 · 曲线可以代替大部分调色命令
课时8 · 曲线代替图层混合模式
第06课·后期流程——局部调整: 课时1 · HSL色彩局部调整
课时3 · 四种局部修饰的方法
第07课·后期流程——锐化与降噪: 课时1 · 锐化与降噪的技巧
课时2 · ACR的预置调色风格
第08课·后期流程——输出: 课时1 · 在 Photoshop中输出与批处理
第09课·应用篇: 课时5 · lab的艺术化调色

requirements: Photoshop cs5 以上版本
courses.description:
按下快门只是摄影的一部分，后期对于摄影来说同样的重要。
没有掌握后期技术的数码摄影师是不完整的，主动放弃后期处理更是艺术创作手段的缺失。
本套课程为摄影爱好者如何后期处理量身打造，自成一套体系。课程内容丰富，视角独特，立意较高。
目的是使学习者能在拍摄时脑补后期画面，形成后期思路，培养艺术通感，完善独立风格，为最终成为思维不受羁绊、表现随心自由的个性摄影师开源铺路。
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////


本课程通过拍摄及后期操作前的准备、后期流程和后期应用等三大部分对数码摄影后期进行了透彻的阐述。让学生可以从较高的高度对数码摄影后期有了全局的认识和思考。


本课程将后期流程分为全局调整、曲线调整、局部调整、锐化、降噪和输出等六大步骤，使读者在后期操作时有法可依。本课程在后期应用中着重介绍了照片的通透、影调、电影色调、Cinemagraph、Lab调色、接片、堆栈和创造光线等实用且流行的后期技术。这其中很多技术曾让从业者望而却步，本课程却将这些技术讲解的非常透彻和简捷，一定会让学生在数码摄影后期水平得到升华。


本课程适合广大摄影爱好者和摄影师，以及专业修图师参考学习。
target_audience: 摄影爱好者和摄影师
Photoshop 设计师
专业修图师

courses.title: Fotografía con cámara profesional - AulaGEO
courses.bio: Lo debes saber sobre fotografía - y como aplicarlo utilizando cámaras profesionales
objectives: Conceptos fundamentales de la fotogafía profesional
Manejo de cámara profesional
Prácticas explicadas paso a paso
Ejercicios prácticos de aplicación, retrato, bodegón, barrido y contraluz.

Triángulo de exposición y cámaras digita: Velocidad de obturación y sensibilidad ISO
Utilizando objetivos: Conozcamos los diferentes tipos de objetivos
Prácticas: Introducción al manejo de la cámara

requirements: Ninguno
courses.description:
Definición del Curso:
Este es un curso de fotografía para aquellos que quieren aprender los conceptos principales de la fotografía, con aplicación práctica paso a paso utilizando cámaras profesionales Reflex.
#AulaGEO
¿Qué aprenderá el usuario?
En el primer capítulo el curso presenta aspectos básicos de la fotografía, tal como el encuadre, profundidad de campo, barrido, bodegón, retrato y paisaje.  Adicionalmente se presentan los fundamentos del manejo de luz y el balance de blancos.
En el segundo capítulo se explica el tríangulo de exposición y se muestran las difentes partes y componentes de una cámara profesional.  En este caso se utilizan dos modelos:  Una cámara EOS 500d Rebel T1i y una cámara más moderna EOS 90D; buscando fundamentar que los principios son los mismos a pesar que las funcionalidades de los equipos más modernos lo vuelven más fácil e intuitivo.
Las explicaciones sobre estas dos cámaras mantienen un enfoque neutral, de modo que un usuario pueda entender cómo se hacen las cosas y el porqué, de modo que pueda manejar prácticamente cualquier modelo de cámara y marca.
El capítulo 4 trata sobre los diferentes lentes objetivo y el capítulo 5 sobre las reglas de composición fotográfica tales como:
Regla de tercios
Centrado
Líneas curvas y curva en s
Línea de horizonte
Líneas diagonales
Simetría
Líneas convergentes
Enmarcado natural
Vertical u horizontal
Acercarse al encuadre
Parte de un todo
Inclinar el plano
Punto de vista
Espacio vacío
Sombras
Contraste de colores
Enfoqeu selectivo
Importancia de la escala
Finalmente el capítulo 6 desarrolla ejercicios prácticos de aplicación de lo aprendido, realizando tomas de luces de automóviles en movimiento, retrato, bodegón, barrido y contraluz.
Esperamos que disfrutes el curso.
target_audience: Entusiastas por la fotografía
Personas que poseen una cámara profesional y desean sacarle más provecho
Fotógrafos
Artistas visuales

courses.title: Your Road to Better Photography
courses.bio: Photography Made Simple!
objectives: Operate the Camera in full Manual Mode

Aperture, Shutter Speed, ISO: How to Succeed In This Course
Putting It All Together: A Live Demonstration of Aperture, Shutter Speed, and IS
Test Your Knowledge: Aperture, Shutter Speed, and ISO Quiz
Use Shutter Speed to Create Long Exposure Shot
Create A Photo Using Only Your Cell Phone.

requirements: Students should have a camera in order to follow along the course to gain full understanding of the subject matter.
courses.description:
Are you stuck operating your Camera in Auto Mode?
Do you have a camera ready to learn but can't seem to find the right training that makes photography simple?
This Course is dedicated to simplifying the 3 elements that will put you in creative control over every shoot that you have. Aperture, Shutter Speed, and ISO. What I found is that most times starting out, photographers think they understand the concept of how to use aperture, shutter speed, and iso until there put in a dark room and asked to take photos. Not good right????  In this training, I help you understand when to use the 3 and what part of the image that decision effects.
Feel free to follow along with your camera to truly retain the instructions. I suggest you watch the training videos first and then follow along so that you will fully get the concept. If your able to focus in and follow along the first time that will be A-Okay.
In this 30 minute course, I will make sure to give you a clear understanding of how to control the lighting in any situation. Taking you from Automatic mode to fully manual mode in no time. The practice is the key to learning and creating a truly wonderful experience for yourself.
Class includes 4 video lessons, 2 field assignments to practice the techniques learned in the training.
Once you understand you will be able to create very nice photo's with any camera.  Within 2 of the assignments, I challenge you, to use just your cell phone that forces you to not get overwhelmed with the tool or camera used but allowing you to focus on the message of what you're looking to convey to your audience.
You should take this course if you want an easy to understand the concept of controlling lighting better.
This course is for Beginners to Photographers still struggling with the concept of how to control the Aperture, Shutter Speed, and ISO.
target_audience: Photographer's that's still unclear of the relationship between the Aperture, Shutter Speed and ISO should watch the easy to learn samples of how to work with all three. Photographers that already understand and control all with no problem will not need this training.

courses.title: Corso rapido su Luminar 3 da zero! In Italiano
courses.bio: Corso rapido su Luminar 3 in Italiano per comprendere il software e le sue potenzialità.
objectives: Conoscere il funzionamento del software
Imparare cos'è un catalogo e come crearlo
Gestire le foto e post-produrle

INTRODUZIONE: Coupon 10 Euro per l'acquisto del software
MODIFICA DELLE IMMAGINI: Introduzione ai filtri e spazi di lavoro

requirements: Interesse per la post-produzione rapida
courses.description:
L'UNICA VERA ALTERNATIVA AD ADOBE LIGHTROOM
Luminar 3 è tutto quello che si può pretendere in ambito software per chi vuole un software completo per gestire e post-produrre le proprie immagini. Luminar 3 è il modo più innovativo per modificare le proprie foto.
Il software sfrutta un motore di elaborazione alimentato da AI (intelligenza artificiale) che gli permette di valutare l'immagine ed applicare il miglior intervento specifico per quella specifica immagine che stai gestendo.
Può decidere di post-produrre le immagini in modo professionale e dove hai il totale controllo, oppure puoi sfruttare i suoi automatismi e preset per velocizzare il workflow e raggiungere risultati sorprendenti in pochi attimi.
IN QUESTO CORSO IN ITALIANO
Io ti faccio conoscere Luminar 3 e ti insegno - attraverso delle videolezioni - come usarlo e sfruttarlo al meglio per organizzare le tue immagini tramite i cataloghi e come sfruttare i looks per velocizzare il processo (workflow) di post-produzione.
Luminar 3 è di fatto l'unico vero e diretto concorrente di Adobe Lightroom, sia come funzionalità che, sopratutto, come costo di utilizzo.
CHI SONO E QUALI SONO LE MIE COMPETENZE
Fotografo, videomaker, blogger o podcaster? Non esiste una etichetta per definire "chi sono" e "cosa faccio". Forse l'unica che si avvicina è "Content Creator", un creatore di contenuti.
Tutto quello che faccio sono solo il risultato di una mia grande passione per l'argomento trattato! Se l'argomento mi piace lo approfondisco e alla fine condivido la mia esperienza e quanto appreso.
COSA TI PROMETTO
Sarò a disposizione per ogni tuo dubbio. Potrai contattarmi direttamente tramite la piattaforma Udemy per inoltrarmi un messaggio o chiarimento dove cercherò, nel più breve tempo possibile, di darti una risposta o aiutarti a risolvere la tua problematica.
Puoi anche contattarmi per suggerirmi delle modifiche da fare al corso, aggiungendo degli argomenti che vorresti veder trattati o che vorresti voler approfonditi ulteriormente.
COSA IMPARERAI CON QUESTO CORSO
Seguendo il corso potrai imparare velocemente tutte le funzionalità del software Luminar 3 e come sfruttarlo nel migliore dei modi per gestire e pos-produrre le tue immagini con un software alternativo a Lightroom senza essere vincolato ad un abbonamento mensile.

courses.bio: How to incorporate storytelling & eye pleasing composition in that split second
objectives: How to obtain street photography with narrative component and pleasing to eyes.
The training and developing of seeing eye
Developing of a clear mindset on how to do street photography that evokes viewer's heart

Guidance on the why and how of what needs to be enhanced with Lightroom editing
A brief summary of what’d been taught

requirements: Very basic camera knowledge
An Camera
courses.description:
Street photography is about making photograph in public places.
To capture the random incidents, the candid moments, or anything that’s pleasing to the eyes and fascinating to us with an attempt to instil an emotion, convey a message, or interpret a story with what our eyes see and what our hearts visualise.
In addition, Street photography makes traveling more purposeful and significant.
It makes us see the world with a broader perspective and greater interest.
It also makes us see the familiar everyday surroundings with a fresh new eye.

Some would say it’s challenging, as it requires patience, quick and intuitive responses and the failing rate can be high.
And it’s not easy to make the composition pleasing to the eyes, and certainly not easy to incorporate the narrative component to the images in that split second.

As a matter of fact, it does require something more.
That’s what this Master Class is all about, I felt compelled to guide those who wish to acquire a deeper understanding in this area.
I’d immersed in this genre of photography for more than 14 years now, and I’d earned many honours in photo competitions in Street photography category. One of my most unforgettable moments and greatest honours was winning the First Place in National Geographic Photography Contest in 2013.
And I’m extremely glad to see many of my students participated in contests and earned awards and mentions from all over the world time and again.

In this master class I will teach you first the very foundation of photography:
Understanding the clue, or so-called the formula of what constitutes a good photograph, and how to develop our seeing eye in photography.
And we will progress to explore Street Photography in detail.
On a step-by-step basis, I’ll teach you which gears to use, how to do the camera setting correctly in different situations, how to find the right elements and integrate them in the chosen frame of the camera.

And I’ll teach you the various creative approaches to Street photography:
what’s suitable for colour photography, what’s suitable for B&W and etc.
How to deal with different weather condition, whether it’s rainy or sunny and still produce good results; whether it’s flat lighting, or lowlight.
I will guide you on how we could fully utilise each and every situation.
What you will find in the class is a complete guide of all I know about Street photography:
From the technical aspects to the artistry aspects, what kind of preparation we should make, how to deal with different circumstances, what are the common mistakes we make and how to rectify them, how to make good and artistic composition, and how to seek out the storytelling, the narrative component.

There are post-processing lessons, in both Color & B&W.
My tutorial is about simplify the complex, training in the habit of seeing & observation, with many inspiring & creative lessons and assignments for you to work on. It is designed to make learning fun and engaging.
At the end of the course, I believe you will find you have acquired a clear understanding and creative mindset, and able to produce aesthetically pleasing and good storytelling street images—more than you could ever imagine.
target_audience: Hobbyists in street photography
Ambitious photographers
Those who love photography art
Those who wish to acquire in-depth photography knowledge

courses.description:
Wer ein Portrait perfekt retuschieren möchte und Informationen sucht, wird oft nicht fündig - gerne fehlt genau der entscheidende Part. Dann sucht man also weiter auf YouTube und Co., kauft Trainings und besucht Workshops... Das Filtern von guten und schlechten Videos wird zum eigentlich zeitraubende Part.
Bei mir war das nicht anders. Ich habe Wochen auf irgendwelchen Videoportalen verbracht, viel Geld für Workshops, Bücher und Trainings ausgegeben und war am Ende trotzdem froh, viele Pro-Retoucher um mich zu haben, die die Lücken schließen konnten.
Das will ich gerne weitergeben und darum habe ich mich rasiert und ein Mammut-Tutorial für Euch erstellt.
Das Videotraining Retouching: Portrait und Beauty ist in fünf Teile unterteilt:
Antworten auf die üblichen Fragen
Portrait-Retusche
Beauty-Retusche
Männer-Retusche-Special
Sommersprossen-Special
Ich habe dabei nicht nur auf alle möglichen Tools verzichtet (Aktionen und Panels), sondern auch versucht alles zu erklären und nichts raus zu schneiden. Natürlich verwende ich nur die mir bekannten High-End-Techniken.
PS: der Kurs liegt in 1080p vor - um diese Auflösung zu sehen, stelle bitte am Qualitätszahnrädchen rechts unten auf "AUTO" um.

requirements: Camera with PASM modes or advanced phone
You don't need to have any experience in photography
Masz 15 minut dziennie wolnego czasu przez dwa tygodnie
courses.description:
Who is this photography course for?
- Your family and friends tell you that you have a good eye and you should develop in photography. However, you won't do with your phone what you do with a camera.
- You already have your dream camera, but what you get is of poor quality: dark and blurry. You wonder why you spent so much money when your phone takes better pictures?
- An important occasion is approaching, such as a wedding or your dream vacation. A phone will not take as good pictures in difficult lighting conditions as a camera.
- A baby has arrived in your family and you want to document every moment of its life. You rely on the good quality that a DSLR or mirrorless camera gives you.


What specifically will you learn?
- Master the main and most important parameters of the camera. Understand the camera.
- Avoid mistakes related to the use of shutter speed and aperture.
- Master such photographic subjects as portrait, landscape.
- Use depth of field correctly, blur the background if necessary and show everything in focus if needed.
- Make more informed purchases when it comes to photographic equipment.


Course description
The training is designed for very beginners. The language used is simple and blunt. The issues are illustrated with hundreds of examples: photos, infographics, video breakthroughs. The pace of the course is very slow at the beginning, to accelerate a bit in the middle and definitely increase at the end.


The course consists of short lectures interspersed with exercises on basic topics. The last two lessons are extended instruction, rich in educational resources, where I show how to take a good portrait and landscape.


What kind of camera do I need?
For the most effective learning in the course, you should have a camera with PASM shooting modes. These modes are located most often on the camera body dial or in the menu. If you can't find them, look at the camera's technical specifications (equipment parameters table) in the manual or ask the dealer from whom the equipment was purchased. The model and brand of the camera does not matter. What matters is the ability to set the camera's parameters manually or semi-automatically.


What first: buying a camera or a course?
If you buy a camera, then you can learn on a course on your own equipment. If you decide to buy the course first, the camera purchase will certainly be more deliberate. In addition to these issues, consider the size of the expenditure. Buying a course is an expense of about a dozen dollars. For a basic camera, you need to spend 50 times as much, or several hundred dollars. This means that by investing about 2% of the value of the camera, you will better allocate a significant amount of money and the purchase will be more successful.


Free e-book
The course includes a 52-page e-book - a downloadable cheat sheet with the messages you send in a nutshell.


Change your photographic life for the better.


You are invited by Szymon Zdunczyk!
target_audience: Very beginner amateur photographers
Women who want to photograph their children every day
Want to overcome fear of the camera
You want to understand only the most important issues of photography

courses.description:
Grundkurs für Photoshop-Anfänger
Dieser deutschsprachige Grundkurs hilft dir, die Basics von Adobe Photoshop und alle wichtigen Werkzeuge zu verstehen. Ideal für Einsteiger, die direkt durchstarten möchten und das volle Potenzial von Photoshop ausschöpfen wollen.
Warum Photoshop Basics?
In diesem Videotraining wirst du alle grundlegenden Funktionen und Werkzeuge von Adobe Photoshop Schritt für Schritt kennenlernen. So steht deinem kreativen Schaffen nichts mehr im Weg, und du kannst sofort mit beeindruckenden Projekten loslegen!
Was dich erwartet:
Dieser Kurs ist wie ein umfassendes Seminar aufgebaut. Wir gehen auf jedes Basiswerkzeug und jede Technik ein, und ich erkläre dir alles in leicht verständlichen Schritten.
Keine langweiligen Bildschirmaufnahmen – echte Einblicke und Praxisbeispiele!
Die wichtigsten Themen im Videokurs:
Retusche in Photoshop
Deine bisherigen Versuche, Bilder zu retuschieren, waren nicht erfolgreich? Das liegt nicht an dir! Photoshop bietet zahlreiche Werkzeuge und Techniken zur Retusche. Doch welches Werkzeug ist das richtige? Ich stelle dir alle Retusche-Tools vor und zeige dir, wie du mit den passenden Techniken beeindruckende Ergebnisse erzielst.
Freistellen in Photoshop
Wusstest du, dass Photoshop über 8 Freistellungs-Werkzeuge verfügt? Ob du den Hintergrund entfernen oder bestimmte Elemente auswählen möchtest, jedes Werkzeug hat seine eigene Funktion und Anwendung. Ich erkläre dir jedes dieser Tools im Detail und zeige dir, wie du damit beinahe magische Ergebnisse erzielen kannst – inklusive Tipps zu den versteckten Werkzeugen!
Bildbereiche ausschneiden und ersetzen
Hast du schon mal gedacht, wie schön es wäre, den grauen Himmel deines Urlaubsfotos durch sonnige Wolken zu ersetzen? Photoshop macht genau das möglich! Hier zeige ich dir, wie du Bildbereiche ausschneidest und durch andere Elemente ersetzt, um deine Fotos ganz nach deinen Vorstellungen anzupassen.
Umfärben in Photoshop
Farben haben eine starke Wirkung – und in Photoshop kannst du sie gezielt verändern. Ob du Regeln wie die Komplementärfarben einhalten möchtest oder bestimmte Bildbereiche umfärben willst, ich zeige dir, wie einfach das geht. Schon nach wenigen Übungen wirst du ein Gefühl für die Werkzeuge entwickeln und beeindruckende Farbanpassungen vornehmen können.
Dies ist nur ein kleiner Einblick in die 46 Module dieses Kurses, die dich vom Photoshop-Anfänger zum fortgeschrittenen Nutzer machen!
target_audience: Photoshop Anfänger

courses.description:
Capturing extremely light and dark areas in a single image for eye-grabbing results is nearly impossible… unless you know advanced shooting and editing techniques to illuminate otherwise obscured details. This hands-on, comprehensive course requires no former knowledge of HDR to create breathtaking representations of even the most demanding scenes. You’ll quickly get a grasp of the complete process, beginning with the camera’s settings through to capturing the HDR sequence, merging and developing the image. You’ll also learn how to take full advantage of the data stored in the RAW files to produce scenes containing vast luminosity range and strong contrast.


Sharpen Your Skills
Create a Sequence Of Images For HDR Merge
Learn how to shoot a sequence of exposures that will give you the optimum RAW data to create beautiful artwork. Knowing how to combine an HDR merge in post production will give you confidence and peace of mind even when working with demanding lighting conditions.


Creative Color Grading
Create depth and add impact to your artwork by playing with subtle color combinations. Together we’ll explore the possibilities of beautiful color grading with the Selective Color Adjustment Layer in Photoshop.

requirements: Lightroom Classicを利用している方、したい方ならどなたでも
courses.description:
< Lightroom Classicで大量の写真を「素早く」「賢く」管理できるのを知っていますか？ >
・LIghtroom Classicを写真管理するために使ったことがない
・写真の補正以外に何に使えるのか知りたい
・なんとなくLightroom Classicを使用しているが、実は仕組みがよくわかっていない…
・そもそもカタログの概念がややこしくてよくわからない…
・Lightroom Classicでレートぐらいしかつけたことがない
・コレクションって何？
・プレビューって何？
↓↓↓
動画を見ながら一緒に操作して、Lighroom Classicを使いこなすためのスキルを身につけましょう！
※作業用サンプル画像(一部)配布あり
パソコンやスマホにダウンロードすれば好きな時に学習が可能です。
書籍やネットで見てもなんだかややこしいLightroom Classicの基本の使い方、プロが撮影現場でどのようにLightroom Classicを使用しているのか、実例も踏まえて、Lightroom Classicで大量の写真を整理・管理する方法を徹底的に解説。
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------


<このコースで学べること>
Lightroom Classicについて、写真を「管理する」機能にフォーカスし、Lightoroom Classicで大量の写真を整理、管理する方法を学びます。
(※現像・補正の方法については触れていません。)
・多機能な検索機能を利用して欲しい写真を瞬時に探し出す方法
・大量の写真を賢く分類し、コレクション(アルバムのような機能)に仕分けする秘訣
・Lightroom Classicの機能を応用してバックアップデータを作成するヒント
・Lightroom Classicから直接クラウドサービスへ保存する方法
・プロが撮影現場でLightroom Classicをどのように使用していたか

などなど…書籍やネットには載っていないたくさんのTIPSをお伝えします。

また、Lihgroom Classicを使用していく上で必ず知っておくべきカタログの仕組みやよくあるトラブル解決方法など、今更聞けないLighroom Classicの基本についてもしっかり学んでいきましょう。

※コース内で「Lightroom」という記載になっている箇所があったり、話していますが、基本的に「Lightroom Classic」のことを指しています。
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------


<このような方を対象にしています>
①Lightroom Classicの仕組み、カタログなどの基本を学びたい方(内容に現像機能の解説は含みません)
②Lightroom Classicを利用した写真管理に興味がある方
③Lightroom Classicの便利な使い方、実例を知りたい方

<参加条件>
※特にありません！
Lightroom Classicを既に利用している方、これから使ってみたいという方、どなたでもOKです！
<解説に使用しているLightroom Classicのバージョンについて>
前半：バージョン10.3リリース / Camera Raw 13.3
一部後半 : バージョン10.4リリース / Camera Raw 13.4

※収録の途中でアップデートがありましたが、コースの内容に支障はありません。
(2021年10月末 / コースリリース時点)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

<講師のkotsumeより>
こんにちは！本コース講師のkotsumeです。
Adobe Lightroom Classicを題材にした書籍など多数ある中で、いずれも現像方法にフォーカスしがちだと感じてきました。でも、実際にLightroom Classicを使用していると、写真を整理・管理する機能が優れていることがよくわかります。私自身が初めてLightroom Classicに触れて難しいと感じた経験や、その後撮影現場でLightroom Classicを使用してきた立場から、よりわかりやすく伝わるようにという想いでコースを作成しました。

Lightroom Classicの基本から、書籍やネットには載っていないプロの現場での実用例まで。このコースが皆様のフォトライフのお役に立てましたら幸いです。コースでお会いしましょう！

kotsume :-)

courses.description:
WILLKOMMEN ZUM KURS "50 Tipps, um deine Fotos professioneller aussehen zu lassen!"
Wenn du deine Fähigkeiten als (Hobby)Fotograf verbessern möchtest, dann ist dies genau der richtige Kurs für dich! In diesem Kurs gebe ich dir meine 50 besten Tipps als professioneller Fotograf. Du lernst, wie du deine Freunde mit deinen Fotos ins Staunen versetzten kannst.
Du wirst in diesem Kurs folgende Dinge lernen:
Generelle Tipps zu verschiedenen Bereichen der Fotografie.

Tipps zur Landschaftsfotografie in der Nacht.

NICHT VERGESSEN: Wenn dir dieser Kurs nicht gefällt, kannst du 30 Tage lang dein Geld zurück erhalten!
Dies ist deine Chance! Ich freue mich auf dich!

objectives: Den nächsten Schritt in der Fotografie machen, Gestaltungskritierien und das Sehen erlernen.

Blende & Belichtungszeit: Schärfe und Unschärfe - Eine bewusste Wahl
So lernt man sehen wie mit der Kamera

requirements: Du solltest Interesse an der Fotografie haben und über eine Kamera verfügen.
courses.description: Die fotografischen Eigenschaften der Kamera und ihre Anwendung sind "das Wesen der Fotografie". Ziel  dieses Kurses ist es, die visuelle Sprache der Fotografie zu erlernen und zu verstehen, wie sich die Realität vor unserem Auge in tolle Fotos verwandeln läßt. Lerne das Sehen und lass dich inspirieren! Es ist nicht wichtig, mit welcher Kamera du fotografierst. Wichtig ist, dass du deine Kamera beherrschst und nicht deine Kamera dich. Nicht die neuen, immer besseren Kameras mach die guten Bilder, sondern wir müssen lernen bescheiden, neugierig, geduldig, kreativ, lernwillig und menschlich zu bleiben, um Bilder mit "Seele" zu machen.
target_audience: Für Hobby-Fotografen und Anfänger im Bereich Fotografie.

requirements: Download and Install Adobe Lightroom

courses.description:
This Adobe Lightroom training course from Camera Stupid is designed to get you started using Adobe Lightroom to organize, edit, and backup your photos as quickly as possible. Adobe Lightroom is a fantastic tool for amateur or professional photographers looking to streamline their workflow and produce professional photographic results for their clients or personal enjoyment. In this digital age, many photographers struggle to maintain the thousands of photos they take each month. Adobe Lightroom solves the problem of photo organization with a robust collection system and keyword tagging features. Never misplace a digital photo again!
No prior Adobe Lightroom knowledge is required to benefit from this course. You can apply what you learn in this course to your existing workflow. This course is designed to get to the point quickly and clearly, giving you more time to do what you love. Each lesson is recorded in High Definition and allows students to follow along on the instructor's screen.
The training will begin by demonstrating the basic steps to import photos, group them into collections, and tag them with relevant keywords. The course will cover backup strategies and offer advice for keeping your photos secure. From there we will dive deeper into editing techniques, presets, tethering, tone curve, panoramas, and file formats.
By the end of this video based training course on Adobe Lightroom you will be able to successfully manage your own growing photo portfolio using a tool that many photographers consider to be the industry standard. You'll be able to create and manage your own presets, and export them to share with friends or fellow photographers. You'll be able to apply non-destructive edits to your photos that will drastically improve them and get the look you desire. Most importantly, you'll be able to rest assured knowing that your photos are safe, organized, and accessible with just a keystroke.
target_audience: This Adobe Lightroom course is perfect for any photographer who is new to Lightroom or is interested in learning how to use it to organize, edit, and backup their photo portfolio. If you're already a Lightroom pro, this course is not for you.

La estructura del curso es sencilla y amena, descargable a tu PC y trata desde los aspectos mas basicos, el revelado, las reducciones de ruido, el tratamiento del color, hasta la extracción de nebulosidades tan débiles que parecía imposible que estuviesen ahí.
En este doble curso (iniciación y nivel .2) se incluyen mas de 20 videotutoriales, presentaciones en pdf, archivos de word y muchos otros recursos para que tu aprendizaje sea lo mas rápido, ameno y sencillo que puedas imaginar.
Gracias por elegir este curso y adelante, ponte comodo y disfruta, a tu ritmo, sin prisas, es apasionante!!.
Ferran Bosch
astrofotografo.

requirements: A working copy of Photoshop, ideally the most recent version, although the tools used can be found in earlier versions
courses.description:
Updated to cover the 2024 release of Photoshop and its amazing Artificial Intelligence capabilities
'I've done some Photoshop tutorials on YouTube, but they just cover one tool or technique. How do I actually enhance a photo, start to finish?'
'There are so many tools in Photoshop! So many things to remember! As a beginner what do I need to know and what do I not need to know?'
'There are so many Photoshop courses out there. Why would I do this one?'
Enrol on this course and find out just how well I can answer those questions. I've been using Photoshop for nearly 35 years - since version 1. Not many can say that. I've spent thousands of hours with Photoshop and now it feels like an old friend. An old friend I learned to get the best from. An old friend that sometimes caught me out and I had to adapt my techniques. And over the years I've learned what matters and what doesn't. This course teaches you what matters. Things like where to start when enhancing an image, what steps you should take and in what order. Things like selecting the right tool for the job because just learning a tool isn't enough. How to use a tool but also when to use it, what problems you may encounter and, perhaps most importantly, why to use it.
How does a PDF with notes on all the videos plus hundreds of screen shots sound? Good? You've got it! I learn from video courses myself - I like learning new things and if I'm creating courses for people, it only makes sense that I go through the learning journey myself. It struck me how much time I spend making notes I can refer to. I estimate it increases my study time by a factor of at least 4.
So I've made notes for you. One thing that makes this course extra special is a downloadable PDF with a table of contents plus an index. This PDF contains notes based directly upon this course I offer. Bullet points, screen shots, tips - they are all there and you can keep the PDF and refer to it whenever you want. This should save you dozens of hours of note taking and will be an invaluable asset when you need to revise what you've learned. I've even left blank pages in case you want to print it out and jot down your own notes.
The course starts with a thorough grounding in the five steps you need to consider taking when you enhance a photo. These steps are so fundamental that I make sure that they are covered properly and in detail. Practically every image you see is available as a download and every step has practice videos. Not a multi choice quiz where you just have to remember the name of a tool. That's not enough - you need practical exercises for a program like Photoshop and I give you exactly that in a unique way.
This course is aimed at beginners and existing users who want to round out their knowledge but that doesn't mean it's over simplified. Nope. You will learn the same tools and techniques that are used in professional studios everywhere. I've been in quite a few and - just between you and me - there's things on this course that I've had to explain to people who use Photoshop on a daily basis. That's something I can do for you too. As well as being a designer for decades I also spent some time as a teacher and my university degree is all about how people learn. And it is my firm belief that the right way to learn something like Photoshop is not to just learn the tools. The right way is to learn the right workflow. You learn the right workflow by using the right tools for the job, and the best way to use them.
After the five steps method we'll tackle more advanced topics and again you'll see how to use the right tools to get the job done. You'll also practice them. Things like half a dozen different ways to select areas of your picture and the pros and cons of each. Things like the paintbrush and vector pen tools. Yes, there's exercises too, including a simple workflow for painting which shows you the typical techniques a digital artist might use to get things done. Learn best working practices and gotchas while you learn about text, artboards, gradients, selective colorization or basic/advanced dodge and burn techniques. Layer blend modes? So many people get confused by them. Give me 25 minutes and you'll wonder why anyone would ever find them challenging. How about layer blend ranges and how they compare so favourably to luminosity masks. Learn the differences between vector shapes and bitmaps. Layer masks? So useful yet sometimes so confusing. Let me explain them to you and make them a vital part of your new skillset. I'll show you the automated workflow techniques I used which made possible the 100,000+ individual graphics for Rollercoaster Tycoon 1 and 2 possible. I'll even show you how to use third party plug ins from the Nik Collection to create incredible effects.
By the end of the course you will have mastered various effective workflows, start to finish. You will gain the confidence to tackle your own images, be able to select which workflow suits the photo best, and one day soon you may well be looking at one of your own photos which you've enhanced, and thinking 'That looks fantastic! I did that...'
Enroll now. Don't forget you have the 30 day money back guarantee so you have nothing to lose and so much to gain. Learn Photoshop from someone who knows what's important and knows how to teach. Get ready to make your photos shine!
I'll see you on the course,
Simon
target_audience: Photographers and designers who wish to learn Photoshop properly
Beginners welcome, but existing users will find masses of useful information and technique

This Canon EOS 4000D or Rebel T100 tutorial is a superb course for anyone who wants to get the best out of their Canon camera. Today's DSLR and Mirrorless cameras are fantastic aren't they?
The great thing is... they have an enormous number of features and settings
The problem is.........they have an enormous number of features and settings!!
And it is a problem, because although there are some real hidden gems amongst all those features, they can seem confusing or intimidating, and so a lot of photographers simply ignore or shy away from them (you know who you are!!)
This course, aimed at beginner and intermediate photographers, covers DSLR and Mirrorless basic settings, but also explains your camera's more advanced features and settings. You probably already know about some of these settings but not entirely sure how and when to use them, and there may even be some that you're not even aware of!

Поэтому ретушь является неотъемлемым этапом обработки любой фотографии, и любой современный фотограф должен уметь устранять любые дефекты и изъяны на своих снимках.

courses.description:
Are you passionate about photography and eager to take your editing skills to the next level? Look no further! Welcome to the comprehensive and user-friendly "Adobe Lightroom Classic CC Made Easy" training tutorial.
Adobe Lightroom Classic CC is the ultimate software for photographers, enabling you to organize, enhance, and transform your images into stunning masterpieces. Whether you're a beginner exploring the world of photo editing or an experienced photographer looking to streamline your workflow, this course is designed to provide you with the knowledge and techniques to unlock the full potential of Lightroom Classic CC.
Led by a professional photographer and seasoned instructor, this course takes a hands-on approach to ensure that you grasp the core concepts and functionalities of Lightroom Classic CC. Even if you're completely new to the software, we start from the basics and progress to more advanced techniques, making this course accessible to photographers of all levels.
Here's a glimpse of what you'll learn in this comprehensive training tutorial:
Introduction to Lightroom Classic CC: Familiarize yourself with the Lightroom interface, navigation, and key features.
Importing and Organizing Photos: Master the art of importing and organizing your photo library, including keywording, tagging, and rating images.
Basic Editing Tools: Dive into the powerful editing capabilities of Lightroom Classic CC, including adjusting exposure, contrast, color balance, and sharpness.
Advanced Editing Techniques: Explore advanced techniques such as selective adjustments, graduated filters, and radial filters to take your editing to the next level.
Retouching and Spot Removal: Learn how to remove blemishes, unwanted objects, and distractions from your photos using the healing brush and spot removal tool.
Enhancing Details and Effects: Discover techniques to enhance details, add creative effects, and apply presets to give your photos a unique look.
Exporting and Sharing: Understand the various export options in Lightroom Classic CC and learn how to share your edited images with the world.
Workflow Optimization: Streamline your editing process by creating presets, using collections and smart collections, and harnessing the power of keywords and metadata.
Throughout the course, you'll have the opportunity to practice your skills with real-world examples and exercises, enabling you to apply what you've learned immediately. The instructor will guide you through each step, providing practical tips and insights to enhance your editing workflow.
Join the community of photographers who have mastered Adobe Lightroom Classic CC. Enroll in "Adobe Lightroom Classic CC Made Easy" today and embark on a journey of creativity, enhancement, and visual storytelling!
target_audience: Photographers, Photography Students, Teachers, Anyone wanting to learn Adobe Lightroom

courses.description:
今、フード撮影需要が一気に高まっています。
そのチャンスを逃してはもったいないと思いまして、急ぎで、みなさんがフードカメラマンとして活躍できるように、この動画を作成致しました。


お店に出向いて料理撮影を数百件こなしてきたのカメラマンが現場で使えるノウハウを全て教えます。




写真教室で「商品撮影」や「料理撮影」を学ばれている方は多いのですが、実際に現場に出ると、料理教室とは違うことに多く出会います。


例えば
・場所が狭い
・店内で撮れない
・調理場しかスペースが無い
・ビールケースの上で撮るしかない
・店の外のベンチしか撮る場所がない
・カメラマンファーストで進められない
などなど




また、カメラマンは綺麗に撮れているつもりなのに、お店の方、料理を作った方は喜んでいないこともあります。


これらの対策などを、私がいろいろな現場での経験を通じて得たお店の撮影で本当に役立つノウハウをこの動画教材でお伝えさせていただきました。




まずは、ご自宅でしっかり練習しましょう。


もし、それで綺麗に撮れるようになったら、ぜひ、あなたにも、お店に出向いて撮影するフードカメラマンにチャレンジして欲しいです。


あなたの力で、料理をつくるお店の方の笑顔を、どんどん広げていきましょ～

Esse é um curso de "Lightroom CC completo", onde você vai aprender a editar belas fotos e imagens. No curso vamos iniciar o trabalho com a versão "Lightroom CC 2018" e finalizar com a versão "Lightroom CC 2019". Você vai aprender a usar os recursos dos programas, importar fotos, explorar a interface, usar ferramentas, colocar efeitos, predefinições, tudo de uma maneira fácil e direta ao ponto! Todo curso é explicado detalhadamente com calma e clareza para você aprender bem, você terá acesso vitalício, ou seja, acesso para vida inteira, podendo assistir sempre que quiser!
O curso está dividido em seções:
Seção 1 ''Introdução'' - Onde você vai ver um vídeo introdutivo, mostrando a sequência de aulas e atividades do curso.


Seção 2 "Explorando o lightroom" - Aqui você vai aprender sobre vários recursos do programa, importação, interface, usar ferramentas, perfil, luz, cor, efeitos, detalhe, óptica, geometria, cortar, girar, recuperar, clonar, pincel, filtro graduado, predefinições, vamos testar todas as ferramentas nas fotos, fazendo uma pré-edição!


Seção 3 "Praticando edições" - Aqui vamos praticar a edição de fotos colocando em prática tudo que foi visto nas aulas.


Seção 4 "Conclusão" - Aqui vamos recapitular alguns detalhes da interface, salvar e exportar fotos, analisar e aprender as funções do Lightroom CC 2019 e  encerramento do curso!
OBS.: As aulas tem duração máxima de até 10 minutos (nem sempre chegando a esse valor), visando um processo de aprendizagem agradável e menos cansativo!


















Temas relacionados: fotografia criativa, edicao de fotos, fotografia profissional, fotografia com celular, presets lightroom, fotografia mobile, fotografia digital, retrato criativo, antes e depois edicao, fotografia para instagram, fotografia autoral, lightroom mobile, fotografia estetica, truques de edicao, edicao no celular, dicas de fotografia, fotografia minimalista, fotografia de paisagem, composicao fotografica, color grading.
target_audience: Fotógrafos, designers, entusiastas da fotografia que queiram aprender a editar fotos no Lightroom.

MARTIN ZAPANTA
A freediving instructor in his native Philippines, the Top 1 freediver in the country, and a 15x national record holder, Martin has all the breath-hold credentials he needs. Martin has been a creative media professional for more than ten years. He has also developed wide-ranging imaging skillset from photography and filmmaking to video editing and color grading.


He started as a graphic designer back in 2008, then he ventured into events and fashion photography. In 2010, Martin began to work in the filmmaking industry. He landed his first job as a colorist and eventually learned video editing. He also took workshops in directing, sound designing, and screenwriting.


Martin’s technical abilities and creative eye are in clear evidence, with beautifully choreographed depictions of his fellow freedivers and evocative marine life portraits composed with almost impossible precision. In a word: breathtaking.

courses.title: Kurs Photoshop obróbka fotografia produktowa
courses.bio: Naucz się retuszować typowe mankamenty zdjęć produktowych. Poznaj metody posługiwania się narzędziami i funkcjami Photos
objectives: Naucz się retuszować typowe mankamenty zdjęć produktowych.
requirements: Kurs przeznaczony jest dla osób zaznajomionych już z podstawami Photoshopa i wiedzących co to są maski warstwy, warstwy dopasowania.
courses.description:
Retusz zdjęć produktów
Jeśli prowadzisz sklep internetowy lub sprzedajesz na aukcjach to wiesz jak dobrze zrobione zdjęcie przyczynia się do zwiększenia sprzedaży produktu. Nic w tym dziwnego ponieważ z pewnością sam wybrałbyś sklep gdzie zdjęcia stoją na wysokim poziomie, w porównaniu ze sklepem gdzie fotografie pozostawiają wiele do życzenia.
Dobrze wykonana fotografia potrafi zwiększyć statystyki sprzedaży. Produkt, który jest dobrze sfotografowany wzbudza u klienta pożądanie oraz chęć posiadania. W przeciwieństwie do tradycyjnych zakupów, gdzie każdy może wziąć interesujący go przedmiot do ręki, tak przy zakupach online zdjęcie jest jedynym wizualnym przedstawieniem produktu, który być może za chwile ma trafić do koszyka klienta.
Dlatego należy zadbać o każdy detal na tego typu fotografiach. Pomoże Ci w tym Photoshop oraz wiedza na temat prawidłowego retuszu. Obróbka zdjęć tego typu wymaga od Ciebie pewnych umiejętności ponieważ zdjęcie musi przedstawiać faktyczne cechy, barwy, odcienie sprzedawanego towaru. Jednocześnie retusz zdjęć produktowych ma jeszcze bardziej uwydatnić charakterystyczne detale, zniwelować mankamenty i niedociągnięcia powstałe podczas etapu fotografowania.


Czego się nauczysz ?
Ustawisz prawidłową ekspozycję
Dopasujesz odpowiedni balans bieli
Stworzysz śnieżnobiałe tło
Nauczysz się wycinać obiekty i podmieniać tło
Skorygujesz powstałe zabarwienia
Skorygujesz światła i cienie modułem Camera Raw
Poznasz metody retuszuwania
Wyostrzysz detale
Pozbędziesz się zarysowań z powierzchni
Stworzysz realistyczny cień oraz odbicie


Uzyskaj śnieżnobiałe tło
Masz tylko jedną szansę, by Twoja strona sprzedażowa w sklepie czy też na aukcji allegro zainteresowała klienta na tyle, by zdecydował się na zakup. Pomoże Ci w tym dobrze sfotografowany przedmiot oraz postprodukcja tego zdjęcia w Photoshopie. Z naszym kursem zobaczysz jak przeprowadzić proces retuszu w taki sposób, by nie zakłamać faktycznego stanu produktu.
Na początku zaczniesz od uzyskania idealnie śnieżnobiałego tła, które obecnie jest jedynym akceptowalnym kolorem jeśli myślisz o wystawianiu aukcji. Allegro parę miesięcy temu wprowadziło wymóg, by każde zdjęcie miało idealnie białe tło. Dlatego jeśli nie dysponujesz profesjonalnym oświetleniem, nie martw się. Razem z kursem uzyskasz takie tło.


Profesjonalne zdjęcia w zaciszu Twojego domu
Wprawieni fotograficy wiedzą, że lepiej unikać lampy błyskowej skierowanej na wprost fotografowanego obiektu. Jeśli jednak posiadasz takie zdjęcia gdzie lampa błyskowa jest widoczna na powierzchni lub też metaliczna struktura odbija światło z okna, to mamy dla Ciebie kolejną lekcję gdzie pozbędziesz się tego odbicia.
Większość właścicieli sklepów internetowych nie posiada studia fotograficznego przez co zdjęcia powstają w domowych warunkach. Dlatego też często na przedmiotach widać zafarb powstały w wyniku kolorowych ścian pokoju. Tutaj z pomocą przyjdzie Ci kolejna lekcja.
Sprzedajesz biżuterię ? Świetnie, bo mamy dla Ciebie następną lekcje gdzie zobaczysz jak uzyskać prawidłowy kolor złota oraz wyretuszować typowe mankamenty w postaci zarysowań czy też widocznego kurzu. Zobaczysz jak stworzyć gładką strukturę powierzchni na zdjęciach makro.


Wycinanie, szparowanie
Zdajemy sobie sprawę, że nie wszyscy dysponują odpowiednim sprzętem, lampami oraz ciekawymi tłami. Dlatego podczas kursu zobaczysz jak zasymulować w Photoshopie efekty padającego światła na obiekt, a konkretnie na butelkę. W tej lekcji postaramy się stworzyć orzeźwiający projekt.
O czym jeszcze opowiemy w kursie ? Na pewno zainteresują Cię takie zagadnienia jak tworzenia realistycznego cienia oraz tworzenie odbicia produktu. Poznasz również kilka sposobów na zaznaczanie oraz wycinanie obiektów co jest bardzo przydatną umiejętnością przy tego typu zdjęciach. Jeśli już jesteśmy przy bardziej reklamowym retuszu to na pewno chętnie poznasz lekcję gdzie stworzysz od podstaw kolaż komponujący się ze zdjęciem pierścionka.


Kompletny retusz - workfollow
Zakończeniem szkolenie i podsumowaniem będzie 30 minutowy retusz high end zegarka. To tutaj poznasz zaawansowane techniki pracy ze światłem i cieniem, sposoby maskowania i pracy z warstwami. Uwydatnisz detale zegarka poprzez podkręcanie barw, cieni oraz świateł. Popracujesz z warstwami dopasowania, maskami warstw, modułem Camera Raw, filtrami, szybką maską, narzędziami malarskimi itd. Zasób narzędzi i funkcji, którymi posługujemy się w tym kursie jest bardzo duży i ma na celu pokazać, że istnieje kilka dróg do uzyskania danego efektu, na przykład stworzenia idealnie białego tła. Tylko od Ciebie będzie zależeć, którą drogę wybierzesz.
target_audience: Duża baza wiedzy dla fotografów zajmujących się fotografią produktową lub chcących wejść w ten rodzaj fotografii.
Dla osób prowadzących sklepy Szkolenie na pewno będzie bardzo pomocne wszystkich sprzedającym.

courses.description:
Learn how to create a stunning composite in this Photoshop Composite Masterclass, where you can learn from a pro! At the end of this course, you will have created your own composite using some very simple methods and have the know-how to create many more!
I am Tom Kai, A professional photographer and graphic designer with an incredible passion for creating. I've been working in the creative field for the past 10 years and in that time I've learned a lot of useful information that I want to share with YOU! I am excited to have you in my "Photoshop Composite Masterclass: Learn From A Pro"
This class is designed for those starting out using photoshop or those who may already be familiar with the program and want to learn how to make professional composites in a simple and easy way! Being able to create composites in photoshop is a fantastic skill to have for both photographers and graphic designers because today, many companies are looking for skilled compositors to create stunning ads and marketing campaigns that are out of this world, and this course is designed to give you just that skill and the edge you need to land some great clients! This course is in depth enough for those familiar with Photoshop, but also beginner friendly as I walk through my whole process, I am sure you will be able to follow along. I will be walking you through some shortcuts and tricks that I've learned over the years that have helped me improve my own workflow and the quality of my composites.
This course is made using the most up-to-date version of Photoshop as of September 2020, however the principles and skills taught in this course can and will apply to other versions as well. You can also download a free trial of Adobe Photoshop from their website
In this course you will learn:
Where to find good quality, free-to-use photos for compositing

courses.title: Beginner Digital Photography, How Do I Use My Camera?
courses.bio: Learn how to use your camera intuitively without memorizing or taking notes.
objectives: You will learn how to see your images in a more sophisticated way, like a professional photographer.
You will add exposure to your photographer's tool belt and learn how it impacts many visual elements of your images.
You will learn how to adjust your aperture and why you would choose one aperture over another.
You will learn how to adjust your shutter speed and why you would choose one shutter speed over another.
You will learn how all of the modes (Auto, P, S, A and M) work and when you should be using each mode.
You will learn to recognize the difference between depth-of-field blur and motion blur.
You'll start spending more time observing and capturing beautiful moments around you, rather than staring down at your camera feeling confused.

Exposure, Aperture and Shutter Speed: Nuts and Bolts of Aperture and Shutter Speed

requirements: Cameras appropriate for this class: 1. Cameras that are NOT Canon or Nikon SLRs. (If you have a Canon or Nikon SLR, we have other classes for you. Please find them on Udemy.) 2. Cameras that DO allow you to manually change your shutter speed. If you're not sure if your camera is appropriate for this class, please contact us and we'll help!

Through the exercises you'll do and through the explanations of the concepts, JP is committed that you retain the information there is to retain without memorizing. There is about an hour of video lecture which covers exposure, aperture, shutter speed and the mode dial (Auto, P, S or TV, A or Av and M). Images will be shown as examples. The exercises will be explained fully. This course is perfect for anyone who considers themselves a beginner with their camera or for anyone who has some existing knowledge about how their camera works but hasn't quite put all the puzzle pieces together when it comes to how aperture and shutter speed work together. This class is for you if you don't know how all the modes (Auto, P, S or TV, A or Av and M) work on your camera and when you should be using each mode.
